mchod cing bstod pa dang / yi ge brgyas phrin las so sor bshags/ /gtsug tor du ni rtse lnga pa'i/ /rdo rje ru ni gyur pa yin/ /phyi nas rtse mo nyis 'gyur du/ /gyur pa chos kyi 'khor lo'o/ /de ni nyis 'gyur du bsgres pa/ /lhan cig skyes par 'gyur ba dang / /de yi yang ni gzhan nyis 'gyur/ /longs

spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo dang / /sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'o/ /de yi nang du rtse gcig go/ /mnyam pa'i bde ba'i 'bras ster ba/ /gsang ba'i pad+ma la gnas pa/ /phyag rgya bsgom pa'i don du gsungs/ /nyin dang mtshan mo'i dus su ni/ /'dod chags zad don nyid du ni/ /gsung gi rdo rje myang don du/ /

sngags pa rnams la gsungs pa nyid/ /nyes par bya ba kho na min/ /nyi ma so so'i dus su ni/ /zas kun bde ba'i don du ste/ /mi 'jug pa yi rgyu ru ni/ /dpal gyi spyod pa dngos grub sgyur/ /ro bsregs gnas su mtshan mo ni/ /'gro la brtse ba'i don du min/ /rnal 'byor pa gang srog gcod pa'i/ /

nyin dang mtshan du byed pa ni/ /de ni srog 'jig pa ru gsungs/ /sgra gang kha dang bral ba ni/ /snying la yod par rab gyur pa/ /de ni brdzun du smra ba nyid/ /kun mkhyen gyi ni ye shes sar/ /'dzin pa yang ni byed pa gang / /rnal 'byor bar yang de gsungs so/ /bde ba'i thig le ma ltung ba/ /gzhan

gyi bud med du ni 'gyur/ /bsten pa chags bral min pa'o/ /srog dang rtsol ba'i me yis ni/ /ri bong can yang zhu ba'o/ /btung ba chang gi btung ba'o/ /mthe bong tshigs nas gtsug tor du/ /tshes kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ni/ /nya mthar thug pa rang gi sems/ /gtsug tor nas ni rang gi sems/ /yang

ni 'di ni 'gro 'gyur ba/ /nag po'i phyogs kyi mthar thug par/ /rnal 'byor pa yi spyod pa des/ /nyi ma re re'i dus su ni/ /'dod pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster/ /spyod dang 'dod pa lus tshad pa/ /mchog gi kha yi pad+ma las/ /tshig mi 'byung zhing gnyid log pa'o/ /'di ni 'khrul dang rgyal ba ni/ /du ba la

sogs rdo rje can/ /de rnams gsal ba rnam pa bcu/ /srog can lus kyi gnas skabs so/ /'jig rten 'dod pa'i gnas skabs ni/ /nges pa kho nar gsal ba las/ /su zhig rgyal bar su 'dod pa/ /thig le dkar po'i rgyun ni gang / /nyin dang mtshan mo'i ltung ba ni/ /mA ma kI ni de chang nge / /go ku

la sogs mig la sogs/ /nyi ma re re bzhin spros pa/ /bdud rtsi lnga rnams bsten pa ni/ /rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba/ /lha rnams dag pa'i lus la'o/ /stong pa'i sems de brtson pa yis/ /lhan cig skyes pa khyab bde ba/ /de ni skye gnas 'khrig pa min/ /nor gyi sbyin pa btang ba dang / /bud

med sbyor ba yid kyis ni/ /mi 'dzag pa ni tshul khrims so/ /bzod pa sgra sogs mi 'jug pa/ /gnyis kar song ba'i le lo ni/ /rnam par 'jig pa brtson 'grus so/ /bsam gtan shes rab sems dang ni/ /bde ba lhan cig par song kun/ /'gro ba thams cad brjod pa'o/ /sems can don du de rdzu

'phrul/ /srid pa'i don ni mi byed pa/ /thob pa gzhan ni bzhin pa'o/ /dri med blo gros 'od zer gyis ni mun pa thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams/ /skye bos bla ma'i 'dod pa gang zhig dang po de ni gzung bar byas nas su/ /bcings las grol 'dod de ni bdag gis nges grol byas pa'o/ /de ltar dag pa dri med gang yin de

yis rtag tu 'gro ba'i yid/ /dus 'khor zhabs zhes de la gnas pa'i go 'phang rtag tu bsam gyur cig /dus kyi 'khor lo'i yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs dus kyi zhabs chen pos mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta bi shwa shra'i dang / lo tsA ba gyi jo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /shrI na k+Sha tra maN+Dal sA d+ha na me ka da saM ga nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs yan lag bcu gcig pa zhes bya ba/ /dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phyag 'tshal lo/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku/ /nyin mor byed

pa'i 'od lta bu/ /pad+ma rgyas pa 'dra ba'i spyan/ /sangs rgyas seng ge'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /lha yi mchog la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi/ /rgyu skar dkyil 'khor sgrub thabs bri/ /mtshan nyid ldan pa'i gang zag gis/ /rgyud nas bshad pa'i

gnas dag tu/ /rten dang yo byad bsags nas ni/ /dngos grub yan lag bcu gcig bsgom/ /bsrung dang kha dog dag pa dang / /bdag nyid dag bya bdag bsrung dang / /tshogs gnyis bsags dang dkyil 'khor bskyed/ /byin gyis brlabs dang dbang bskur dang / /phra mo'i thig le'i rnal

'byor dang / /mchod bstod rjes kyi bya ba'o/ /cho ga de dag re re la'ang / /cho ga dang ni ting 'dzin dang / nga rgyal bzung ba gsum gsum mo/ /dang por tho rangs sngar langs nas/ /nam mkha'i dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma'i/ /rol mos gnyid bsangs pa ru bsam/ /thal sbyar sngags

'dis phyag bya'o/ /oM sar+b+ba bI ra yo gi nI na maHkA ya bAk+tsit+ta pra Na me ban+da naM ka ro yA mi/ de nas khams bsang maN+Dal bya/ /me tog tshom bu lha grangs bzhin/ /sku gsungs thugs kyi rten yang dgod/ /mchod pa rnams dang rol mo dang / /gtor ma dag kyang bsham par bya/ /

bdag nyid rdo rje shugs su bsgom/ /spyi bo sogs su yi ge dgod/ /rdo rje bsams la bka' bsgo ba/ /hUM lus ngag sems la gnas pa yi/ /bgegs kyi tshogs kun nga la nyon/ /nga ni dpal ldan rdo rje'i stobs/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo rab sbyor ba/ /rdo rje 'bar ba'i lus

'di yis/ /sku gsum las byung dgas par bya/ /gal te dam tshig las 'das na/ /zhig 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /rdo rje 'bar ba bde chen po/ /ye shes 'byung ba'i las rtsom gyis/ /brjes byed la sogs bgegs kyi tshogs/ /gnas 'dir ma gnas gzhan du

dengs/ /rdo rje rnams las med dpung 'bar/ /sngags 'dis bgegs rnams sreg par byed/ /oM AHhUM hoHhaM k+ShaHhrAHhrAHhrAHhrAHra ra ra ra/ badzrA na las r+b+bA ba ra Na d+ha r+m+mA pA la ya swa b+hA ba mA ra ka yi ka big+h+nAM bi nA ya kA dI nAM/ da sha di ka ga tA nAM kA ya bAk+tsit+ta nI/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/

b+ha smIM ku ru ku ru huM hUM phaT phaT/ ces pas bdud rnams sreg par bsam/ /oM AHhUM ra badzra tsan+d+ra sU R+Ya rA hu la kA la ag+nA yaH kA ya bA k+tsi t+tA dz+nyAn badzra prA kA ran ku ruku ru swA hA/ zhas pas sna tshogs rdo rje yis/ /bdag nyid sa dang rtsig pa bzhi/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba ni/ /

tho rangs grib ma'i bar du bsgom/ /yang na gnam sa 'byor bar ro/ /oM hUM ba sha kA ya badzra kU DA gA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas me dpung ra ba bsgom/ /oM hAM yAM rAM bAM lAM badzrA kA sha bA yu te dza u da ka pr-i thi bI badzra swa b+hA ba phany+tsa d+hA tu b+hu badzra maN+Dal ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/ 'byung ba lnga

brtsegs gyur pa las/ /rab gsum ldan gzhal yas khang / /dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsam/ /oM paHbi shwa badzra pad+maM ku ruku ru swA hA/ oM raHbadzra sU R+YA sa na ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pas gdan rnams bsam par bya/ /oM hUM kro d+he n+d+ro haM kro d+hA nAM adz+nyA dA ya ka

swA hA/ dbus su rdo rje shugs khro bo/ /'chad par 'gyur bar bdag nyid bsam/ /oM haM badzra kro d+ha rA dza ma hA u Sh+NI Sho urda di shi rak+ShAM ku ruku ru swA hA/ oM yaM badzra kro d+ha rA dza a te bi la big+h+nAn+ta kA pU rba di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM ra badzra kro d+ha rA dza dzaM ba ka du Sh+Ta pradz+nyA n+ta ka dak+Shi Na di shi rak+ShAM

ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM waM badzra kro d+ha rA dza man ka bi rA ga pad+mA n+ta ka ut+ta ra di shi rak+ShA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM laM badzra kro d+ha rA dza staM b+ha ka ya mAn+ta ka pa sh+tsi ma di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM lAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza ma hA ba la bA ya byA di shi rak+ShA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM wAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza a tsa

la I sha na di shi r+k+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM rAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza Tak+ki nai r+r-i h+yAM di shi ra k+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza nI la daN+Da ag+ne y+YAM di shi ra k+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM hAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza suM b+ha a d+ho di shi ra k+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ sngar gyi rdo rje shugs kyi ni/ /

dbang po'i pu ga so so las/ /khro bo bcu dag spros nas ni/ /rang rang phyogs su gdan dgod do/ /nga ngA nyi nyI/ NI N+rA/ mu mU/ n-Isngar bzhin bzad par bcu yang spro/ /thugs kyi ra ba'i phyi rol bsrung / /g+ha g+hA/ dz+hi dz+hI D+h+r-i D+h+r-I b+hu b+hU d+h+l-I d+h+la'-i/ de bzhin phyos skyong bcu yang spros/ /gsung gi ra ba'i nang

du bsrung / ga gA/ dzi dzI/ D+r-i D+rI/ bu bU/ d+l-i ng+la'-i/ de bzhin gza' bcu spros nas ni/ /de yi phyi rol bkod la bsrung / /kha khA/ tshi tshI/ Thi ThI/ phu phU/ thal-i th+l-I/ de bzhin klu rgyal bcu yang spro/ /sku yi ra ba'i nang du bsrung / /ka kA/ tsi tsI/ T+r-i T+rI pu pU d+l-i d+l-I/ 'byung po bcu

yang spros nas ni/ /de yi phyi rol bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta rak+Sha tsa kra sba b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ sngags kyis nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o/ /srung ba'i 'khor lo'i yan lag ste dang po'o// //bdud rtsi lnga dang stobs lnga yi/ /ri lu sran chung tshad tsam bya/ /yaM raM kaM go ku

da ha na bi mu mar shu/ rlung me thod par bcu po bsam/ /oM oM badzra tsan+d+ra sar+b+ba d+har+m+maHsu bi shud+d+haHswa b+hA ba sarba d+ha rmA n+bi sho d+hA ya swA hA/ zla ba oM gyis dag par bya/ /oM AHsU R+Ya sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+mA spra bo d+hA ka sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+mA pra bo d+hA ya swA hA/ nyi ma AHyi 'od kyis spel/ /oM hUM badzrA na la sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+mA

pra dI pa kA sar+b+ba d+har+m+mA na pra dI pa kA ya swA hA/ sgra gcan hUM gis 'bar bar bya/ /oM hoH sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+mA badzrA mr-i ta ka ra sar+b+ba d+ha r+m+mA na badzra a mr-i ta ku ru ku ru swA hA/ dus me hoHyis bdud rtsir bsam/ /rang nyid lce rtse hUM yig las/ /rdo rje gyur te 'od 'phros pas/ /bdud rtsi bkug ste myangs par

bsam/ oM sar+b+ba bI ra yo gi nI pra Na yA mi swA hA/ gtsug tor steng du paM las ni/ /zla ba'i gdan la rdo rje dkar/ /bam gyis mtshan pa zhi rgyas la/ /las gzhan dag pa nye sogs sbyar/ /oM AHhUM hoHhaM k+ShaHpra dz+nyo pA ya/ At+ma ka kA ya bA k+ci t+ta dz+nyAn/ a d+hi pa ti/ ma ma kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzrAM badzrA

mr-i taM swa b+hA baM/ ku ru ku ru skan+d+ha d+hA tu ya tA nAM ni swab+hA baM swA hA/ rdo rje la sogs zhu ba'i chus/ /lus kyi dri ma thams cad dor/ /zhi ba zla ba lta bur dkar la dag par bsgom/ /las gzhan rang rang kha dog go/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+maHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho \u0f85haM/ des dag pa'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /kha

la sogs pa dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gnyis pa'o// //bdag nyid dus 'khor zhal gcig pa/ /phyag gnyis yum dang ldan pa yi/ /dpral bar oM las snang mtha' yas/ /mgrin par AHlas rin 'byung bsam/ /snying gar hUM las don yod grub/ lte bar hoHlas rnam

snang mdzad/ /gtsug tor haM las mi bskyod pa/ /gsang bar k+ShaHlas rdo rje sems/ /rigs drug po ni dgod par bya/ /a i r-i u l-i a e ar al ha ya ra wal/ lag g.yon sor mo'i tshigs gsum la'o/ /lA wA rA yA hA/ A la au Ar ai AH l-I U r-I I A/

g.yas pa'i sor mo tshigs gsum la dgod/ oM hraHsar+b+ba ShaDa rA dzA mA ra kle sha an+d+ha ka ra/ badzra tI k+ShaN duHkha ts+tshe da ma ma kar bi shud+d+hA ya swA hA/ lag pa'i yi ge rdo rjer gyur/ /oM AHhUM hoHhaM k+ShaH/ kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta a d+hi pa ti/ badzra kA ya ma ma kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta dz+nyA na badzra badzra kA ya swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru

swA hA/ mdzes pa'i phyag rgya kun du reg /rdo rje'i rang bzhin lus su bsam/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta badzra kA ya swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rdo rje'i lus kyi nga rgyal bya'o/ /bdag dag par bya ba'i yan lag ste gsum pa'o// //de nas lag pa thal sbyar te/ /oM h+r+lAM hr-i da ya na ma/ oM h+r+lAM shi ri si wo ShaT/

oM h+r+l-IM shi kha ya wa ShaT/ oM h+r+luM ka ba tsa ya hUM/ oM hraM Ne tra bau ShaT/ oM hraHaSh+Ta a phaT/ go cha dang ni mtshon cha'o/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya shi ra si si khaHka ba tsanai tra aSh+Ta badzra Sha DAM ga swa b+hAM bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes pa'i sngags kyi nga rgyal bya'o/ /go cha'i yan lag ste bzhi pa'o// //

rang gi snying gar paM las ni/ /pad+ma AH las zla ba'i steng / /hUM las rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ /'od zer lnga ldan phyogs bcur spro/ /bla ma dkyil 'khor rgyal sras rnams/ /spyan drangs mdun gyi mkha' la bzhugs/ /'od zer slar yang snying gar bsdu/ /zla dkyil ka sogs sde tshan drug /

ring thung brtsegs pa bcu gnyis las/ /mchod rdzas lha mor gyur pa spro/ /oM ts+tsha badzra gan+d+he gan+d+ha artsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM ts+tsh+dz+h+nyA badzra mA le mA la a rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM T+Th+D+h+na badzra hUM pe d+hU pe d+hU pa a rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM T+Th+D+h+na badzra pra dI pe pra dI pa a rtsa naM ku ru ku swA hA/ oM p+ph+p+ph+h+ma badzra mr-i te

nai bi d+ya pU dzI ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM p+ph+b+b+h+mA badzra ak+Sha te ak+Sha ta pha la a rtsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+na badzra lA s+ya b+s+t+ra A ba ra Na pU dzI ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+nA badzra ha s+ye g+ha N+TA da R+sha pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+nga badzra wA d+ye wA d+ye pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM k+kh+g+g+hA badzra nr-i d+ye nri d+ya phU dzAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/

oM s+g+p+Sh+sh+th+ka badzra gI te gI ta pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM s+k+paSh+sh+th+kA badzra kA me sar+b+ba bu d+d+hA bo d+hi sat+bA nAM badzra su ra ta pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ sna tshogs mchod pa byas te sdig pa rnam pa mang po bshags bgyis la/ /sgrub pa pos ni lus dang ngag yid dang bas gsum

la gus su mchi bar bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' sna tshogs dge ba gang byas pa yi dge 'dun dang / /de dag kun la rjes su yi rang nas ni sdig bral byang chub spyod la rjes su 'jug /sangs rgyas rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor

bar bskul zhing mya ngan na mi 'da' bzhugs par gsol/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i 'jigs 'joms dag la byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi/ /'di ni sems can don phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub bdag 'gyur smon lam gdab par bgyi/ /bsod nams rtsa ba

gsum sogs dran/ /ye shes tshogs ni stong nyid bsgom/ /phyi nang snod bcud thams cad ni/ /dngos dang bral bas stong pa nyid/ /rgyu las 'das pas mtshan ma med/ /'bras bu med pas smon pa med/ /skye 'gag med pas 'dus ma byas/ /oM shu n+ya tA dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/

oM a ni mi t+ta dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM a pra ti ha ta dz+nyA na badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ka nya haM/ oM a na b+ha'i saM skA ra dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ /rang nyid thugs mtshan yi ge sogs/ /thig le'i bdag nyid skar mda' bzhin/ /rim pas bsdus te 'dzin med par/ /se chu me rlung nam mkha'i

khams/ /rang bzhin zhugs pas yul dang bral/ /kun gzhi rnam shes 'od gsal bsgom/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta shU nya tA dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ de yis nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o/ /tshogs gnyis bsags pa'i yan lag ste lnga pa'o// //de nas stong nyid ngang las ni/ /

nyi steng sna tshogs rdo rje dang / /rdo rje'i dra gur rtsibs bcu yi/ /lte ba a las chos 'byung ngo / h+k+Sh+m+l+W+r+ya/ hUM yaM hUM/ hUM raM hUM/ hUM baM hUM/ hUM laM hUM/ hUM maM hUM/ hUM k+ShaM hUM/ hUM haM hUM/ rlung gnag zlum po rgyal mtshan can/ /me dmar gru gsum g.yung drung mtshan/ /chu dkar zlum po

pad+mas mtshan/ /sa ser gru bzhi 'khor los mtshan/ /de dag steng dang 'og tu yang / /sna tshogs rdo rje'i rgya gram mo/ /de steng lhun po kha khyer ldan/ /nyi zla pad+ma sgra gcan bcas/ /de steng oM maM b+h+rUM las ni/ /gzhal yas khang brtsegs mchod rten ni/ /rin chen rang bzhin gru bzhi ni/ /rin chen snam

bu pha gu dang / /dra ba dra phyed mda' yab dang / /sgo dang rta babs bcu gnyis dang / /re khA gsum dang lnga po gnyis/ /sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'o/ /snying po ye shes 'dab ma dag /rdo rje phreng bas bskor ba'o/ /phyi ma thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la/ /pad sogs ka ba bcu drug dang / /

chu skyes rdo rjer bas mdzes/ /lha yi snam bu dag gis bskor/ /de nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor la/ /chu skyes 'dab ma brgyad pa brgyad/ /pad+ma'i phreng bas yongs su bskor/ /phyi rol sku yi dkyil 'khor lha/ /pad 'dab bzhi brgyad bcu drug pa/ /bcu gnyis 'khor lo'i phreng bas

bskor/ /phyi rol gling ni bcu gnyis dang / /nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang / /chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che/ /rnga bo che dang byang chub shing / /rdo rje 'bar ba'i phreng bas bskor/ /dbus kyi pad+ma'i lte ba'i steng / /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan dang / /bdud dang drag po yab yum dang / /bdud ni gdong gcig kha

dog dmar/ /lag bzhi mda' dang lcags kyu g.yas/ g.yon pas gzhu dang zhags pa 'dzin/ /yum ni dga' mo dang bcas g.yas/ /drag po gdong gsum mdog dmar po/ /g.yon pas thod pa kha T+wAM 'dzin/ /u ma'i yum bcas g.yon du gdeng / /de steng mngon par byang chub pa/ /a

i r-i/ /u l-i/ a e ar o al/ ha ya ra wal oM AHlA bA rA yA ha/ A la au ar ai A/ l-I U r-I A+e A/ zla ba yi ges mtshan pa ste/ /me long ye shes dag pa'o/ /l+la w+Wa y+Ya d+da d+h+da l+la w+Wa r+ra y+Ya r+ra h+ha s+sa w+Wa Sh+Shash+sha Th+k+Th+ka/ t+ta th+tha d+da d+h+d+ha n+na/ p+pa p+pha b+ba b+h+b+ha m+ma/ T+Ta Th+Tha D+Da D+h+D+ha

N+Na/ ts+tsa tsh+tsha dz+dza dz+h+dz+ha ny+nya/ k+ka kh+kha g+ga g+h+g+ha ng+nga/ nga g+ha ga kha ka/ /nya dz+ha dza tsha tsa/ Na D+ha Da Tha Ta/ ma b+ha ba pha pa/ na d+ha da tha ta/ Th+ka sha Sha k+pas/ la bar ya ha/ la wa ya Da D+ha/ nyi ma yi ges mtshan pa 'og /mnyam nyid ye shes gnyis pa'o/ /khar ka du dri za'i yi ge hUM/ /so so rtog

pa gsum pa'o/ /hi yig gcig gyur rdo rjer gyur/ /bya grub ye shes bzhi pa'o/ /phaT kyi cha shas yongs su rdzogs/ /chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o/ /gtso bo sku mdog sngon po la/ /kha dog phyogs bzhi dag tu gsungs/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni nyer bzhi pa/ /mgrin gsum

zhabs gnyis brkyang bzhugs pa/ /dbus zhal mthing ga mche gtsigs drag /g.yas pa dmar po chags pa che/ /g.yon pa dkar po zhi ba'i zhal/ /rgyab ni ser po ting nge 'dzin bzhugs/ /ral pa'i thor tshugs bcu gnyis spyan/ /sna tshogs rdo rje zla ba phyed dang / /rdo rje sems dpas dbu brgyan

pa'o/ /glang chen stag lpags na bza' can/ /mgrin gsum gnag dmar dkar po'o/ /dpung pa drug ni sngo dmar dkar/ /phyag ngar bcu gnyis de bzhin no/ /phyag mgo nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni/ /gnag dmar dkar po'i rim pa bzhin/ /mthe bong la sogs sor mo bcu/ /ser dkar

dmar gnag snga bzhin no/ /tshigs kyi phreng bsngo dmar dkar/ /rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum dang / /gri gug mda' dang lcags kyu dang / /Da ru tho ba 'khor lo ma dung / /dbyug pa dgra sta g.yas pas 'dzin/ /dril bu phub dang kha T+wAM ga /thod pa gzhu dang zhags pa dang / /rin chen pad dkar

dung dang ni/ /me long lcags sgrog tshangs mgo g.yon/ /cod pan snyan cha mgul rgyan dang / /gdu bu dpung rgyan ska rags dang / /zhabs gdub rnams ni rdo rjes brgyan/ /mgo bo'i phreng bas do shal dang / /thal ba phreng ba gtsug nor bu/ /klu chen bcu yis de bzhin brgyan/ /g.yon dkar

g.yas dmar brkyang ba'i zhabs/ /yum ser zhal bzhi phyag brgyad ma/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgya ba zhal gnag /gri gug lcag skyu Da ma ru/ /phreng ba g.yas pas 'dzin par mdzad/ /thod pa zhags pa pad+ma dang / /rin chen nor bu g.yon na 'dzin/ /rgyan rnams gtso bo dag

dang mthun/ /g.yon brkyang gtso bo'i sku la 'khyud/ /de nas 'khor lo drug po la/ /oM AHhUM hoHhaM k+ShaHdgod/ /de nas 'gro drug sems can rnams/ /bkug nas dkyil 'khor de la gzhug /yab yum mkha' gsang byin brlabs te/ /snyoms 'jug sgra yis rnam snang sogs/ /nang

du bkug nas bzhugs par bsam/ /yab yum byang chub sems kyis ni/ /b+ha gar de la dbang bskur bya/ /sems can de rnams dkyil 'khor lha/ /zhal gsum phyag drug sogs su gyur/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i/ /mchog dga'i bde bas gang par bsam/ /k+Sha k+Shi k+Sh+R-i

k+Shu k+Sh+l-i/ k+ShA k+ShI k+Sh-I k+ShU k+Sh+l-I/ k+Sha k+She k+ShA ra k+Sho k+Sha la k+ShaMH/ k+ShA k+Shai k+ShAr k+Shau k+Sha la k+ShAMH/ k+Sh+ha k+Sh+ya k+Sh+Ra k+Sh+Wa k+Sh+la/ k+Sh+hA k+Sh+yA k+Sh+RA k+Sh+WA k+Sh+lA/ de sogs lus kyi dkyil 'khor lha/ /phyung la dkyil 'khor gzhug par bya/ /spyi mgrin snying gar oM AHhUM/ gtsug tor haM bsam lte ba ru/ /hoHlas gtum mo ye shes 'od/ /

rab 'bar gtso bo yab yum gnyis/ /bde chen 'od du zhu ba las/ /tshad med bzhi yi lha mo'i glus/ /'gro ba'i don du bzhengs pas bskul/ /spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i ma/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags

mdzod/ /bdag ni sring mo mA ma kI/ /rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod/ /gos dkar bdag ni bu mo ste/ /rnal 'byor pa yi skyes bu'i gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus

'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod/ /sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste/ /rnal 'byor pa yi dri med gnas/ /bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis/ /dus 'khor bzhengs la bdag chags mdzod/ /lha mos glu mdzad bcom ldan khyod/ /sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/ /rdo rje can gyis

bdag bsrung mdzod/ /lha mo'i bla mas 'dod can 'dod pa mdzad don bzhengs/ /de ltar bskul ba gsan nas ni/ /chos sku stong pa'i rang bzhin las/ /mig 'phrul lta bur bzhengs mdzad de/ /hUM phreM spro zhing bskul bas zhu/ /rdo rje dang ni gri gug hUM du 'gyur/ /de bzhin gtso

bo yab yum bzhengs/ /de nas 'khor gyi lha spror phyir/ /rdo rje pad+mar byin brlabs la/ /thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug sgras/ /chos kyi dbyings nas sangs rgyas rnams/ /bkug la yab kyi zhal du thim/ b+ha ga gnas brgyud yum gyis ni/ /pad+mar zhugs te b+ha gar brgyud/ /yum gyi zhal

nas yab zhal du/ /zhugs nas yab kyi rdo rje nas/ /sa bon yul gyi pad+ma ru/ /yi ge spros nas phyogs phyogs gnas/ /de nas phyag mtshan de las sku/ /de la phyir spros gdan la dgod/ /a dang rdo rje las gyur pa/ /mi bskyod zhal gsum phyag drug sngo/ /spros nas slar yang gtso la

thim/ /rdo rje dbyings phyug sku mdog sngo/ /spros nas slar yang gtso mor thim/ /snying po ye shes 'khor lo yi/ /chu skyes 'dab brgyad zla ba'i steng / a A aM aHha hA khaM haH/ lha mo zhal bzhi phyag brgyad de/ /shar du nag mo 'bar ma ste/ /sku dang mdun gyi zhal mthun gnag /g.yas

dmar g.yon dkar rgyab ser zhal/ /spos dang tsan+dan gur gum snod/ /glu ba ga bur ldan snod g.yas/ /dril bu pad+ma lha shing gi /me tog dang ni phreng ba g.yon/ /nub tu ser 'bar mdun zhal ser/ /g.yas dkar g.yon dmar rgyab sngon zhal/ /dung dang nor bu gling bu dang / /Da ma ru ni phyag

g.yas na/ /pi wang rgyud mangs dang ni mda'/ /dril bu khrol ba rang g.yon na/ /byang du dkar 'bar dbus zhal dkar/ /g.yas ga nag g.yon ser rgyab zhal dmar/ /'o ma'i snod dang chu snod dang / /lha yi sman dang chang snod g.yas/ /bdud rtsi'i snod dang grub pa'i bcud/ /a ru ra dang

'bras zan g.yon/ /lho ru dmar 'bar dbus zhal dmar/ /g.yas ser g.yon sngo rgyab dkar zhal/ /mar me mu tig do shal dang / cod pan gdu bu phyag g.yas na/ na bza' dang ni ski+u regs dang / rna cha dang ni rkang rgyan g.yon/ /shar lhor du ba na ga mo dang / /nub byang mar me

ser mo dang / /byang shar mkha' gsal dkar mo dang / /lho nub smig rgyu dmar po bzhi/ /zhal ni phyogs bzhi'i lha mo mtshungs/ /phyag brgyad thams cad rnga yab bsnams/ /mnyam brkyang ba yi stabs kyis bzhugs/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yab/ /yum ni pad+ma'i bzhugs stabs

so/ /mtshams kyi gru chad bzhi dag la/ /oM AHhUM hoH/ chos kyi dung dkar byang shar du/ /gaN+DI dmar po lho nub mtshams/ /shar lhor yid bzhin nor bu gnag /dpag bsam shing ser byang nub bo/ /'dod ma log ma bdun cu gnyis/ /phyogs na bco brgyad 'gyid bag can/ /

'khyud pa'i stobs kyis phyag sbrel nas/ /kha khyer la gnas mchod par byed/ /de nas thugs kyi pad+ma la/ /phyogs la nyi ma'i gdan dag la/ /i r-i yu l-i/ shar du don yod grub pa gnag /lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan dmar/ /byang du snang ba mtha' yas dkar/ /nub tu rnam par snang

mdzad ser/ /mtshams su zla ba'i gdan dag la/ /I r-I U l-I/ shar lhor sgrol ma nag mo ste/ /lho nub gos dkar mo ni dmar/ /byang shar mA ma kI ni dkar/ /byang nub sangs rgyas spyan ni ser/ /rdo rje skyil mo krung gis yab/ /yum ni pad+ma'i bzhugs stabs so/ /hi hI hri hr-I hu hU h+l-i

h+l-I haM hAH/ de rnams bar brgyad bum par brgyad/ /steng 'og gnyis dang bum dkar bcu'o/ /sgo bzhi nyi ma'i gdan dag la/ /yaM raM waM laM/ yaHraHwaHlaH/ shar du bgegs dgra brtson 'grus gnag /lho sgor shes rab dzaM b+ha dmar/ /byang du pad+ma nga rgyal dkar/ /nub tu gshin rje rengs

ma ser/ /khro bo g.yas brkyang khro mo bzlog /khyams la sems dpa' nyi ma'i gdan/ /a e ar o al aM/ shar smad nam mkha'i snying po gnag /shar stod kun du bzang po sngo/ /lho smad sa yi snying po dmar/ /byang smad spyan ras gzigs dbang dkar/ /nub smad sgrib pa rnam sel ser/ /

lho stod phyag na rdo rje sngo/ /sems ma rnams la zla ba'i gdan/ /A ai Ar oM A la AH/ byang stod sgra yi rdo rje ljang / /shar lhor reg gi rdo rje gnad// lho nub ro yi rdo rje dmar/ /byang shar gzugs kyi rdo rje dkar/ /nub byang dri yi rdo rje ser/ /nub stod chos dbyings rdo rje sngo/ de rnams zhal dang

phyag mtshan ni/ /dbus sngo g.yas dmar g.yon dkar zhal/ /rdo rje gri gug dgra sta g.yas/ /dril bu thod pa tshangs mgo g.yon/ /dbus nag g.yas dmar g.yon ser zhal/ /ral gri gri gug rtse gsum g.yas/ /phub dang thod pa kha TI g.yon/ /dbus dmar g.yas

dkar g.yon gnag zhal/ /mda' dang cang te'u lcags kyu g.yas/ /gzhu dang zhags pa rin chen g.yon/ /dbus dkar g.yas gnag g.yon dmar zhal/ /tho ba mdung dang rtse gsum g.yas/ /pad+ma me long phreng ba g.yon/ /dbus ser g.yas dkar g.yon sngo zhal/ /'khor lo dbyug pa rdo rje

g.yas/ /dung dang lcags sgrog dril bu g.yon/ /yab yum yul la bsams pa ni/ /'du byed gzugs ni gnyis med yab yum ste/ /'du shes tshor ba de bzhin no/ /sna dang dri yin mig dang gzugs/ /lce dang ro yin reg dang lus/ /rna ba sgra yin sems dang chos/ /bgegs mthar

byed dang rengs byed yong / /shes rab mthar byed nga rgyal can/ /pad+ma mthar byed rmugs byed ma/ /gshin rje mthar byed brtson 'grus ma/ /yab bzhugs de ru yum 'khyud cing / /yum bzhugs ru yab 'khyud pa'o/ /kha khyer mchod pa'i lha mo dang / /'dod lha bdun cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de

nas gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shar gyi ro steng pad+ma la/ /ha hi ya yi y+R-i hi yu y+l-i yaM/ /dbus su rgan byad pad 'dab la/ /'jigs ma drag ma dus mche ma/ /'bar zhal rlung shugs rab tu gtum/ /drag chen sna chen brgyad kyis bskor/ /zhal gcig spyan gsum phyag bzhi pa/ /

nag mo gri gug rtse gsum g.yas/ /thod pa kha T+wAM g.yon na'o/ /shar lho mkha' lding pad+ma la/ /k+ShA k+ShI ya yI y+r-I k+Sha yU y+l-I yAH/ /lte bar khyab 'jug pad+ma la/ /dpal ldan sgyu ma grags ma dang / /dpal mo dang dpal rgyal rnam rgyal mo/ /rgyal byed dpal ldan 'khor lo can/ /nag mo 'khor lo

dbyug to g.yas/ /pad+ma dung ni g.yon na'o/ /lho ru ma he pad+ma'i steng / /ha hr-i r-i rI dr-i hr-i ru rl-i raM/ /lte bar phag mo 'dab mal/ /keng rus dus mtshan rab khro'i gdong / /dus kyi lce ma gtsigs ma dang / /dus ma mi bzad lus ngan ma/ /dmar mo dbyug pa ral gri g.yas/ /mdung thung lcags kyu

g.yon na'o/ /lho nub rma bya pad steng na/ /k+ShAHk+Sh+R-i rA r-I r-I r+r-I k+Sh+R-I rU rl-I rAH/ lte bar gzhon nu ma 'dab la/ /pad+ma lus med gzhon nu ma/ /ri dgas bdag 'gro rin chen phreng / /mig bzangs rul ma bzang mos bskor/ /dmar mo mdung thung lcags kyu g.yas/ /rin chen zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /

byang du khyu mchog pad steng du/ /haM hu wa wi w+Ra hu wu lb-I/ lte bar drag mo 'dab ma la/ dkar mo ga gA rtag ma dang / /myur ma dang ni thig le mchog /dpal skyong ser skya nag mos bskor/ /dkar mo rtse gsum cang te'u g.yas/ /kha T+wAM sbrul la zhags g.yon na'o/ /byang shar seng ge pad+ma'i

steng / /k+ShaM k+Shu wA wI w+rA k+Shu wU w+l-I wA/ dbus su dpal chen 'dab ma la/ /dkar dpal zla ba'i ri mo dang / /zla zhal ngang mdog 'dzin ma dang / /pad+ma'i dbang phyug sgrol ma'i mig /dri med ri bong 'dzin mas bskor/ /dkar mo pad+ma bgrang phreng g.yas/ /g.yon na me tog rin chen no/ /nub

tu glang chen pad+ma'i steng / /hA h+l-I lA l-I r+r-I h+l-I lU l+l-I lAM/ lte bar dbang po'i 'dab ma la/ /rdo rje'i 'od dang rdo rje'i lus/ /gser can ma dang 'dod dbang ma/ /ri mo 'dri dang rtsom ma dang / zug rngu med ma sgrol ma bzang / /ser mo rdo rje mda' ni g.yas/ /dril bu gzhu ni g.yon na'o/ /byang
nub ngang pa pad+ma'i steng / /k+ShA h+lA lA r+r-I

steng 'og shing rta la/ /haM hAH ha hAH/ shar sgor gtsug tor byang drag spyan/ /zhal gcig phyag bzhi sku mdog sngo/ /dgra sta rtse gsum g.yas gnyis na/ /sbrul la zhags kha T+wAM g.yon na'o/ /lho ru sngon mo nub suM b+ha/ /ljang gu gri gug rdo rje g.yas/ /thod pa dril bu g.yon na'o/ /'dod log bdun

cu rtsa gnyis po/ /kha khyer la gnas mchod pa byed/ /de nas sku yi dkyil 'khor gyi/ /shar smad ro steng pad gdan la/ /nya nyi ny+R-i nyu nyal-i nyaM/ dz+ha dz+hi dz+h+r-i dz+hu dz+hal-i dz+haM/ dzaM dzi dz+RiMdza dz+l-i dzaM/ tsha tshi tsh+Ra tsh+l-itshu/ tsa tsits+R-i tsu ts+l-i tsu/ dbus su bden bral dzI rdo rje/ /'dab mar rim par nya rdo rje/ /nyi rdo rje dang ni dzo rdo rje/ /
nyu rdo rje dang ni ny+li rdo rje/ /nyaM rdo rje dang dz+ha rdo rje/ /dz+h-i rdo rje dang dz+h+r-i

tsA tsI ts+r-I tsU ts+l-I tsaH/ tshA tshI tsh+r-I tshU tsh+l-i tshAH/ dzA dzI dz-I dzU dz+l-I dzAH/ dz+hA dz+hI dz+h+r-I dz+hU dz+h-I dz+h+lA dz+haMH/ nyA nyI ny+r-I nyU ny+l-I nyAH/ dbus su rlung lha dzr-I rdo rje/ /tsA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /nag po dpag bsam me tog g.yas/ /in+d+ra nI la ut+pal g.yon/ /lho smad lug dang pad+ma'i steng / /Na Ni N+r-i Nu N+l-i naM/ D+ha D+hi D+h+ri D+hu D+h+l-i D+haM/ Da

Di D+r-i Du D+l-i D+thaM/ Tha Thi Th+r-i Thu Th+l-i ThaM/ Ta Ti T+r-i Tu T+l-i TaM/ lte bar me lha D+hi rdo rje/ /Na rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /dmar po mdung dang dbyug pa g.yas/ /pad+ma ril ba spyi blugs g.yon/ /lho nub rma bya pad+ma'i steng / TA TI T+r-I TU T+l-I TAH/ ThA ThI Th+r-I ThU Th+l-I ThAH/ DA DI D+rI DU D+l-I DAH/ D+hA D+hI D+h+r-I D+hU D+h+l-I D+hAH/ NA NI N+r-I NU N+l-I

NAH/ dbus su gdong drug D+h+r-I rdo rje/ /TA rdo rje sogs sum cu'o/ /dmar po pad+ma mdung thung g.yas/ /rin po che dang me long g.yon/ /byang smad chu srin pad+ma'i steng / /ma mi mr-i mu m+l-i maM/ b+ha b+hi b+h+r-i b+hu b+h+l-i b+haM/ ba bi br-i bu bl-i baM/ pha phi phr-i phu ph+l-i phaM/ pa pi pr-i pu p+l-i paM/ lta bar rgya mtsho br-i rdo rje/ /

ma rdo rje sogs sum cu'o/ /dkar po zhags pa rin chen g.yas/ /klu zhags chu shel g.yon na'o/ /byang shar byi ba pad+ma'i steng / /pA pI pr-I pU p+l-I pAH/ phA phI phr-I phU ph+l-I phAH/ bA bI br-I bU bl-I bAH/ b+hA b+hI b+h+r-I b+hU b+h+l-I b+hAH/ mA mI mr-I mU m+l-I mAH/ lte ba tshogs bdag pr-i rdo rje/ /pA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /

dkar po dgra sta rdo rje g.yas/ /zhags pa rin chen nor bu g.yon/ /nub smad glang chen pad+ma'i steng / /na ni nr-i nu n+l-i naM/ d+ha d+hi d+h+r-i d+hu d+h+l-i d+haM/ da di dr-i du d+l-i daM/ tha thi thr-i thu th+l-i thaM/ ta ti tr-i tu t+l-i taM/ lte bar brgya byin dr-i rdo rje/ /na rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /ser po g.yas pa rdo rje mda'/ /dril

bu gzhu ni g.yon na'o/ /nub byang ngang pa pad+ma'i steng / /tA tI tr-I tU t+l-I tAH/ thA thI thr-I thU th+l-I thAH/ dA dI dr-I dU d+l-I dAH/ d+hA d+hI d+h+r-I d+hU d+h+lI d+hAH/ nA nI n+d-I nU n+l-I nAH/ lte bar tshangs pa drI rdo rje/ /tA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /ser po khab dang bgrang phreng g.yas/ /pad+ma ril ba spyi blugs g.yon/ /shar stod

mkha' lding pad+ma'i steng / /da ngi dr-i du d+l-i ngaM / g+ha g+hi g+h+r-i g+hu g+h+l-i g+haM/ ga gi gr-i gu gl-i gaM/ kha khi khr-i khu kh+l-i khaM/ ka ki kr-i ku kl-i kaM/ /lte bar khyab 'jug gr-i rdo rje/ /nga rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /sngon po 'khor lo dbyug to g.yas/ /pad+ma lnga skyes dung ni g.yon/ /lho stod ma he pad+ma'i steng / /

kA kI kr-I kU kl-I kAH/ khA khI khr-I khU kh+l-I khAH/ gA gI gr-I gl-I gAH/ g+hA g+hI g+h+r-I g+hU g+h+l-I g+hAH/ ngA ngI ng+r-I ng+l-I ngAH/ lte bar gshin rje gr-I rdo rje/ /kA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /sngon po dbyug pa ral gri g.yas/ /lcags sgrog zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /byang stod khyu mchog pad+ma'i steng / /Th+ka Th+ki Th+k+r-i

ku kl-i kaM/ sha shi shr-i shu sh+lau shaM/ Sha Shi Sh+r-i Shu Sh+l-i ShaM/ pa pi pr-i pu p+l-i paM/ sa si sr-i su sl-i saM/ lte bar drag po shr-i rdo rje/ /ka rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /ljang gu g.yas pa rtse gsum mda'/ /g.yon pa sbrul bcas kha T+wAM gzhu/ /nub stod glang po pad+ma'i steng / /sA sa'i sr-I sU sl-I sAH/

pA pA pr-I pU p+l-I pAH/ ShA ShI Sh+r-I ShU Sh+l-I ShAH/ shA shI shr-I shU sh+l-I shAH/ kA kA kr-I kU kl-I kAH/ lte bar gnod sbyin Sh+r-I rdo rje/ /sA rdo rje sogs sum cu po/ /sngon po rin chen be con g.yas/ /ne'u le rgyal pa pad+ma g.yon/ /rdo rje skyil krung phyed par bzhugs/ /shar sgor phag gi shing rta dang / /lho

sgor rta dang byang seng ge /nub sgor glang chen shing rta'o/ /yaM raM wa laM/ laHwaH raH yaH// lcags sgrog ma dang dbyug sngon shar/ /nag mo ral gri rdo rje g.yas/ /phub dang sbrul zhags g.yon na'o/ /khro gnyer can dang 'dod rgyal lho/ /dmar po mda' dang lcags kyu g.yas/ /gzhu

dang zhags pa g.yon na'o/ /skul byed ma dang mi g.yo byang / /dkar mo thob ma dung g.yas na/ /pad+ma me long g.yon na'o/ /'od zer can dang stobs chen nub/ /ser mo 'khor lo dbyug pa g.yas/ /dung dang rin chen g.yon na'o/ /khro mo'i stabs ni sngar bshad zin/ /kha khyer la ni 'od

ldog go/ /rta babs ka ba brgyad kyi 'og/ /phyi rol 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor la/ /h+ya h+yA hra hrA hwa hwA h+la h+lA/ nag mo stobs rgyu pad+ma shar/ /dmar mo nor rgyas dung skyong lho/ /dkar po mtha' yas rigs ldan byang / /ser po 'jog po pad chen nub/ /bdud rtsi bum pa rdo rje g.yas/ /pad+ma rin chen

g.yon na'o/ /de nas dur khrod ming dang gdan/ /shar du rtse gsum bse yi gdan/ /shar lhor mi bzad b+hi ru N+Da/ /lho ru ro bsreg dom gyi gdan/ /byang du rus sbal g.yag gi gdan/ /byang shar byis shir pha wang gdan/ /nub tu rul ba'i drir seng ge /nub byang rus

sbal zos mig sngon/ /de rnams steng du 'khor lo yi/ /k+kh+g+g+h+nga ts+tsh+dz+dz+h+nya l+W+r+y+k+Sha T+Th+D+D+h+Na l+W+r+y+ha p+ph+b+b+h+ma s+p+Sh+sh+ka t+th+d+d+h+na/ /khyi gdong bya rog gdong ma gnag /phag gdong bya rgod gdong ma dmar/ /stag gdong 'ug gdong ma gnyis dkar/ /ce spyang mkha' lding gdong ma ser/ /phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa bsnams/ /rol ba'i

stabs kyis gnas pa'o/ /rgan byad brgya byin yab/ yum yin/ /phag mo rgya mtsho yab yum mo/ /dbang mo bden bral yab yum mo/ /drag mo me lha yab yum mo/ /khyab 'jug ma dang tshangs ba mo/ /gdong drug ma dang tshogs bdag mo/ /khyab 'jug

dang ni nor sbyin mo/ /gshin rje dang ni chu ma'o/ /nor sbyin ma dang khyab 'jug ma/ /rgya mtsho dang ni gshin rje mo/ /phan tshun 'khyud pa sngar bzhin bshad/ /pad+ma ce sbyang yab yum yin/ /stobs kyi rgyu dang mkha' lding gdong / /nor rgyas klu dang stag gdong ma/ /dung skyong

klu dang 'ug gdong ma/ /mtha' yas klu dang phag gdong ma/ /rigs ldan klu dang bya rgod gdong / /'jog po klu dang khyi gdong ma/ /pad+ma che dang bya rog gdong / /yab yum sngar bshad bzhin du'o/ /gzhan yang dur khrod brgyad po ni/ /ma mo klu dang srin dang bcu/ /phyogs skyong zhing skyong zhing chen

gza'/ /ri me lha chen mchod rten dang / /rnal 'byor dpa' bo brgyad brgyad sogs/ /ro dang ce spyang dur khrod sogs/ /lo zla zhag dus rgyu skar sogs/ /dga' byed dril rna nag po che/ /b+h+r-i d+gi ri ti zhing skyong dang / /pho nya 'phrog ma grub pa sogs/ /bye ba phrag ni phyed dang bzhi'o/ /sngar gyi

kha khyer 'dod log ni/ /tsaHtshaHdzaH dz+haHnyaHTaHThaHDaHD+haH NaHpaHphaHbaHb+haHmaHtaHthaH daHd+haHnaH/ shar stod/ saHwaH ShaHshaHkaHlaHwaHraHyaHkaHkhaHgaHg+haHngaHh+kaHhaHk+ShaH/ nyaM dz+haM dzaM tshaM tsaM/ NaM D+haM DaM ThaM TaM/ maM b+haM baM phaM baM/ naM d+haM daM thaM taM/ kaM shaM ThaM waM saM/ yaM raM waM laM/ daM g+haM

gaM khaM kaM/ k+ShaM haM h+kaM/ gsod 'dod sdang 'dod khengs 'dod ma/ /rgyal 'dod rengs 'dod skyed 'dod ma/ /rol mo 'dod dang rgyan 'dod ma/ /bza' ba 'dod dang dri 'dod ma/ /gos 'dod 'khrig pa 'dod pa mo/ /'phrug 'dod kha chu spang 'dod ma/ /yan lag dri 'dod gar 'dod ma/ /gdan

'dod 'o thug 'dod ma dang / /stan la nyal 'dod rgyal srid 'dod/ /'gyod 'dod 'ching 'dod tshig 'jam 'dod/ /skam 'dod skrod 'dod reg 'dod ma/ /'gugs par 'dod dang 'ching bar 'dod/ /phur bus 'debs 'dod 'dod ma'o/ /yan lag thams cad 'phrug bzhed ma/ /dri chen dri chu

gtong bzhed ma/ /sems can bslu 'dod rtsod 'dod ma/ /lhag ma za 'dod g.yul 'dod ma/ /bcings bzhed byis pa khro bzhed do/ /'dod pa log pa log ma ste/ /gsod log zhe sdang log sogs sbyar/ /thabs kyang shugs kyis shes bar bya/ /gzhan yang zad par bcu dag ni/ /

thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyi ru bsrung / /gza' bcu gsung gi phyi ru ste/ /bum pa klu dang rab gtum gyi/ /steng 'og lha yang rta babs la'o/ /oM su bi shud+d+ha d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes bya bas lha'i nga rgyal bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i yan lag ste drug pa'o// //de nas ye

shes gzhug pa ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag dgyes pa'i mchog /sras bzangs grogs dang 'khor dang rtsa lag bcas/ /lha dang lha mo'i tshogs ni mang pos bskor/ /sangs rgyas yab yum bcas pa dgongs su gsol/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHhi/ rang nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni/ /rdo rje hUM dang ldan

pa la/ /dzaHlas rdo rje shugs khro bo/ /zhal bzhi phyag ni nyi shu drug /mdog rgyan phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhin/ /nag po ser po'i phyag lhag gnyis/ /glang chen pags pa gyon pa bzung / /rkang brgyad shing rta la chibs nas/ /chos dbyings bzhugs pa'i ye shes sems/ /lte bar rdo rje lcags kyu

yis/ /bzung la nga ros spyan drang ngo / /hUM las shes rab mthar byed kyis/ /rdo rje thogs te gzhug par mdzad/ /baM las gshin rje mthar byed kyis/ /zhags pa thogs te gcig tu byas/ /hoHlas pad+ma mthar byed kyis/ /dril bu thogs te mnyes par byas/ /hi las bgegs ni mthar byed kyis/ /dbyug

pas gnyis med ro mnyam byas/ /de nas sngon bzhin lha mo rnams/ /spros la mchod bstod mnyes bar byas/ /hrA hrI hr-I hUM h+l-I hA/ mig dang rna ba sna dang lce/ /lus yid go cha'i lha yis brgyan/ /de nas gnas gsum byin gyis brlab/ /dpral bar zla steng cho ga gsum/ /sku

yi rdo rje yab yum bskyed/ /dbus dkar g.yas gnag g.yon dmar zhal/ /'khor lo rdo rje pad+ma g.yas/ /ral gri dril bu rin chen g.yon/ /spros nas phyogs bcur gang bar bsam/ /sems can kun 'dul don mdzad nas/ /tshur 'dus mdun bzhugs gsol ba gdab/ /oM a b+hi Shi ny+tsa n+tu

mAM kA ya badzra d+ha ra/ de nas sku rigs lha mo rnams/ /shel bum bdud rtsis bkang ba yis/ /bdag la dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /thob nas dpral ba'i zla ba la/ /sku yi rdo rje zhugs nas ni/ /byin gyis brlab cing 'di skad brjod/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sku 'chang ba/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag /

ded bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /sku yi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /sku yi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /dpral bar zla steng oM dkar bsgom/ /mgrin par nyi mchog gsum/ /

gsung gi rdo rje yab yum bsgom/ /dbus dmar g.yas dkar g.yon gnag zhal/ /pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo g.yas/ /rin chen dril bu 'khor lo g.yon/ /spro bsdu sngar bzhin gsol ba gdab/ /oM a b+hi Shi ny+tsa n+tu mAM badzra badzri na/ sngar bzhin dbang bskur mgrin gnas pas/ /dpal ldan rdo rje gsung

'chang ba/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /gsung gi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /gsung gi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /mgrin par nyi ma

AHdmar bsgom/ /snying gar sgra gcan cho ga gsum/ /thugs kyi rdo rje yab yum bskyed/ /dbus gnag g.yas dmar g.yon dkar zhal/ /rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma g.yas/ /dril bu rin chen ral gri g.yon/ /spro bsdu sngar bzhin gsol ba gdab/ /oM a b+hi Shi ny+tsa n+tu mAM tsi t+ta badzri na/ sngar bzhin

dbang bskur thugs kar bzhugs/ /dpal ldan rdo rje thugs 'chang ba/ /mi phyed rdo rje gsum gyi dngos/ /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ /rdo rje mi phyed gsum gyi bdag /deng bdag byin gyis brlabs

nas su/ /thugs kyi rdo rje mdzad du gsol/ /thugs kar sgra gcan hUM nag bsgom/ /de nas gsum la rigs drug ste/ /lte ba gsang ba gtsug tor du/ /ka hoHswa haM ni dgod par bya/ /'khor rnams la yang de bzhin no/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA k+tsi t+ta badzra swa b+hA bA t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes pas nga

rgyal gzung bar bya'o/ /byin gyis brlabs pa'i yan lag ste bdun pa'o// //thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor mdun du bzhugs/ oM hi hAM hi hAM hr-i hr-I huM hUM h+l-iM h+l-IM/ oM A I t-I U l-I badzra D+ki n+yo badzrA mr-i ta ga Tai rA b+hI Shi ny+tsaM tu mAM swA hA/ oM AM i r-iM uM l-iM sarba bud+d+haH badzra mu ku TaM

ma ma pa ny+tsa bud+d+ha A t+ma kaM pan+d+ha yan+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM a AH aM aH ha hA haM hAH phreM ho sarba pA ra mi ta ma mA badzra pa TAM pan+d+ha yan+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM hoHdz+nyAn bidz+nyAn swa b+hA be kA ru Na pra dz+nyA A t+ma ko badzra badzra g+haN+Ta sa bye ta ra ka ra yo ma ma badzras twa/ sa pra dz+nyo da d+n+tu huM hUM phaT/ oM a A/ e ai/ a ra A ra/ o

au/ a la A la/ aM aHsarba bo d+hi sa twa/ saM b+hA R+YA/ sarba ka rmo ba b+ho ga badzra pra taM ma ma da dan+tu swA hA/ oM ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA sarba kro d+ha rA dzaHsaM b+hA R+YA mai tri kA ru Na mu di to pa k+Sha sa ma ta swa haM baM/ badzra pU rwaM ga maM nA ma me dang n+tu huM huM hUM phaT/ oM e waM e waM pad+ma badzra rtsi h+no pa ny+dzo pa ya n+tu mA lA

ad+hi pa ti badzra su kha dz+nyAn aM ga dz+nyAn me da da n+tu huM hUM phaT/ dbang bdun gsol ba gdab pa'o/ /oM A I r-I U l-I pany+tsa d+hA tu bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ cod pan rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan bskon/ /oM a a r-i u l-i pany+tsa ta thA ga ta pa ri shud+d+he swA hA/ oM a A aM aH ha hA haM haH phreM ho da sha pA ra mi ta pA ri pU ra Ne swA hA/

oM hUM hoH sU R+ya tsan+d+ra bi sho d+ha ka swA hA/ oM a A e ai ar A ra o au a la A la aM aH bi Sha ya i n+d+ra ya bi sho d+ha ni swA hA/ oM ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA tsa tur bra h+ma bi ha ra bi shud+d+he swA hA/ oM haM k+ShaHd+harma tsa kra pra b+r+d+ha ka swA hA/ zhes pas dbang bdun bskur bar bsam/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa p+ta a b+hi

Shi ka sta b+hU mi prA ste nya haM/ thob pa'i rgyal bzung ba'o/ /oM oM pra dz+nyo pa yau ka la sha a b+hi She ka ma mA da dA taM huM hUM phaT/ oM hUM pra dz+nyo pa yau badzra sa twa bi shwa mA ta ro pradz+nyA dz+nyA na a b+hi She kaM me da dA tAM huM hUM phaT/ zhes pas dbang gsum bskur bar gsol ba btab pas/ bdag tshul

bzhin du bum pa dang / /gsang dbang shes rab ye shes bskur/ /oM oM badzra sa twe na badzra ka la sha a b+hi She ke na a b+hi Shi k+to \u0f85haM badzra sa twa pu tro a tsa la b+hU mi la b+d+ho \u0f85haM/ oM AHoM badzra sa tre na gu h+ya a b+hi She ke na a b+hi Shi k+to badzra sa twa yu ba rA dzon ba b+hU mi la b+d+ho \u0f85haM/ oM nUM badzra sa twe na pra dz+nyA dz+nyAn na a b+hi She ke na a b+hi

Shi k+to nya haM dwi tI ya badzra d+ha ro nya haM d+harma me g+ha b+hU mi la b+d+ho \u0f85haM/ thob pa'i nga rgyal bzung ngo / /oM ho pra dz+nyA+o pa ya At+ma ko\u0f85haM badzra sa twa mu hA mu tra dz+nyAn a b+hi She kaM me pra ya ts+tsha oM AH hUM hoH phaT/ ces pas gsol ba gdab pa dang / /bla med dbang ni bskur bar bsam/ /oM haM d+harma r+hA twa a k+Sha ra tsa tu r+tha twa a b+hi She ka to

badzra sa twe na At+ma nA hi dwi tI yo dwA da sha b+hU mi la b+d+honya haM badzra twa ma hA ar+tha pa ra ma ak+Sha raHtrai lo kya bi dza yaHkA la tsa kra b+ha ga waM e baM kA raH/ zhes pas thob pa'i nga rgyal lo/ /de nas phyag rgya drug bcas la/ /oM haM haHbA ma da k+Shi Na kar+N+Na yor badzra kuN+Da li hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM AHka T+yaM ka N+The badzra me kha

lA badzra kaN+Tha ke hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a AHbA mad k+She Na ka ra yor badzra ru tsa ko huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM harA bA ma d+k+She Na pA da yor badzra nU pu re huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM baM pany+tsa ka ra ma hA shU n+ya tA swa b+hA ba badzra shi ro ma Ni shi ra si sarba aM ge b+hasma huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM Ar+d+ha na rI shwa ra badzra ar+d+ha tsan+d+ra badzra paT+Ta ur+d+ha huM hUM

phaT phaT/ oM a AH saM sarba swa rai ka tri swa ra swa b+hA ba badzra yadz+nyo pa bI ta ska n+d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bcas la/ /oM k+ShaH dur dA n+ta b+hi ma na k+Sha yaM ka ra bya g+ha tsa rma ka Tau huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+Sha triM shad swa ra sa p+ta ti hra swa dI r+g+ha bya ny+dza na swa b+hA ba dai h+ye ku la sha ta si ro b+hi ra mu N+Da mA la skan+d+hA ba laM bi ni skan+d+he huM hUM

khaD+ga hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra tri shU laM hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra ka rta ri hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra bA na hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra aM ku sha hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra Da ma ru ka hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra mu ngag ra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra tsa kra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra kun+ta hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+Ra badzra pa ra shu hUM phaT/

de nas g.yon gyi phyag rgya bca'/ /oM hwaM badzra g+N+DI ho heM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra khe Ta ho phreM phaT/ oM hwaM badzra kha T+waM ga ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra ka pA la ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra tsA pa ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pA sha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra r+t+na ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pad+ma ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra shaM kha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra A

daR+sha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzr-i shraM kha le ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM tsa tur be ta mu kha swa b+hA ba brah+ma shi ro ho phreM phaT/ de nas klu'i phyag rgya bca'/ /oM hUM badzra dza ya nA ga in+d+ra badzra dza TA mu ku Ta ban+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+ShuM badzra bi dza ya nA gen+d+ra badzra ban+d+he ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+yam d+yA badzra ka rko Ta ka badzra pad+mau bA ma

dak+Shi Na kuN+Da la yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hraM hrA badzra bA su ki shaM ba bA la bA ma da k+Shi Na ru tsa ka yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hwaM hwA badzra a na n+ta ku la kau me kha la kaN+Tha ka yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hwAM hwA badzra ta k+Sha ko ma hA pad+mo bA ma dak+Shi Na pA da nU pu ra yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ ces pas nga rgyal gzung

bar bya'o/ /dbang bskur ba'i yan lag ste brgyad pa'o// //sngar bshad lha mo bcu gnyis kyi/ /sngags brjod mchod pa dbul bar bya/ /oM AHhUM hrIHphaT/ sngon du mchod yon dbul ba ni/ oM pra bar sat+ka raM hA ra smin pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ de nas me tog la sogs dbul/ /rin chen

gser gyi me tog sna tshogs dri mchog spos sogs mar me dang / /dril bu me long bla re dang ni sna tshogs 'bras bu ba dan gar dang rol mo dang / /sna tshogs mchod pa byas te gzhan rnams bcu po bdag nus ji ltar gsungs bzhin dbul/ /bdud rtsi sngar bzhin byin bshad pa/ /hUM byung rdo rje'i lce yis myang / /

oM bud+d+hA ya na maH/ oM d+har+m+mA ya na maH/ oM saM g+hA ya na maH/ oM swa b+hA bi ka kA yA ya na maH/ oM d+har+m+ma kA yA ya na maH/ oM saM b+ho ga kA yA ya na maH/ oM ni r+m+ma Na kA yA ya na maH/ oM tsi t+ta badzrA ya na maH/ oM dz+nyAn badzrA ya na maH/ oM bA ka badzrA ya na maH/ oM kA ya badzrA ya na maH/ oM shAkya mu na ye na maH/

oM kA la tsa krA ya na maH/ oM badzra satwA ya na maH/ de bzhin lha yi sngags rnams la/ /na maHbtags la bdud rtsi myang / /srin lag dag gis mchod par bya/ /de nas snyan pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod/ /gang la thog mtha' dbus med gnas dang 'chi dang srid pa dang ni sgra dang dri ste ro dang

ni/ /reg bya gzugs dang sems te rang bzhin skyes bu med cing rtsa lag thar par byed pa med/ /sa bon gsal ba'i dus su ma lus srid pa ru ni bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin mi mnga' ba/ /mtshan med mya ngan 'das par bya ba bral zhing yon tan bral bde la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus dang sna tshogs la

sogs rdo rje dpe zla med cing skyes bu med cing spros pa med/ /brtsegs pa la gnas rna ba rna ba sna dang kha mig mgo bo lag pa rkang pa rnam kun du/ /'byung ba'i mtha' dang 'byung po'i mgon te gnas pa'i srid pa 'dzin zhing bya ba rnams kyi rgyu/ /rig pa dang po rnal 'byor gyis bgrod go 'phang mchog gi bde ba dus

'khor la 'dud do/ /skyes bu mdzad nus pa yi gzugs can dri med glog 'dra gzi brjid nyi ma bcu gnyis pa/ /ye shes rdo rje 'od zer mchog gi go 'phang la gnas tsheg drag de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkar po 'jig rten gsum mgon ri bong 'dzin pa las 'dzegs 'jig rten spyi bor yang dag bzhugs/ /

bdud rtsi 'chi ba sel zhing srid pa'i 'jigs pa 'joms pa thig le'i gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems tsam sngags kyi gzugs la sum cus yongs su bskor ba bde dang sdug bsngal ngo bo la/ /mkhas pa rnams la zhi ba'i gzugs kyis nyid mdzad nyams myong gdug pa rnams la mi gdug pa/ /

gang zhig gang du rang gi yid la las byas de yi 'bras bu de ru skyed par byed/ /'jig rten dbang phyug sna tshogs srid gsum skyed mdzad rdo rje sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /gcig dang du ma ma yin gcig ste mnyam dang mi mnyam mnyam pa g.yas dang g.yon dang mdun dang rgyab/ /steng

'og kun nas dkar dang ljang gu kha dog chen po sna tshogs gzugs can thung ngu ring po ste/ /ring thung su dang yon tan med pa yon tan dang bcas skyes bu bud med skyes bu min/ /gang zhig kun nas brten byas gcig pu b+ha ga bzang mo mchog gi b+ha ga khyod la 'dud/ /gzhan yang bstod pa ci rigs

bya/ /oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badzra swa b+hA ba A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ mchod bstod nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o/ /mchod pa dang bstod pa'i yan lag ste dgu pa'o// //dpal ldan rdo rje can ni lo dang zla ba dbye ba'i dus kyis dag par 'gyur ro mi dbang kye/ /sems kyi rnam pa

nyi ma ma yin nyin bzhin dbang gis sna tshogs rnam par dag /du ba la sogs rlung rnams dag par rang snying pad+mar gtso bo'i 'khor lo gnas pa'o/ /drag po nyon mongs twas bcas bdud kyi tshogs kyis bdud kyi gtso bo zhabs kyi 'og /dung dang gaN+DI nor bu ljon pa dag ni de bzhin sku yi rdo rje

rdzogs/ /bdud rtsi'i yan lag gis ni bum pa brgyad de rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa byang sems sogs/ /'du byed don yod grub pa tshor ba dri med rin chen 'byung gnas 'du shes dpag med 'od/ /gzugs ni 'khor lo can te ri bong stobs dang khrag dang dri chu dri chen dag /lha

mo drug gi khams rnams kyi ste yul dang yul can gyi ni byang chub sems dpa' sras dang bcas/ /stobs kyis khro bo lnga ste gzhan rnams las kyi dbang po lnga pos so/ /tsA mu N+Da la sogs pa thun tshar brgyad kyis pad+ma'i 'dab gnas nyi ma'i dus sbyor chu tshod rnams/ /lha min la sogs zla

ba bcu gnyis pad+ma'i 'dab gnas rtsa dang dbugs kyi grangs rnams so/ /klu dang gtum mo gsang ba la ste rgyal po nyis 'gyur rtsa rnams rnam par dag /de bzhin 'dod pa la sogs des ni rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis lus kyi bya ba dag /skra yis sgrub pa ma lus dur khrod sa gnas ba

spu rnams kyis 'byung bo'i tshogs rnams so/ /khams gsum dag ni ma lus pa/ /sangs rgyas ngo bor bsgom par bya/ /de nas pad+ma rnam par sbyang / /a yis pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /hUM gi yi ge rdo rje bcas/ /shes rab la ni mthun phyir ro/ /hUM rigs rang gi yab kyi rdo rje

ni/ /rtse mo lnga pa rnam par bsgom/ /de dbus a las pad 'dab brgyad/ /de nas rdo rje pad+mar dgod/ /de nas rnal 'byor hUM phaT brjod/ /bsrub cing bde chen bsgom par bya/ /gtum mo lte bar rgyus klu bcom/ /ho yis ye shes dbus nas su/ /dri med glog 'dra gzi brjid

'bar/ /phung khams skye mched la sogs bsregs/ /ri bong spyi bo las 'bab pa/ /thig le'i gzugs te rdo rje can/ /gnas bzhi rim bcas slar steng 'og /rgyan ldan me long gnas lta bur/ /dus gsum ye shes rang 'byung ba/ /gsung dag ye shes 'bar bar

gcig /dung can rgyan chen gtum mor brjod/ /lte steng rigs dan d+hU tI'i sna/ /srog lnga sna rtser yungs kar bzhugs/ /srog 'gags stong nyid ma bcos dang / /de la yid gzhag bsgom par bya/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badzra swa b+hA bu A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ rnam dag dran

pa'i thig le dang / /phra mo bsgom pa'i yan lag ste bcu ba'o// //de nas nga rgyal gzung bar bya'o/ /bsgom pas skyo na sngags bzlas te/ /las la shis pa'i phreng ba bzung / /sngags kyi sgra spangs grogs po ru/ /gang 'gyur ba yi sngags de bzlas/ /oM na mo

badzra sa twA ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twa b+h+yaH/ na mo badzra kro d+he n+d+ra rA dze b+h+yaH/ na mo bi shra mA trai/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twa de bI b+h+yaH/ na mo badzra DA ki nI b+h+yaH/ oM na mo b+ha ga wa te kA la tsa krA ya badzra b+hai ra ba b+hI kA rA ya/ ma he n+d+ra nI la bar+N+Na sha rI rA ya/ mA ra kle sha hr-i dA ya/ krAn+ta si ta ra k+ta tsa ra NA ya/ kr-i Sh+NA

rak+ta si ta kaN+ThA ya/ nI la si ti pI ta rak+ta daM Sh+TA kar lo gra b+hI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-i ShaN ra k+ta si ta sa bye tar skaN+D+hA ya/ dwA da sha b+hu dzA ya/ Sh+Ta biM sha ti ka rA ya/ badzra khaD+ga/ tri shU la kA rti ka / bA Na oM ku sha Da ma ru ka / mud+gar/ tsakra/ kun+ta/ daN+Da/ par shu/ badzra g+haN+Ta khe Ta/ kha T+wAM ga /ka pA la/ tsA pA

pA sha/ rat+na/ ka mA la/ shaM kha/ A da R+sha/ shriM kha lA/ brah+ma/ shi ro ga dza tsarma d+h+r-i ka ka rA ya/ bya g+h+ra tsarma Ni ba sa nA ya/ skan+d+he mu N+Da mA la a ba laM bi ne/ shi ra si/ badzra paT+Ta ma ku Te badzra ka mA la mA la ar+d+ha tsan+d+ra d+ha rA ya/ kuN+Da la ru tsaka / kaN+Thi kA/ me kha lA/ nU pU ra/ b+hasma yadz+nyo pa

bI ta shi ro ma Ni/ mahA mu dra nA gen+d+ra bi b+hU Sha NA ya/ badzra DA ki nI san+to Shi ta hr-i da yA ya/ in+d+ra ag+ni ya ma nai r+r-i t+ya ba ru Na bA yu ku be ra I shA na brah+ma beSh+Nu bi nA ya ka kA rti ka ya nan di ma hA kA la gra ha/ nak+Sha tra k+She tra pA la su ren+d+rA su ren+d+rA phe Nen+d+ra b+hU tan+d+ra na re n+d+ra saM stu ta tsa ra NA ya/ rtsa ba'i sngags so/ /oM AH hUM

hoHhaM k+ShaHh+k+Sh+m+l+W+r+yaM kA la tsakra dur dA na ta da ma ka dza ta dza rA ma rA NAn+ta ka / trai lo kya bi dza yaH ma hA bi re shwa ra/ badzra kA ya/ badzra gA tra/ badzra gA tra/ badzra ne tra/ badzra shro tra/ badzra g+h+rA Na/ badzra dzi hwa/ badzra/ dan+ta/ badzra na kha/ badzra ke sha/ badzra lo ma/ badzra b+ha ra Na/ badzra hA sa/ badzra gI ta/ badzra nr-i t+ya/

badzra yu d+ha ka ra/ badzra kro d+ha rA dzA d+hi pa ti/ badzra DA ka/ /badzra DA ki nI dzA la pa ri bra ti/ shI g+h+raM/ A g+ts+tsha g+ts+tsha/ badzra sa twa dz+nyA yA sarba mA ra bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya ka kin+na ri kaM bu ru Sha ga ru Da gan+d+ha rba yak+Sha rA k+Sha sa b+hU ta ma hA pre ta/ kuM b+haN+Da a pA smA ra/ k+She tra pA la/ be tA Da/ pU ta na/ duShu TA ga gra hA da yo

yo sarba dz+wa ra/ sarba byA d+hi/ k+Shu dro pa dra ba kAr NiH sarba sa twA nAM sarbA pa kAr ra tAM stAn sarbany+dzaH/ shI g+h+raM badzra ku she nA kr-i Sh+y-i kra Sh+ya/ Ur+d+ha/ di shi ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kri Sh+ya/ bUrma di shi ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ dak+Shi Na de shi ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ ut+ta ra di shi ga tA nA kri Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ bash+tsi ma di shi ga tA nA

kr-i Sh+'+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ bA ya bya di shi ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ I sha na de shig tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ nai r+r-i t+ya de shi ga tA nA kr-i Sh+yA kr-i Sh+ya/ ag+na di shi ga tA na' kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ a d+ho di shi ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ A kA sha maN+Dal la gtA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ pA yu maN+Dal ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ te dzo maN+Dal ga tA nA kr-i Sh+'+ya kr-i Sh+ya/

to yi maN+Dal ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ pra th+bI maN+Dal ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ kA ma d+hA tu maN+Dal ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ rU pa d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ a rU pa d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ kA yi d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ bA ka d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ tsit+ta d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ bany+tsa skan+d+ha ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i

Sh+ya/ pany+tsa d+hA tu ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ pany+tse n+d+ri ya ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ pany+tsa bi Sha ya ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ pany+tsa karma n+d+ri ya ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ pany+tsa karma n+d+ra ya bi Sha ya ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ sarba to ya tra ku tra d+tsit+ta ga tA nA kr-i Sh+ya kr-i Sh+ya/ ma hA sma shA na badzra g+nidz+wa li ta b+hA myaM ni pa ta ya ni pa ta ya/ badzra pA she

na sarba b+hu dze Shu ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ badzra shriM kha la yA sarba pA de Shu ni ro d+ha ya ro d+ha ya/ sarba sa twe Shu shA ya bA ka tsi t+to pa dra ba ka ra ra tA na tA nA ma hA kro d+ha badzra Na tsU r+Na ya tsU r+Na ya/ badzra kh+D+ga Ne na kr-in+ta ya/ badzra tri shU le na b+he da ya b+he da ya/ badzra kar+t+ta ka ya ha na ha na/ badzra pA Ni na bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ badzra kI la ke/ /kI

la ya kI la ya/ badzra mud+ga re NA ko Ta yA ko Ta yA/ badzra tsakra Na ts+tshe da ya ts+tshe da ya/ badzra kun+te na b+hi n+da b+hin+da/ badzra daN+De Na tA Da ya tA Da ya/ badzra bar shu na ts+tshi n+da ts+tshi nad/ sA r+d+ha tri ko Ti baN+Da kr-i twa sham shA na b+hU te b+h+yu te b+h+yo bi laM ku ru ku ru/ badzra Da ma ru ke na badzra Da ki nI rA bA ha ya/ badzra DA ki nI b+h+yo

mA ra kA yi kA nAM ru d+hi raM ni be da ya be da ya/ p+ny+tsA mr-i taM ni ri NA b+h+yaH/ bany+tsa mr-i taM ni be da ya/ sarba badzra DA ki nI sa hi ta/ sarba sa twA nA na shAn+ti kaM/ /bauSh+Ta kaM rak+ShA ba ra Na gu p+ti ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT/ ces pa ni phreng ba'i sngags so/ /oM AH hUM hoH h+k+ShaM swA hA/ snying po'o/ /oM hrAM hriM hr-I hrUM h+r+laM hraMH swA hA/ nye ba'i snying

po'o/ /oM kA la tsa krA ya AH huM hoH phaT swA hA/ oM dA na pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM shI la pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM k+shAn+ti pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM bIR+ya pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA tA/ oM d+h+ya na pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT m+la swA hA/ oM pra dz+nya 'a ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM u pA ya pA

ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM pra Ni d+hA na pA ra mitA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM ba la pA ra mi tA yai huM swA hA/ oM dz+nyAn pA ra mi tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM dzra ya g+ha Tai b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM bi dza ya g+ha Te b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba tsi h+no b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba mu drA b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM tsi n+tA ma Na ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM d+har+m+ma ga N+D+Ya huM phaT swA

hA/ oM d+har+m+mA shaM khA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM kalpa brik+ShA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a k+Sho b+h+ya ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+ha ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM ra t+na saM b+hA bA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a mr-i tA b+hA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM bai ro tsa nA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM lo tsa nA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM mA ma kyai huM phaT swA hA/ oM pAN+Da

ru yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM tA rA ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra d+hA dwI shwa R+Yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra pA Na ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM kha gar+b+hA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM k+Shi ti gar+b+hA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM lo ke shwa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba ni ba ra Na bi skam b+hi ne huM phaT swA hA/ oM sa man+ta b+ha drA ya huM phaT swA hA/

oM gan+d+ha badzrA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM rU pa badzrA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM ra sa badzrA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM sbaR+sha badzrA yai huM phata swA hA/ oM shab+da badzrA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM d+har+m+mA d+hA tu badzrA yai hUM phaT swA hA/ oM uSh+Na ShA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM big+hanAn+ta kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pradz+nyan+ta kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pad+mAn+ta

kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM ya mA n+ta kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM staM b+ha na yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM mA Ni ma n+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM sto b+hi n+yai h+'aM phaT swA hA/ oM a ti bAR+Yi yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM a ti nA lA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba d+hU ri NI b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM Sha DaM gA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tsArtsi kA

badzra huM phaT swA hA/ oM dz+ha badzra dz+hi badzra dz+h+ra badzrA dz+hu badzra dz+h+la badzra dz+haM badzra huM phaT swA hAM/ oM dza badzra dzi badzra dzr-i badzra badzra dz+l-i badzra dzam badzra huM phaT swA huM oM tsha badzra tshi badzra tshar-i badzra tshu badzra tsh+l-i badzra tshaM badzra huM phaT swA hA/ oM tsa badzra tsi badzra ts+d-i badzra tsu badzra ts+l-i badzra huM phaT swA hA/ de bzhin du sngar bstan pa'i sa bon kun

la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ /oM pa ru N+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM ba ya be huM phaT swA hA/ oM ya ma n+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM yak+Sha n+ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM nI la d+N+D+ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM Ta k+ki rA dzA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM a tsa lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA pa lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM suM b+ha rA dza ya huM phaT swA hA/

oM badzra rau drAk+Sha huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra shriM kha lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tsun+de huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra b+h+r-i ki ri huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra mA rI ts+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra sha Ta triM its+tsha b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra dza lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra karko TA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra bA su ki huM phaT

swA hA/ oM badzra a nan+ta huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tak+Sha kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra ma hA pad+mA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra ku li kA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra shaM kha bA lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra pad+mA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra bi dza yA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM shwa nA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM su ka rA s+yai

huM phaT swA hA/ oM byA g+h+rA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM dzaM bu kA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM ga ru DA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM u lU kA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM gr-i d+ha s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM kA kA s+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba shud+d+he b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra tsan+d+rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra sU R+YA ya huM phaT swA hA/

oM badzra maM ga lA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra bud+d+hA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra pr-ih+pa tA yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra shu krA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra sha ne sh+tsa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra kA rta ri huM phaT swA hA/ /oM badzra rA hu la huM phaT swA hA/ oM ra badzra kA lA g+n+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oMbadzra ng+hu pe ni huM phaT swA hA/ oM

badzra A ga s+t+yai huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra sarba na k+sha tre b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM dwa da sha rA shi b+h+yo hu haT swA hA/ oM Sho Da sha kA la b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra a nan+de bI shwa rA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra ma hA kA la ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra gan+N+Ta kar+NA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra b+h+riM gi ra Te huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba k+Shai tra pA li

b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba dU ti b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM ha ri ti huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM ha ri ti huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba sid+d+hi b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM sarba gu ru bud+d+ha po d+hi s+t+we b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM d+har+m+ma tsakrA ya huM phaT swA hA/ oM b+ha dra gaN+DI ye huM phaT swA hA/ oM badzra dun+du b+h+yo huM phaT swA hA/ oM bo d+hi brik+shi ye huM phaT swA hA/ de nas mchod bstod ci nus bya/ /khro rgyal la

sogs gtor ma sbyin/ /dge ba 'di yis rnam gsum srid pa la gnas sems can rnams ni bla med byang chub sems 'gyur bar shog /thub pa 'khor bcas gtso bo'i byin gyis brlab kyis sna tshogs phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob gyur pa/ /srid pa rnam gsum la gnas sems can bcom ldan dus 'khor stobs

kyis de bzhin shog /bsod nams de yis sems can mi 'gyur mchog gi bde bar gyur cig de la 'dud/ /spyi bor rdo rje rtse lnga ru/ /gtso bo yab yum gshegs su gsol/ /thugs kar rtse dgu du ba sogs/ /dpral bar rtse mo bcu drug bsgom/ /rigs lnga yab yum bum par

gshegs/ /mgrin par rtse mo sum cu gsum/ /sems dpa' sems ma sgo ba gshegs/ /lte bar rtse mo drug cu lnga/ /gsung gi dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol/ /gsang bar phyi yi sgo srung gshegs/ /bya ba'i rdo rje gdan bral sogs/ /las la klu dang rab

gtum gshegs/ /de nas lha yi rnam par ldang / /cho gas gnas rnams bsrung bar bya/ /oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga te a ti badzra sa twa haM do daN+Da da ma ko hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ lha'i nga rgyal gyis spyod lam bya'o/ /rjes kyi bya ba'i yan lag ste bcu gcig pa'o// //sangs rgyas byang sems rgyud 'grel las/

dbri bsnan ma byas cho ga bsdus/ /dge ba bla med byang chub bsngo/ /nongs gyur bzod pa mdzad du gsol/ /dkyil 'khor rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dus 'khor zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //kha che'i paN+Di ta so ma nA tha dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong shes rab grags kyis

bsgyur ba'o// //[]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsa kra sA d+ha na nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan srid gsum mgon po mchog tu bde pa'i bdag nyid rnam par

rtog pa ma lus rab tu spangs/ /spro dang sdud pa'i rgyur gyur dngos dang dngos med mnyam pa'i ye shes skye dang 'jig pa rnam par bral/ /skye bo rnams kyi bsam pa rnams la dgongs te hUM yig la sogs las byung dkyil 'khor gyis ni bskor/ /bden pa dag la gnas pa'i mchog gi snying rje dang ldan dang po'i

sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'jam pa'i dpal gyis bsdus rgyud du/ /sgrub thabs gsungs pa de bzhin du/ /'jig rten mgon gyis 'grel mdzad pa/ /de dag blangs te bri bar bya/ /bstan bcos brtsam pa'i nus med cing / /mdzad las dbyung bar ma nus kyang / /bsgom phyir

sgrub thabs 'di byas pas/ /blo ldan rnams la bzod par gsol/ /dang por sngags pa mchog tu snying rje dang ldan pa gzhan gyi bya ba byed par 'dod pas/ zhi ba la sogs pa las kyi bye brag gis/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram la sogs pa'i gnas yid du 'ong ba'i bsam gtan gyi gnas su/ /bla ma dang /

rgyal ba dang / de'i sras rnams la gus pas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi bris sku la sogs pa bzhugs su gsol/ mchod ba dang / maN+Dal la sogs pa gzhung nas bshad pa ltar bshams la/ 'jam pa la sogs pa'i stan la bsdad la/ shin tu gus pa dang

ldan pa'i rang gi yid kyis phyag btsal ba la sogs pa rnams dang / phyi'i mchod pa rgya chen po rnams dang mnyam por gzhag pa ste/ ji ltar gsungs pa ltar dag par byas pa'i bdud rtsi lnga'i ri lu sran ma tsa na ka tsam khar bcug nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid dang / ye shes rnam par dag

par bya ba la sogs pa rnams bya ba ni/ de yang mchog gi snying rje dang bdud rtsi'i dbang gis sems la brlan pa'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dpal dri ma med par lha nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don du lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag par gsungs pa/ oM

AHhuM hoHhaM k+Sha/ pra dz+nyo pA yAt+ma ka kA ya wAka tsit+ta dz+nyAn badzraM badzrA badzrA mr-i ta swa b+hA ba ku ru ku ru skan+d+ha d+hA twA ya tA nA ni/ swa b+hA baM swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags brjod la/ gtsug tor du baM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug pa yongs su rdzogs pa lta bu sngags pas bsam mo/ /de

nas gtsug tor nas brtsams te sen mo'i bar gyi lus sbrul pags pa brjes pa ltar bsam mo/ /de ltar zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la'o/ /dbang la sogs pa gzhung ches kyis dogs nas ma bris so/ /de nas yang de nyid gsungs pa'i/ /oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+hAH sarba d+harmaHswa b+hA ba shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ zhes

pas brjod do/ /de nas dpral bar oM yig yongs su gyur pa las 'od dpag med sku mdog dkar po/ /mgrin par AHyig yongs su gyur pa las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog dmar po/ snying gar huM yig yongs su gyur pa las don yod grub pa sku mdog nag po/ lte bar hoHyig yongs su

gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog ser po/ gtsug tor du haM yig yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa sku mdog ljang gu /gsang gnas su k+ShaHyig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog sngon po rnams dgod pa ni/ gsung bar 'gyur ba'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan rnams

dang ldan pa'o/ /'di ni rdo rje'i zhal dag pa las rigs drug dgod pa'i nges pa'o/ /de nas lag pa dag pa'i sngags brjod do/ /oM hraMHsarbA sta rA dza mA ra kle sh+n+ta ka ra badzra tI k+Shan duHkha ts+tshe da ma ma ka raM bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags 'di nyid kyis lag pa mnye ba ni lag

pa dag pa'i nges pa'o/ /de nas a la sogs pa'i la'i mthar thug pa'i dbyangs yig bco lnga ni/ a i r-i u l-i/ a e ar o al/ ha ya ra wa la rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gi rtsa ba'i tshigs nas brtsams te/ mthe bo'i bar gyi tshigs rnams la nam mkha' la sogs pa

dgod pa'o/ /de nas lag pa g.yas pa'i mthe bo'i steng gi tshigs nas brtsams te/ mthe'u chung gi tshigs kyi bar du lA yig la sogs ba dgod pa ni/ lA wA rA yA hA/ A la au Ar ai AH/ l-I U r-I I A/ rnams ni sa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin no/ /de nas thal mo sbyar ba'i nang

du zla ba dang nyi ma'i dbus su huM yig kha dog sngon po bsam/ yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi sa bon dang ldan pas rtse lnga'i phyag rgya bcings te/ gtsug tor nas brtsams nas/ rkang pa'i sen mo'i bar du bdag nyid la reg par bya zhes sngags brjod la/ oM AHhuM hoHhaM

k+ShaHkA ya bA ka tsit+ta dz+nyA nA d+hi pa ti badzra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta dz+nyAn badzrA badzrA ka' ya swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ de'i nga rgyal dang bcas pas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kA ya bA ka tsit+ta swa b+hA ba Atam ko\u0f85haM/ zhes pa ni lus dang ngag dang yid dang ye shes rnam par dag pa'o/ /de ltar rigs drug la dgod par byas nas/

de nas yan lag drug la dgod pa ni/ lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'i mthe bo gnyis snying gar gtad de/ oM h+r+'+l-iM hr-i da yA ya na maH/ zhes pa dang / mgrin par oM huM grI wA ya swA hA/ zhes pa'o/ /mgo bor oM hrUM si ra se swA hA/ zhes pa'o/ /gtsug tor la oM hr-IM shi khA yai bau Sha Ta/ ces pa'o/ /

yan lag thams cad la oM hr-IM ka ba tsA ya hUM/ zhes brjod cing lag pa gnyis kyis lus thams cad la reg par bya'o/ /mig la oM hrAM ne trA ya wa Sha Ta/ ces pas so/ /mig la oM hrAHastA ya phaT/ ces pas phyogs thams cad du mthe bong dang mdzub mos se gol gtogs shing dge ba'i bya ba

la g.yon gyis/ mi dge ba'i bya ba la g.yas pas dgod do/ /de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya tri wa si raHshi kha ka ba tsa ni tra astu badzra Sha DAM ga swa ba A t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ zhes pa ni yan lag drug la dgod pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas srung 'khor gyi don du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su dang por 'khor lo

bzhi bsgom pa ni/ de nas de nyid du gsungs pa ltar srung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam par bya ba'i phyir/ de yang dang por yaM yig yongs su gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor 'og dang steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje kha sbyor ro/ /de nas raM yig yongs su gyur pa las me'i dkyil 'khor dang /

waM yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor dang / laM yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor rnam rim pa bzhin du/ kha dog nag po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / ser po rnams kyi 'og dang steng du hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rang rang gi kha dog dang bcas pa'i rdo rje gnyis dang

bcas pa rnams/ gzhu'i dbyibs dang / gru gsum dang / zlum po dang / gru bzhi'i rnam pa la rlung yab dang bkra shis dang pad+ma dang / 'khor lo rnams kyis spras pa go bar bya'o/ /de nas yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa snga dro'i grib ma'i mtshams dang / grong khyer gyi mtshams dang /

phyi rol du nam mkha' dang sa gzhi 'dus par snang ba'i mtshams su ste/ de yang dkyil 'khor gzhi gcig tu gyur pa khru bzhi brgya dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang bsgom pa dang / de ltar rab gsum bsgom pa dang / de ltar grong khyer srung ba'i don du grong khyer gyi mtshams su ra ba lnga bsgom par bya ba dang / de

ltar 'og thams cad du rdo rje'i mdung dang / steng du mda'i dra ba shin tu rno ba dang / dbus su rdo rje'i sa gzhi rnams grong khyer gyi mtshams su bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas gzhal yas khang gi dbus su pad+ma'am/ 'khor lo khru bcu gnyis pa mu khyud dang bcas pa 'dab ma brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o/ /dbus

kyi lte ba khru bzhi dang ldan pa'i nyi ma dang bcas pa'i gdan no/ /'on kyang 'di'i bye brag ni hUM yig yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'i sa gzhi dang / oM yig yongs su gyur pa las sam/ b+h+rUM yig yongs su gyur pa las gzhal yas khang / baM yig yongs su gyur pa'am/ a yig yongs su gyur

pa las byed pad+ma dang / raM yig yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms zhes bya'o/ /de ltar ra ba la sogs pa bsgoms nas/ yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar sngags kyi bye brag tu gyur pa 'di lta ste/ oM AHhU~M raHbadzra tsam+d+ra sU R+Ya rA hu kA la ag+ne ya/ kA ya bA ka tsit+ta dz+nyA

na badzra badzra prA kA rAn ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni ra ba'i sngags so/ /oM b+h+rUM bi shwa kA ya badzra kU TA gA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni gzhal yas khang gi sngags so/ /oM paHbi shwa badzra pad+maM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni pad+ma'i sngags so/ /oM raHbadzra sU R+YA sa rna ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ni nyi ma'i gdan

gyi sngags so/ /de nas de'i steng du aM yig dkar po yongs su gyur pa las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ ka yig la sogs pa gsal byed 'dus pa'i bdag nyid las/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom pa me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no/ /yang de

nyid du gsungs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid g.yon dang g.yas su bskor ba/ dbyangs yi gsum cu AHtsheg drag dang klad kor dang bcas pa bsgom pa ni/ a i r-i u l-i 'di rnams ni dang po lnga bsdus pa'o/ /de yang yon tan gyi dbye bas a e

ar o al rnams ni gnyis pa lnga rnams bsdus pa'o/ /de nas rkyen gyis gyur pa ha ya ra wa la rnams ni gsum pa'i bsdus pa lnga'o/ /bsdus pa bco lnga'i mthar thig le ni aM yig sta/ bcu drug pa ste/ 'di rnams ni g.yon skor gyis so/ /de nas g.yas skor gyis nag po'i phyogs

kyi dang po la sogs pa dgod pa/ lA wA rA yA hA/ A la au Ar ai AHl-I U r-I I A/ de ltar bco lnga dang gnam stong gi mthar tsheg drag ni A AHste/ 'di ni de ltar dbyangs yig bcu drug ces bya'o/ /de nas de'i steng du AHyig dmar po yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin du bu mo'i bdag nyid bsam mo/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa'i ka yig la sogs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal byed bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de yang / ha ya ra wa la rnams dang / sde tshan drug ste sum cu rtsa lnga dang / de nyid kyis brjod pa'i la wa ya DaD+ha rnams bzung

ste/ l+la w+ba D+Da D+h+D+ha l+la w+Wa r+ra y+Ya h+ha s+sa w+Wa Sh+Sha sh+sha th+k+th+ka/ t+ta th+tha d+da d+h+d+ha n+na/ p+pa ph+pha b+ba b+h+b+ha m+ma/ T+Ta Th+Tha D+Da D+h+D+ha N+Na/ ts+tsa tsh+tsha dz+dza dz+h+dz+ha ny+nya/ k+ka kh+kha g+ga g+h+g+ha ng+nga rnams te/ bzhi bcu tham pa sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas g.yas skor gyis so/ /de ltar g.yon skor gyi/ nga g+ha ga kha ka/ nya dz+ha dza tsha tsa/ Na D+ha Da Tha Ta/ ma ba pha pa/

na d+ha da tha ta/ th+ka sha Sha wa sa ha ya ra wa la D+ha Da ya wa la ste/ de ltar bzhi bcu ste gsal byed brgyad cu zhes so/ /de nas de dag gi dbus su hUM yig sngon po las byung ba'i sna tshogs rdo rje hUM gis mtshan pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /

de nas gnas gsum po gcig tu 'dres pa la hrIHyig gis spras pa las bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /de nas lus kyi yan lag thams cad rdzogs pa haM yig gi bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'og nas phyag 'tshal ba'i skabs su 'chad pa'i

dpal dus kyi 'khor lo ste/ 'on kyang phyag nyi shu rtsa drug pa phyag lhag ma gnyis kyis glang po che'i pags pa 'dzin pa la kha dog ser po zhabs brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa/ zhal gcig ma spyan gsum ma/ phyag gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa/ phyag rgya lngas spras pa'i sna tshogs yum

gyis mgul nas 'khyud pa/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ stag gi sham thabs sbyangs pa/ khro bo'i dbang po rdo rje shugs su bdag nyid bsgom mo/ /yang de nyid du gsungs pa ltar phyag rgya la sogs pa dgod pa las/ phyag rgya drug rang gi lus la dgod pa/ oM haM haHbA ma dak+Shi Na kar+N+Na yor

badzra kuN+Da li huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM aHka D+yaM kaN+The badzra me kha lA badzra kin+Thi ka huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a A bA ma dik+Shi Na ka ra yor badzra ru tsa kau huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hA bA ma da kiSha Na pA da yor badzra nU pU re huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM baM pany+tsa A kA ra ma hA shU n+ya swa b+hA wa ma hA badzra shi ro ma Ni shi ra si sarba aM ge b+hasma

huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM aM ar+d+ha na rI shwa ra badzra ar+d+ha tsan+d+ra badzra paT+Ta ur+d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM a AHoM sarba swa rai e ka tri swa ra swa b+hA ba badzra y+dzonya pa bI ta skan+d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ ces pa ni phyag rgya drug gi cho ga'o/ /de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i glang po'i pags pa'i phyag rgya bcas pa'i phyag rgya bzhi'i

sngags rnams brjod par bya ste/ oM k+ShaHdur dA na tA/ b+hi ma na k+Sha yaM ka ra byA g+h+ra tsarma ka Tau huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM haM k+ShaHtriM shang swa ra sap+ta ti hraHswa dir+g+ha byany+dza na swa b+hA ba d+yai t+ya ku la sha ta si ro b+hir muN+Da mA la skan+d+ha a ba laM bi ni skan+d+he huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM ha hi hri hu h+l-i pany+tsa skan+d+ha bi shud+d+ha swa b+hA ba

shi ra si ka pA la mA le huM hUM phaT phaT/ ces pa ni phyag rgya bzhi'i cho ga'o/ /de ltar phyag rgya bcu rnams pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dbye ba dang / gnas bcu drug gi dbye bas stong pa nyid bcu drug ces pa ni phyag rgya dgod pa'i cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /de nas g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyag mtshan gyi sa bon rnams

brjod par bya ste/ oM k+SharaH kro d+ha badzra hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaH badzra khad+ga hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaHbadzra tri shU la hUM phaT/ oM k+ShuraHbadzra karta ri hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaHbadzra bA Na hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaHbadzra aM ku sha hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaHbadzra Da ma ru ka hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaHbadzra mud+ga ra hUM phaT/ oM k+SharaHbadzra tsakra hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra kun+ta hUM

phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra daN+Da hUM phaT/ oM k+Sh+RaHbadzra paR+shU hUM phaT/ ces pa rnams ni g.yas kyi phyag mtshan rnams so/ /de nas g.yon gyi phyag mtshan rnams ni/ dang por hwAM yig brjod par bya/ oM hUM badzra g+haN+Te ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra khe Ta ka ho phraM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra kha T+wAM ga ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra ka bA la

ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra tsa pA ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pa sha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra rat+na ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra pad+ma ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra shaM kha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra A daR+Sha ho phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra shriM kha le hwAM phreM phaT/ oM hwAM badzra tsa tur be ta swa b+hA ba braham shi ra ho phraM phaT/ ces pa rnams phyag

g.yon pa rnams su mtshan ma dgod pa'i rim pa'o/ /de nas glang po'i pags pa'i sngags rnams brjod pa ni/ oM k+Sha k+ShA k+Shi k+ShI k+Sh-I k+ShIr k+Shu k+ShU k+Sh-il k+Sh-il k+ShaM k+ShaM/ ha hA hi hI h+R-i h+R-I hu hU h+l-i h+l-I haM hAH/ sarba bag+hi bi da ri ta ga dza tsarma paT+Ta ar+d+ha rak+ta shra ba ta hUM phreM/ phyag g.yas dang g.yon gyi sdigs mdzub dang bcas

nas bzung ba ni/ g.yas kyi lag pa dang mgo bo'i phyogs kyi lag pa dang / g.yon gyi rkang pa nas bzung bar bsam pa ni pags pa bzung ba'i rim pa'i cho ga'o/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po bcu dgod pa'i sngags ni/ oM hUM badzra dza ya nA gen+d+ra badzra dza TA mu ku Ta ban+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM k+ShuM badzra

bi dza ya nA gen+d+ra badzra paT+Ta ban+d+he tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+yaM h+yA badzra karko Ta badzra pad+mau bA ma d+k+Shi Na kuN+Da la yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hraM hrAM badzra ba su ki she kha pA lau bA ma dak+Sha Ni ru tsa ka yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM hwaM hwA badzra a nan+ta ku li kau me kha lA kaN+Thi ka yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ oM h+laM h+lA badzra tak+Sha ko

ma hA pad+mau bA ma dak+Shi Na pA da nU pU ra yoHtiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha huM hUM phaT phaT/ de ltar sngags dang phyag rgya dgod par byas la/ mkha' 'gro ma rnams dang bcas pa'i rkang pa bcu drug pas sdang ba rnams bskrad pa dang / bdud la sogs pa bskrad pa'i sngags rnams dus kyi 'khor lo'i sngags pas yang nas yang

du bzlas pa 'di lta ste/ oM na mo badzra sa twa ya/ na mo bud+d+ha bo d+hi sa twA b+h+yaHna mo badzra kro d+ha rA dzi n+d+ra ra dze b+h+yaH/ na mo bi shwa mA trai na mo bud+d+d+ha bo d+hi sa twa de bi b+h+yaHna mo badzra DA ki nI b+h+yaH/ oM na mo b+ha gab te kA la tsa krA ya/ badzra b+hai ra ba b+hI ka ra ya ma he nedre nI la bar+N+Na sha rI rA ya/ mA ra kle sha hr-i da yA kran+ta sI ta rak+ta tsar

NA ya/ kr-iSh+Na rak+ta si ta kaN+ThA ya nI la si ta pA ti rak+ta daMSh+TA ka ra lo gra phI Sha Na mu khA ya/ kr-iSh+Na rak+ta si ta sa bye ta ra skan+d+hA ya/ dwa da sha b+hu dzA ya/ Sha Da biM sha ti ka rA ya/ badzra khaD+ga tri shU la karta ri bA Na ba aM ku sha Da ma ru ka mung+ga ra tsa kra kun+ta daN+Da par shu badzra g+haN+Ta khe Ta kha T+wAM ga ka pA la tsA pa pA sha rat+na ka ma la

sha kha A daR+sha shrIM kha lA brah+ma shi ro ga dza tsarma d+h+r-i ka ka rA ya/ byA g+h+ra tsarma NaM ba sa nA ya/ s+k+N+Deha muN+Da mA lA ba laM bi na/ shi ra si badzra paT+Ta mu ku Te badzra ka pA la mA la ar+d+ha tsan+d+ra d+ha '+ra ya/ kuN+Da la ru tsa ka kaN+Thi ka me kha lA nU pUr b+hasma yadz+nyo pa bIta shi ro ma Ni ma hA mu dra nA gen+d+ra bi b+hU Sha NA ya/ badzra DA kaM nA+e saM to Sha ti hr-i

da yA ya/ in+d+ra ag+ni ya ma nai r-i t+ya ba ru Na bA yu ku be ra I shA na brah+ma biSh+Nu bi nA ya ka ka rti ke ya nan+di ma hA kA la gra ha nak+Sha k+She tra pA la/ su ren+d+ra su ren+d+ra pha Nin+d+ra b+hU ten+d+ra na ren+d+ra saM stu ta tsa ra NA ya/ zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi rkang pa bcu drug pa'i sngags so/ /bdud rigs brgya'i phreng ba'i sngags kyi sa

bon rnams ni gong du sngags brjod pa'i skabs su bshad pas 'dir ma bris so/ /rkang pa bdun cu rtsa gnyis pa ni gzhung ches dgos pas ma bris so/ /de nas rdo rje dgod par bya ba de nyid gsungs pa ltar dpal dang ldan pa'i rdo rje yan lag rnams la dgod pa ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor

dkar po la oM yig dgod do/ /mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la AHyig dgod do/ /snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la hUM yig dgod do/ /lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor ser po la ho yig dgod do/ /gtsug tor dang gsang bar rim pa ji lta ba

bzhin du rnam par shes pa dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon po la haM k+ShaHdgod do/ /de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms la dkyil 'khor de rnams nyid la rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sa bon de rnams yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje rnams te/ rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang / rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa

pa dang / rtse mo dgu pa dang / rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang / rtse mo lnga pa dang / yang rtse mo sum cu so gsum pa zhes pa ste/ rdo rje rnams kyang so so'i dkyil 'khor gyi kha dog dang 'dra bar ji ltar gsungs pa'i tshad ltar bsgom par bya ste/ yang de nyid nas gsungs pa ltar rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pa

sor gcig pa bsgom par bya'o/ /spyi gtsug gi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor gnyis pa'o/ /dpral ba'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bzhi pa'o/ /mgrin pa'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor lnga pa'o/ /snying ga'i 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor brgyad pa'o/ /lte ba'i 'khor lo rnam par

dag pa sor dgu pa'o/ /gsang gnas kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa sor bcu gnyis pa'o/ /de nas g.yon gyi dpung mgo'i tshigs la da di D-ir du d-il ngam/ g+ha g+hi g+hir g+hu g+hil g+haM/ ga gi g-ir gu g-il gaM / kha khi kh-ir khu kh-il khaM/ ka ki k-ir ku k-il kaM/ zhes pas nam mkha' la sogs pa ste/ thung ngu drug gi
