sogs pa rnams sngon du song ba'i sngags kyi cho gas te dgang gzar yang ngo / /de nyid med na/ lag pa g.yon gan rkyal du byas te/ lag pa g.yas pa mchod sbyin byas pa'i mthe bos bskyod cing / sngon gyi rdzas rnams bsnun par bya'o/ /zhi ba la na maH'i mtha' can no/ /rgyas pa la bau Sha Ta'o/ /gsad pa

dang / bskrad pa dang / dbye ba rnams la hUM ngo / /dbang la ba Shata ces pa'o/ /pur bus gdab pa dang / rengs pa dang / rmongs pa rnams la phaT kyi mtha' brten dang bcas pa brjod cing bsnun par bya'o/ /de nas h+k+Sh+m+l+W+R+Ya~M

dpon dang / las kyi rdo rjes me lha la dgang blugs dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas me tog la sogs pa'i sngags kyis phyogs bcur sbyin pa ni/ oM b+hur btu bswaH/ na mo de be b+h+yaH/ swa sti pradzA b+h+yaH/ swA hA rA dza b+h+yaH/ swA d+hA pi tr-i b+h+yaH/ a laM b+hU te b+h+yaH/ wa Sha Den+d+rU ya zhes pas so/ /de ltar me

tog la sogs pa phul la/ oM AHhU~M ka ya wAg tsit+ta swa b+hA wa shud+d+ha swA hA/ zhes pas zhal bsil dbul lo/ /de nas oM dzaHgats+tsha ma hra rasmiHswA s+thA naM san trip+ta ho/ pu na nA ga myiSh+Ta sa ya de wA hwa na ya mi swA hA/ zhes pas snying ga'i pad+ma la ye shes myi me lha gshegs su gsol zhing

thab kyi me lha yang gshegs su gsol la/ /'di ni sbyin sreg gi cho ga'i rim pa'o/ /de nas slob dpon gyis snga ma ltar mchod pa byas la rdo rje dang dril bu gzung ste/ rdo rje'i 'dug stangs la gnas nas/ rang gi pad+ma la ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol ba ni rim pa bzhin du/

gtsug tor dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying ga dang / lte ba dang / gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnams so/ /a i ri u l-i haM yi ge rnams stong pa la sogs pa'i zad par rnams dang / phyogs skyong rnams dang / gza' rnams dang / klu rnams dang / 'byung po rnams dang / khro

bo'i tshogs rnams gshegs su gsol/ de nas bum pa'i gos zung rnams srung ba'i gzhon nu ma rnams la sbyin du gzhug go /byang chub kyi shing gi lo ma 'am rang gi lag pa'am rdo rjes tshangs pa'i thig gi lam nas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i bar gshegs par bya'o/ /de nas rang gi

spyi gtsug tu rdul tshon cung zad gzhag ste/ pad+ma la sogs pa bsdu bar bya'o/ /de nas rdul tshon sbyangs te bum par blugs nas ji ltar 'byor pa ltar glang po la sogs pa'i steng du bzhag ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang bcas par khyer la rgya mtsho la 'gro ba'i chu bo la dor

bar bya'o/ /bum pa de nyid chus bkang la/ dkyil 'khor gyi khang par 'ongs te gtor nas ba lang gi li ba la sogs pas kyang byugs te/ der gnas nas 'o ma la sogs pa'i dkar ba dang / mngar ba dang ras zung rnams kyis gzhon nu ma mnyes par byas nas gshegs su gsol ba

dang / mtshan mo'i dus su sngon gyi cho gas dpa' bo'i ston mo sbyin par bya'o/ /sems can don phyir rab tu spro bar mdzad pa'i mnga' bdag dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo yi/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga'i sgrub thabs byas pa'i dge bar gyur pa'i dkar

ba'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ /de yis 'gro ba ma lus pa yi nyon mongs tshogs rnams rab tu bcom pa'i gnas gyur pa/ /spros pa thams cad dang ni bral ba'i bde ba chen po mnyam pa med par thob par shog /dpal ldan pad+ma'i phyag dang ldan pas shin tu dri ma bral bar/ /rab rib ma

lus bcom yang 'on te ma dag mig ldan rnams kyi'o/ /gal te dngos po tshogs rnams ma mthong 'gyur nas snga phyi 'gal ba/ /mchis na mkhas par gyur pa rnams la bdag ni bzod par gsol lo/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// //slob dpon chen po sA d+hu phu tra sad+har+m+ma A ka

ra shAn+ti'i don du mdzad pa'o/ /rgya gar gyi paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po wA gI shwar gu p+ta dang / sgra bsgyur gyi lo tsA ba dge slong chos rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ /[]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsa kra maN+Dal b+hi d+hiH/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi

'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /snying ga'i pad+ma kha 'byed pa'i/ /spyan ras gzigs la phyag 'tshal nas/ /dkyil 'khor cho ga dbye bar bya/ /yan lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs kyis/ /sngon du bsnyen

pa byas nas su/ /sdom ni/ dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa gnyis/ /lhag gnas dang ni mchod pa'o/ /lhag gnas la yang rnam gnyis te/ /rang don dang ni gzhan don no/ /mchod pa la yang rnam gnyis te/ /bdag sgrub dang ni gzhan sgrub po/ /sngon 'gro dngos dang rjes dang ni/ /yan

lag la sogs thun mong ngo / /dang por slob dpon brtag pa ni/ /slob dpon yang ni dam tshig can/ /rdo rje'i theg pa dang por zhon/ /de nyid khyab can chags pa med/ /dri ma dang ni rnam par bral/ /bzod dang tshul khrims don 'jug pa/ /slob ma rnams la bde ster zhing / /dmyal ba yi

ni 'jigs sel ba/ /de kho na yi tshangs spyod can/ /bdud rnams kyi ni rdo rje dbyug /de yang sa yi steng du ni/ /rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu grags/ /khro dang nga rgyal dang ldan zhing / /dam tshig dang ni rnam bral ba/ /rdzas la brkam zhing ma thos pa/ /slob ma rnams ni bslu don du/ /

mchog tu bde ba'i go 'phang du/ /sems ni nyams dang dbang ma bskur/ /longs spyod chags shing myos pa dang / /zher 'debs pa yi tshig smra zhing / /rang dbang don du 'dod spyod pa/ /slob ma rdzogs byang chub don du/ /dmyal ba lta bur rtogs pa yis/ /de ni spang bar bya ba yin/ /zab

cing rgya che ba yi sems/ /bla ma mnyes pa la dga' zhing / /gtong ba'i sems dang yon tan che/ /thar pa 'dod cing rgyud la dad/ /sems ni g.yo ba med pa dang / /de nyid rnyed pa dang gsang zhing / /gdug pa rnams kyi tshogs bral ba/ /shin tu mkhas pa'i bla ma yis/ /slob ma de ni gzung

bar bya/ /de nas gsol ba gdab pa ni/ /skye ba mang po'i sdig pa ni/ /bsags pa rnam par 'jig byed pa/ /sdom pa so sor gzung bar bgyi/ /dpa' bo dus kyi 'khor lo brjod/ /de nas sa bslang brtag pa dang / /sbyang dang gzung dang spel ba dang / /dpyid 'bring dkar tshes nyam thar thug/ /

gzhan la phan pa'i bla ma yis/ /sa brtag la sogs rim par bya/ /nags sam grong rdal khang stong sogs/ /byang dang dbang ldan phyogs su ni/ /dkar po zhi ba rgyas pa dang / /sa la dri zhim dang ldan pa/ /sa dang chu ni brtags nas ni/ /bslang ba gnang dang mi gnang dang / /sbyang ba pus mo

lte ba dang / /rked pa 'phang du brko bar bya/ /yang na rngo'am chur thug par/ /zug rngu sol ba bcas par ro/ /sa yi khong na yod pa ni/ /'chi ba yi ni 'jigs pa byed/ /gnas de ru ni sbyang ba ni/ /yon tan gyi ni dbang gis 'gyur/ /de yi phyir na sbyang bar bya/ /nor bu mching bu dung yod na/ /

rnam par rgyal zhing bde ba byed/ /dkyil 'khor sa gzhi'i don dang ni/ /khang bzangs don dang khyim don du/ /nges pa kho nar gsal ba ru/ /mchod sbyin la sogs rgyun sbyang bya/ /rdzogs pa la ni sbyang bya zhing / /de bzhin sa ni gzung bar bya/ /bu rnams gzung ba la yang ngo / /de yang

shar dang byang du gzhol/ /dbus ni me long bzhin du mtho/ /brdung zhing legs par brdungs nas su/ /mnyam zhing zug rngu med par bya/ /der ni chu dang lci ba yis/ /dkyil 'khor sa ni legs par byug /de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyis/ /gzung zhing bla re la sogs bri/ /spos chus

brlan pa'i lag pa yis/ /nye snying bzlas pas sa la reg /rdo rje yi ni rang bzhin bsam/ /lhag gnas yan lag cho ga'o/ /de nas dgongs ka'i dus su ni/ /chu dang mchod yon dri chab spos/ /me tog dang ni 'bras bu dang / /bsang gtor dang ni mar ma dang / /lha

bshos gos dang bcur 'gyur te/ /dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa yi/ /'jig rten pa la gtor ma dang / /sa yi lha mo'i mchod gtor dang / /tshogs 'khor ji ltar 'byor ba dang / /na bza' nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / /bla re ba dan maN+Dal dang / /slob dpon rdzas brgyad ldan pa yis/ /yan

lag bzhi pa'i sgrub thabs bzhin/ /rim pa bzhin du bsgoms nas ni/ /maN+Dal steng gi dri thig le/ /me tog bkram la khro bo ni/ /'dod pa'i rgyal po sa lha mo/ /ser mo phyag gnyis bum pa thogs/ /ro stod sa nas 'thon pa ni/ /bkug nas mchod yon zhabs bsil dbul/ /dam

tshig phyag rgya brtan nas su/ /bstod dang gsol ba gdab par bya/ /lha yi dbang po lhan cig pa'i/ /bdud sde rgyal bas bcom pa yi/ /dpang por lha mo khyod ni gyur/ /de phyir khyod ni mchod par bya/ /lha yi mchog gis phyag byas pa/ /bdag gi mchod pa 'di bzhes shig /ji ltar

rgyal bas byang chub phyir/ /bdud kyi sde ni mi bzad pa/ /stobs dang ldan pas bcom pa ltar/ /slob ma rnams ni dbang bskur phyir/ /de bzhin du ni bdag gis kyang / /bdud kyi sde ni gzhom par bgyi/ /gang yang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang / /dri mdag dang bral ba yi/ /byang chub

sems dpa' ma lus pa/ /de rnams nyid kyis bskyang bar mdzod/ /dkyil 'khor dbang bskur ba yi phyir/ /mchog gi snying rjes bskyang bar mdzod/ /de rnams kun la gsol btab nas/ /de nas rnam bcu'i mchod pa dang / /gtong ma phul la gshegs su gsol/ /de nas sgrub pa'i

grogs kyis su/ /rigs drug gi ni bstod pas bstod/ /seng ldeng mkhrang ba'i rang bzhin gyi/ /phur bu bdud rtsi 'khyil par bskyed/ /skud gdags phur pa'i gsang sngags bzlas/ /de nas sngags dang phyag rgya yis/ /dkyil 'khor snying gar bsdu bar bya/ /rkang gnyis hUM las rdo rje dang / /

mig tu nyi ma zla ba bsam/ /langs nas dkyil 'khor dbus 'dug ste/ /khro bo'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa bya/ /de nas bgegs la bka' bsgo bya/ /gsang ba'i rgyud las 'byung ba yi/ /stang stabs ji tsam nus pa bya/ /de nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo ni/ /dpal kye rdo rje phyogs kun

nas/ /gnas pa yi ni bdud kyi tshogs/ /ma lus pa ni nges par bsreg /rdo rje gsum gyi ra ba gsum/ /sa yis 'khor bar song ba yi/ /sa 'og gnas dang nam mkhar ro/ /rdo rje khang pa brtsegs ma yin/ /dbus su 'dam skyes nyi ma'i khru/ /lte ba dang ldan gdan la ni/ /dus dang

lag pa'i khru ru 'gyur/ /de yi steng du bdag nyid ni/ /dri ma dang ni bral ba nyid/ /'khor lo'i dbus su khro dbang po/ /phyag ni rgyal ba gnyis lhag pa/ /dus kyi zhal te rdo rje'i shugs/ /rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom par bya/ /phyi nas 'khor lo rtsibs bcu pa/ /phyogs dang mtshams su song ba yi/ /khro mo'i

tshogs ni bsgom par bya/ /de nas sngar gyi phur bu ni/ /sngags kyis phyogs mtshams steng 'og gdab/ /de la dri dang bdug pa bya/ /lhag gnas sngon du 'gro ba'o/ /de nas dri yi chu dang ni/ /ba yi rnam lnga'i skyang nul bya/ /thig le nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / /me tog tshom yang de mnyam bya/ /de nas

rang gnas lha gnas pa'i/ /rnal 'byor pas ni snying ga nas/ /dkyil 'khor la ni sprul par bya/ /de nas de la cho ga dang / /ye shes spyan drangs mchod bstod bya/ /dbang bskur nas de dgug gzhug bya/ /de nas chang dang bdud rtsi dang / /mchod pa rnam pa bcu po dang / /bstod pa rnam pa du ma

dang / /na bza' ci 'byor dbul bar bya/ /go cha'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas ni/ /gnyis med ye shes las byung ba/ khyab bdag brtan g.yo'i bdag po ni/ /bcom ldan dus kyi 'khor lo gtso/ /sna tshogs yum gyis mgul nas 'khyud/ /nyi shu rtsa lnga pa yi 'khor/ /ma lus bdag la dgongs

su gsol/ /slob ma rnams la phan pa dang / /khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir/ /rdo rje can bdag 'di zhes pa'i/ /nang par dkyil 'khor bri bar bgyi/ /rjes su brtse bar nyer dgongs te/ /kun gyis byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ /de ltar lha ni lhag byas nas/ /bum pa lhag par gnas

par bya/ /de yang rnam rgyal bum pa ni/ /rgya ru brgyad gnyis so sor gsum pa/ /dpangs su sor tshad bcu phrag gnyis/ /mchu ni sor gnyis ske sor drug /shel lam dngul gyi bum pa ni/ /ri bong 'dzin pa ltar dkar ba/ /yang na tha mal bum pa ni/ /'bras la sogs

pas kha dog bsgyur/ /bum pa rnam pa bcu la ni/ /rigs kyi mtshan ma rnams bkod la/ /sman dang 'bru rnams gzhug pa ni/ /dri yi sman gyi re mig tu/ /rim pa bzhin du sman gyi grangs/ /mig dang zla ba la sogs chas/ /tshangs ma la sogs lnga lnga la/ /tshangs ma khyab 'jug ma

drag mo/ /dbang phyug ma dang dbang chen mo/ /dpang mo dpal mo phag mo dang / /gzhon nu ma dang rgan byad ma/ /sa mo chu mo me mo dang / /rlung mo mkha' spyod ma de bzhin/ /ma dang sring mo bu mo dang / /tsha mo rang rmongs ma de bzhin/ /bram ze mo dang rgyal rigs mo/ /rje'u rigs mo dang

dmangs rigs mo/ /g.yung mo de bzhin shes bar bya/ /sman 'di yis ni dngos grub che/ /spyod dang grol ba rab tu ster/ /'bras dang mon sran gre'u dang / /mon sran dkar dang tsan+dan dkar/ /til nag lnga pa dang po yin/ /kro tra 'bras sngon sran ma dang / /til dkar gro ni gnyis pa

yin/ /mu tra yu tri pu yungs smug /nas sran ma sha gsum pa yin/ /sran chung yungs kar dkar po dang / /ka kun tri bi ka ra dang / ba ra tsi ka bzhi pa yin/ /a ta shi dang par ti/ /ba la rgya sran tsan+dan nag/ /de ni lnga par bkod pa yin/ /de nas rin po che yi rigs/ /bram ze

rgyal dang rje dmangs dang / /mthar skyes rigs kyi rdo rje'o/ /de nas in+d+ra bar ka /chu shel ke ke ru ma rgad/ /dang po'i lnga tshan bstan ba yin/ /lcags dang gser dngul zangs khro chu/ /khab len lnga tshan gnyis pa yin/ /mu tig byu ru mthing shing dang / /ka sha ma ni shad a ru/ /lnga tshan

gsum par bkod pa yin/ /yu dza dza pa dzA ti dang / /do ba ri ga 'ba' ha ri ta/ /lnga tshan bzhi par bkod pa yin/ /lnga pa 'khor los sgyur ba yin/ /lha klu'i nor bu kha dog lnga'o/ /'byor ba med na kha dog lnga/ /me tog lnga ni gzhug par bya/ /ljang gu rnam rgyal bum par gzhug /sngon po

rgyal dang rnam rgyal la/ /nag po shar me'i bum par ro/ /dmar po lho dang bden bral lo/ /dkar po byang dang dbang ldan du'o/ /ser po nub dang rlung du'o/ /thams cad cha dbyes bcug nas ni/ /rigs mthun gos kyis mgrin pa bcing / /g.yas su pad+ma'i steng bzhag nas/ /

shU n+ya tA yis stong par bsam/ /de nas haM las gzhal yas khang / /baM las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho bskyed/ /hrIHlas pad+ma 'dab brgyad la/ /hUM las lha rnams bskyed par bya/ /cho ga gong ma 'dra ba las/ /nag por shar gyi lha tshogs bskyed/ /gzhan yang de bzhin shes par bya/ /de

nas bgegs bskrad ye shes dgug /dbang bskur yig gsum byin brlabs la/ /mchod bstod gong ma bzhin du bya/ /tshon skud bum pa'i steng bzhag nas/ /thun gcig par du bzlas par bya/ /de nas bum pa bsdus nas su/ /gos kyis bkab nas zhal bzhis bsrung / /de ltar bum pa

lhag gnas nas/ /sbyin sreg lhag par gnas par bya/ /grong khyer gyi ni dbus nyid dang / /byang dang dbang ldan mtshams su'o/ /thag khung khru gang zlum po la/ /zabs su khru phyed brko bar bya/ /mchu ni thab khung bcu gnyis cha/ /de yi nyis 'gyur kha khyer ro/ /kha khyer dpangs la mchu yi phyed/ /

nang du pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /tshon rtsi dkar pos bri bar bya/ /phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab ma la/ /ku sha yis ni dgram par bya/ /de yi mtha' yi nub tu ni/ /nges pa kho nar bya ba ni/ /rab gsum la sgo gcig pa/ /slob dpon gyi ni bdag nyid ni/ /mnyam pa kho nar bya ba yin/ /sngar gsungs

mchod pa bcu pa ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsham par bya/ /n+ya gro d+ha dang 'o ma can/ /bsreg pa'i shing ni mda' yi brgya/ /til dang yungs kar la sogs dang / /dUr ba'o ma la sogs dang / /nas gro ma sha zhu ba'i rdzas/ /bil ba ta rka dzA ti dang / /'bras bu u du m+WA ra'i shing / /nags kyi

lcug ma la sogs dang / /shel phreng gser dang gos dang ni/ /sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang chang / /tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i rdzas rnams bsags/ /de nas de rjes nyid la ni/ /dag pa rnam gsum bya ba nas/ /yan lag bzhi pa gzhung bzhin bsgom/ /snying gar sngags rnams kun bkod nas/ /

bzlas brjod mes ni sdig pa sbyang / /rang nyid dkyil 'khor bar snang du/ /bzhag nas khams gsum stong par bsam/ /be ram la sogs ri rab la/ /thug pa rim pa bzhin du bskyed/ /de dbus b+hUM las me thab kyi/ /'khor lo rim pa bzhin bsams nas/ /de dbus re

las me dkyil 'khor/ /gru gsum pa ni bsam par bya/ /de dbus baM las chu dkyil 'khor/ /zlum po dbus su me dkyil 'khor/ /dbus su rang gi mtshan ma bsam/ /zur gsum la ni yig gsum bsam/ /logs su hi yi yi ge bsam/ /de rnams gyur las me lha ni/ /zhal

gcig phyag gnyis mdog dkar ba/ /g.yon pa thab khung pad+ma'o/ /g.yas na bgrang phreng dbyug pa'o/ /bzang po ser skya ral ba can/ /spyan ni ser skya na bzar bcas/ /zla ba'i steng du bsgom par bya/ /de ltar dam tshig bskyed nas ni/ /khro bo lha mos bsrung nas ni/ /dri yi chus kyang bsang bar

bya/ /de rjes me lha spyan drangs te/ /me lha spyan drang phyag rgya dang / /oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba r-i shi te dza ma nu r-i Shi hi twa ut+ta ma hA rasmi hi to b+ha be badzra d+hA ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ /chu dang bcas pa'i me tog gi/ /mchod yon nyid ni me lha la/ /de yi sbyor dang ldan pas sbyin/ /bstod pa yang ni byas nas su/ /

dzaHdang lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas drangs/ /hUM dang rdo rje yis ni gzhug /baM dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcing / /hoHdang dril bus dgyes par bya/ /de nas bum pas dbang bskur la/ /snang ba mtha' yas dbu la bsam/ /de nas mchod yon dbul ba ni/ /oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra ma hA ra smi pratI ts+tsha swA hA/

artsa ma na pa tIts+tsha swA hA/ badzra d+hU pa pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ badzra buSh+pa pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ badzra dI pa pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ badzra nai bi d+ye pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ badzra lA s+ya pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ badzra hA s+ya pra tI ts+tsha swAhA/ /badzra bA da pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ badzra gI tI pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ badzra kA me pra tI ts+tsha swA hA/ de yang gsung pa/ me ni rnam pa

gsum yin te/ /kun bsreg khyim bdag yon gyi me/ /khyim bdag zla ba'i lce la ni/ /oM a na la sarba b+hU ta dz+wa la ya sarba b+has miM ku ru sarba dza na du Sh+TA na hUM phaT/ me ni gso phyir dgang blugs sbyin/ /de nas bgegs ni brtag par bya/ /tseg tseg sgra dang ro yi dri/ /ba lang ma go sogs mi

dge ba'i/ /mtshan ma yin par shes par bya/ /gdugs dang dpal be'u chu shel dang / /dri zhim mtshan ma sogs zhes bya/ /mi shis pa ni phyir bzlog bya/ /mchod sbyin gyi ni lag pa yis/ /mthe bong gis ni me yi khar/ /rdo rje yan lag phung sogs kyang / /bsreg pa ru ni rab tu bya/ /

oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHswA hA/ huM hUMHhri hri hri swA hA/ a A i I r-i r-I u U l-i l-I aM aHswA hA/ a A e ai ar Ar o au al a la aM aHswA hA/ ha hA ya yA ra rA wa wA la lA haM haHswA hA/ de rnams 'od la dbul bar bya/ /oM ag+na ye swA hA/ mar ni zhal du dbul bar bya/ /oM sarba

saM pa de swA hA/ 'bras chan zhal du dbul bar bya/ /oM a pra ti ha ta badzrA ya swA hA/ oM badzra A d+yu She swA hA/ ku sha dUr ba spyi gtsug tu'o/ /oM ma hA be ge swA hA/ oM badzra g+ha sma ra ye swA hA/ oM badzra bi dzA ya swa hA/ oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ oM badzra mu ta ye swA hA/ nas dang gro dang so ba

dang / /ma sha 'bras ni zhal du'o/ /'o ma la sogs zhu ba'i rdzas/ /me yi sngags kyis zhal du'o/ /oM ma hA she pA ya swA hA/ bil ba dang ni sta rka'o/ /dri ni thugs ka me tog dbu/ /spos ni 'od la mar me bdun/ /mchod yon 'thor 'thung phyag tu'o/ /bdud rtsi zhal dang rin chen dbu/ /

phreng ba phyag dang sku la sogs/ /de ltar me lha mchod nas ni/ /me ni gsang la 'od du zhu/ /de yi dbus su ye shes kyi/ /'khor lo cho ga bzhin du bskyed/ /ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la/ /mchod bstod dgug gzhug go bskon nas/ /dbang bskur nas ni sngon bzhin du/ /sbyin

sreg rgyas par dbul ber bya/ /tshogs kyi 'khor lo rgyas pa yang / /ye shes me la dbul bar bya/ /de nas khyad par sbyin sreg ni/ /oM b+hur b+hu ba swAH/ na mo de be b+h+yaHswa sti pra dzA b+h+yaHswA hA/ rA dza b+h+ya swA laM pra ti b+h+yaHa laM b+hu de b+h+yaHba Sha Ta in+d+ra ya/ 'bras khrol chu dang bcas pa yi/ /ji tsam nus

ba'i sbyin sreg bya/ /slar la 'bras bsreg phyir dor la/ /me lha'i snying gar ye shes me/ /gnyi ga gsal bar dmigs nas ni/ /gong bzhin sbyin sreg rgyas par bya/ /dri dang spos kyang gong bzhin sbyin/ /de nas rang gi snying ga ru/ /dkyil 'khor pa ni gshegs su gsol/ /rdzas kyi lhag ma

bsdus nas ni/ /me lha la ni sbyin sreg bya/ /de nas yon bdag g.yon du gzhag /me lha'i zhabs drung thal ba yis/ /dpral bar thig le byas nas bstod/ /'jig rten dbang phyug tshangs pa mchog gi sras/ /me lha'i rgyal por yongs su dbang bskur ba/ /shes rab

mchog gis nyon mongs thams cad sreg/ /'dzin byed me lha nyid la rnam par 'dud/ /rang gi pad+ma'i snying ga ru/ /ye shes me ni gshegs su gsol/ /oM dzaHgats+tsha gats+tsha swA hA/ rasmi sarba saM tri ba to ho pu na ra ga mi sha si di pa s+ye yad+ha trA na ya mi swA hA/ dam tshig gdan rnams rim bzhin thim/ /de

ltar lhag gnas byas nas ni/ /cho gas gtor ma lhag gnas bya/ /de ltar gtor ma lhag byas nas/ /gzhan don slob ma lhag gnas bya/ /snod ldan slob ma khrus byas te/ /gtsang ma'i gos bgo maN+Dal bya/ /me tog thogs la gsol ba gdab/ /phyag 'tshal la sogs bdun bo dang / /

sdom pa gsang ba bla med sbyin/ /de nas smon lam gdab par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang / /bla ma yang ni spyi bo ru/ /gzung bar bgyi'o rdo rje yi/ /rin chen gyis ni sbyin pa sbyin/ /rgyal ba mchog gi dam tshig ni/ /bskyang bar bgyi'o 'khor lo yi/ /ral gri yis ni mchod par bya/ /chu

las skyes pa'i rigs kyis ni/ /sdom pa yang ni sbyin par bya/ /sems can rnams ni grol ba'i rgyur/ /rgyal ba bskyed pa'i rigs kyis ni/ /byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /kun rdzob don du brtul zhugs rnams/ /rab mchog gis ni lam song ba/ /de bzhin de rnams sbyin par bya/ /

'tshe dang brdzun smra gzhan bud med/ /gzhan nor de bzhin chang 'thung spang / /sdig pa lnga po 'di dag ni/ /'khor par rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rang gi rigs ni 'joms par byed/ /gang zhig gang gi dus su ni/ /sum cu pa dang mi'i bla ma/ /de yi ming gis sbyin par bya/ /sna tshogs bdag po'i

bka' 'di ni/ /srid pa yi ni 'jigs 'joms pa/ /khyod kyis kyang ni bskyang bar bya/ /cho lo bsad zas kha na ma thor bcas/ /chig ni ngan par smra ba dang / /'byung po lha dang lha min chos/ /ba lang bud med skyes pa rnams/ /sum cu ba dang mi'i bla ma/ /lnga ni bsod nams mi bya'o/ /sum

cu pa dang mi'i bla ma/ /dge 'dun dang ni sangs rgyas dang / /yid ches pa dang byang chub dang / /grogs dang dpon la 'khu mi bya/ /dbang po rnams ni chags med bya/ /'di ni sring pa'i bdag po yi/ /brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/ /brgya la g.yo sgyu'i dbang gis ni/ /rtsa ba'i ltung ba byung

gyur na/ /dmyal ba yi ni sdug bsngal myong / /bu yi rtsa ba'i ltung ba ni/ /dpal ldan bla ma'i thugs sun phyung / /ri bong 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /de yi bka' las 'das pa gzhan/ /gnyis pa nyid ni de bzhin du/ /spun la khro ba gsum pa'o/ /byams pa dor ba lnga ru 'gyur/ /

grub pa'i mtha' smod drug pa'o/ /yongs su ma smin sems can la/ /gsang ba ston pa gzhan bas ring / /phung po nyon mongs brgyad par 'gyur/ /dam pa'i chos la mi dad pa/ /slar la yang ni dgu ba'o/ /rgyu yi byams pa phyogs su 'gyur/ /ming sogs bral ba'i bde ster ba/ /

rtog pa drag po ru ni 'gyur/ /dag pa'i sems can la skyon brjod/ /nyi ma ru ni 'gyur ba yin/ /dam tshig rnyed pa 'dor 'dod pa'o/ /bud med kun la smod pa ni/ /yid nyid kyi ni dgra ru 'gyur/ /rdo rje'i theg la gnas rnams kyi'o/ /slob ma skad cig lhar bskyed nas/ /slob ma la ni

bsrung bya ste/ /spyi bo snying ga de bzhin du/ /spyi gtsug lte ba mgrin pa dang / /dpral ba gsang bar rgyal ba sogs/ /gnyi ga'i rigs su song ba'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje'o/ /nges par byin gyis brlab par bya/ /de la rnam bcu'i mchod pa bzhin/ /so shing dor dang srung skud bcing / /

byams pa'i go bskon gtsug tor bskyed/ /rmi lam brtag pa'i ku sha sbyin/ /de nas slob ma gshegs su gsol/ /thig skud rdo rje rdul tshon nyid/ /shar dang gshin rje chu lha ru/ /byar du rdo rje dril bu'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor snying gar bsdu/ /bdag nyid ma la sar rmi lam brtag /ngan

na phyir bzlog cho ga bya/ /bcu gnyis pa la thig gdab cing / /'dod pa yid kyi nyi ma la/ /dpal gyi rdul tshon nyid ni bri/ /nyal dbang rnams rdzogs par ni/ /mchog gi bla mas sbyin par bya/ /bdud bcom pa yi nyi ma la/ /de yi mtshan mo rgya la ba yi/ /rigs ni rab tu gnas par

bya/ /mtshan mo gzhan la rab gnas min/ /srad bu khru ni brgyad 'gyur la/ /lag pa'i nas kyi tshad tsam du/ /gcig tu bsgril ba'i sum bsgril la/ /slob dpon mthe bong nas kyi tshad/ /lam ni rnam pa gsum song ba/ /srad bu gcig go gzhan ni med/ /a

sogs ka sogs gcig pa nyid/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma la/ /zla ba nyi ma me stengs su/ /ri bong can dang dregs pa ni/ /g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan/ /shes rab rje btsun snying pad+mar/ /nyi ma zla ba brtsegs pa yi/ /rang rang rdo rje lcags kyu yis/ /sangs rgyas lha mo rnams bkug

ste/ /thig skud chad pas slob dpon 'chi/ /phyogs 'khrul slob ma rnams ni 'chi/ /mthun dang mi mthun rkang ba yis/ /thig gdab par ni bya ba min/ /shes rab thabs kyi yan lag dbus/ /me dang rlung du song ba yi/ /dbung gi dbus su sbrul 'dra ba'i/ /dkyil 'khor mtshams rga la de

sbang bya/ /tshangs pa'i thig nas thig gdab nyid/ /nor dang dus kyi tshad kyis ni/ /phyogs kyi cha la rab tu sbyin/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bdag nyid ni/ /sor mo phyed kyi cha ru gsungs/ /'khor lo pad+ma'i bdag po ste/ /lha mo la sogs gdan rnams kyi/ /sum 'gyur du yang gsungs pa

yin/ /tshangs pa'i gnas su nyi re'u mig /slar la yang ni zla ba yis/ /ka ba rdo rje ra bar gsungs/ /sangs rgyas la sogs chu skyes bzhis/ /phyi ru ri bod can gyis ni/ /rdo rje'i phreng bar rab tu 'gyur/ /sangs rgyas lha mo'i bar bar du/ /sor phyed gsum gyi re'u mig la/ /bum pa'ang thod

pa'i gdan du 'gyur/ /de yi gnas su rdul tshon las/ /nyin mo byed pa la 'gyur te/ re khA gsum gyi mthar thug par/ /phyogs dang mtshams kyi re'u mig bzhi/ /pad+ma rnams la zla nyi ma/ /de bzhin dril sogs rnams kyis/ /sor phyed bzhi chas re khA gsum/ /dus dang de bzhin ro yis

ni/ /sgo dang sgo khyud de bzhin du/ /sor phyed drug las 'gram dang logs/ /kha khyer chen po ka ba'i phyed/ /de yi phyed kyis nor bu yi/ /rang bzhin pha gu 'ba' zhig 'gyur/ /nyis 'gyur dra ba dra phyed ba/ /sgo yi rtsa ba'i phyi rol du/ /sor phyed drug gi sum 'gyur gyis/ /ka bar bcas pa'i

rta babs 'gyur/ /thig las mtha' ru spang bar bya/ /de yi phyi rol 'byung ba bzhi/ /yang ni spros don ma yin pa/ /gcig bzhi gnyis bzhi gcig nyi ma/ /dus dang ro dang rtse mo can/ /me dang dus dang dus kyi phyed/ /dus la drug gi rab phyed dang / /dus drug dang ni ro rnams kyi/ /nges par cha yi

rim pa yis/ /lte ba'am ni snying po nas/ /chu skyes pad+ma yang de ni/ /ka ba rdo rje phreng ba dang / /pad+ma rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ /sgo dang sgo khyud la sogs pa'i/ /sa ru de 'og 'gyur ba dang / /ka bar ba kha khyer dang / /slar la yang ni de 'og tu/ /pha gu dra ba dra phyed pa/ /me long la sogs snam bu sa/ /

mi yi bdag por gyur ba dang / /rta babs kyi ni cha rab gsungs/ /de ltar thig gi las zin nas/ /tshon gyi las ni rab tu bya/ /rdo rje la sogs rdul tshon lnga/ /gser dang pad+ma rA ga dang / /byu ru mu tig la sogs pa/ /'bru yi khyad par dag dang ni/ /nor bu'i khyad par mang po yi/ /phye ma rdul tshon de bzhin

du/ /thig bzhin byin rlabs cho ga bya/ /phyogs kyi cha yi tshon gyi sar/ /mi yi bdag po rdul tshon gyi/ /sangs rgyas dbye bas bri bar bya/ /ser po dkar bo dmar sogs kyis/ /sa dang chu dang me rlung ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bri bar bya/ /shar gyis ni dpal nag go/ /nyi ma lta bur lho ru'o/ /nub tu

gser du snang ba ste/ /byang du ri bong 'dzin dkar po/ /rdo rje 'dzin zhal dbye bas so/ /dkar po dmar po nag po'o/ /rim pas yongs su bris nas so/ /kha khyer pha gu dra ba'i sa/ /pad+ma zla ba nyi ma'i mdog /dri med ri bong can 'dra dang / /dmar po nag po ne khA gsum/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma

brgyad/ /ljang gu A li lta bu'o/ /ka ba rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ /dbang ldan bden bral me rlung du/ /zla ba nyi ma dag gi mdog /nag po ser po dmar po yis/ /dung dang gaN+DI nor bu dang / /ljon shing dang ni de bzhin du/ /bum pa dkar po pad+ma yi/ /steng du zla ba dmar po ni/ /'gyur ro nyin

mor byed pa ni/ /pad+ma dkar po'i steng du'o/ /pad+ma dkar po'i lte bar lha/ /ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdan la ni/ /lha mo rnams ni gnas par 'gyur/ /pad+ma dkar po'i lte ba la/ /nyin mor byed pa dgod pa yi/ /lha rnams phyogs su gnas pa na/ /phyi ru rdo rje phreng bar 'gyur/ /gtso bo'i pad+ma'i dbang

gis ni/ /kha khyer dag ni mdog dkar po/ /ba ku li dang ka ba ni/ /gser dang 'dra ba ser por 'gyur/ /rta babs kha dog sna tshogs so/ /sbom pos nad ni skyed par byed/ /phra mos nges pa kho nar ni/ /nor nyams mtshan ngan ri mo spang / /chad pas 'chi zhing yon po yis/ /

mi rnams skye bo'i bdag pos skrod/ /de bzhin mtshan ma nyi ma'i bdag /srid pa yi ni 'jigs 'joms la/ /sngags pa rnams ni dngos grub med/ /rdul tshon 'dres na rigs ni 'chad/ /rgyal rigs dkyil 'khor la ni bya/ /rgyal ba nges pa kho nar ster/ /rgyud kyi nang du gang ma gsungs/ /

mtshan ma mdzes pa'i ched du ni/ /dkyil 'khor du ni de mi dgod/ /rgyal bas rigs ni shes med pas/ /de nyid bdud kyi mtshan ma'o/ /de phyir rgyud gsungs mtshan ma ni/ /rigs kyi dbang gis bya bar 'gyur/ /dkyil 'khor sgo yi bar du ni/ /dra ba dra phyed bar de bya/ /sa dang rlung gi dkyil

'khor la/ /pad+ma bum pa sogs byis brgyan/ /nag po la sogs rdul tshon rnams/ /bzhi cha 'phel bar 'gyur ba ste/ /nas gcig par du mtho ba'o/ /rab rnams ni mtho 'gyur te/ /nyin mor byed dang ri bong can/ /re khA gzhan ni nyis 'gyur te/ /dkyil 'khor 'di ni mtho ba ru/ /mi yi

bdag por 'gyur ba yin/ /dra ba dra phyed mthar thug dang / /sa dang chu dang byin za dang / /phyi rol rdo rje'i phreng gnas gcig /oM gyi ye shes las skyes par/ /rgyal ba dam pa'i pad+ma yi/ /nyi ma zla ba'i gdan stengs su/ /a sogs ka sogs stong bar bcas/ /srid pa gsum ni bskyed pa yi/ /

yum ni gzhag par bya ba yin/ /stong ba a dang tsheg drag dang / /gzhan ni dbyangs dang bral ba'o/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /yang dag 'byung phyir sngags skye gnas/ /mchog tu bde ba byed pa yi/ /ye shes rdo rje bzhi pa'o/ /hUM ni kha dog sna tshogs pa/ /rgyal po'i bdag po'i pad+ma yi/ /zla ba

nyi ma me steng du/ /dbang ldan bden bral gyi ni mtshams/ /rtse mo can dang rlung du ni/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs chags pas/ /haM sogs bum pa brgyad kyi'o/ /shar gyi pad+mar i yig ste/ /me yi pad+ma ru song ba/ /yi ge I ni ring po nyid/ /gshin rje bden bral r-i yig gnyis/ /shar dang

nor sbyin phyogs song ba/ /thung dang ring ba'i u yig go/ /chu dang rlung gi mtshams su ni/ /gzhan yang pad+ma ru song ba/ /thung dang ring ba'i l-i yig go/ /nag po dmar po dkar po dang / /gser ni btso ma lta bu ni/ /zhal gyi dbye ba yod pa yis/ /shar gyi sgo yi g.yas dang ni/ /rtse mo

can gyi pad song ba/ /ring dang thung bde bzhin nyid/ /gshin rje ru ni bden bral du/ /de bzhin du ni a ra ni zung / /nub dang rlung du A la ni zung / /gnod sbyin 'phrog mar o au'o/ /lha dang chu lha gshin rje yi/ /sgo yi g.yon dang gnod sbyin bcas/ /aM dang a yi rim pa yis/ /gzhan

yang ya ra wa la dang / /sgo yi pad+mar rlung la sogs/ /shar gyi sgo dang g.yas min par/ /khro bo dag gi gdan du ni/ /ri bong 'dzin par 'gyur pa ste/ /g.yas dang nub tu nyi ma yang / /pad+ma dag gi steng du ni/ /gdan gnyis dag tu rab tu 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs kyi rab dbye bas/ /

pad+ma'i steng du zla ba dang / /nyi ma yang ni gdan du 'gyur/ /g.yas dang rgyab tu nyi mar 'gyur/ /lha yi bdag por gnod sbyin du/ /zla ba yi ni gdan du 'gyur/ /thung dang ring po'i sde tshan drug /rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis na/ /kha khyer ka ba'i logs su'o/ /dri sogs rnams ni

rim pa bzhin/ /rang gi rigs kyi sar song ba/ /shar gyi cha nas rang phyogs su'o/ /de ltar bris pa zin pa dang / /de nas rdzas rnams bsag par bya/ /rdo rje dril bu la sogs pa/ /slob dpon gyi ni rdzas rnams dang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan la sogs pa/ /dkyil 'khor gyi ni rdzas rnams

dang / /de rjes mchod pa'i yan lag rdzas/ /re re nyi shu rtsa lnga dang / /khyad par tshogs kyi mchod pa'i rdzas/ /chang dbang bdud rtsi la sogs pa/ /ci 'byor ba ni bsags par byas/ /bsrung ba mda' dang phur bu dang / /yungs kar phur bu tshon skud do/ /sgrub pa bum pa rnams dang yang / /sbyin sreg

rdzas dang gtor ma'o/ /bsod nams bsog pa'i rdzas dag ni/ /rin chen bdun dang rdzas brgyad dang / /bum pa 'dod 'jo nor bu dang / /'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga'o/ /rdzas ni ji tsam 'byor ba'o/ /de nas dgongs kyi dus su ni/ /dkyil 'khor sngags kyis bslang byas la/ /rang gi

'khor lo sbrul dang bsre/ /lha rnams ma lus tshang bar bsgom/ /de nas shar du las kyi ni/ /he ru ka yi gzugs kyis dbye/ /tsham dam sngags kyis bstod pa dang / /saman+ta zhes sngags kyis ni/ /bgegs bskrad lhag dang mtshang bskang / /lha la me tog

phreng ba dor/ /sngags kyi mtshan ma khang pa'i nang / /shel gyi bum pa dkar po la/ /skud pa sna lngas dkris pa ni/ /zur du yang dag gzhag par bya/ /slob dpon 'khor lo'i shar du ni/ /gnas nas sdig pa bshags sogs dang / /dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog dang ni/ /las kyi

rgyal po'i mchog la ni/ /rigs gtso pad+ma las skyes pa'i/ /byung ba khro bo'i rgyal po yis/ /ye shes 'khor lo bkug nas ni/ /mchod yon dang ni mchod pa bcu/ /lha rnams kun la rgyas byas la/ /dzaHhUM baM hoHlcags kyu sogs/ /rim bzhin yongs su bskyed pa yis/ /dgug

gzhug bcing dang dgyes byas nas/ /rdul tshon dang ni ro mnyam pa/ /dbang gi ched du bya ba yin/ /de nas bum pa thams cad la/ /bzlas pa lha re brgya byas la/ /mchod dang lha rnams zhu bar bya/ /zhu ba'i chu yis dkyil 'khor la/ /dbang bskur rim pa bzhin byas la/ /de nas bdud

rtsi lnga rnams ni/ /lha rnams sngags kyis dbul bar bya/ /hUM yig ye shes sa bon ni/ /snying po yang ni chen po ste/ /brtsegs pa'i yi ge gzhal du bcas/ /haM la sogs pa go cha drug /nye ba yi ni snying po 'di/ /sku yi rdo rje dang por ldan/ /phreng ba'i sngags ni de bzhin gzhan/ /

las kyi dbye ba du ma yis/ /rnam pa mang po ru ni 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'khor gyi sngags kyis kyang / /bdud rtsi lnga ni dbul ba yin/ /de nas gong gsungs sreg blugs kyis/ /lha rnams kun la sbyin sreg sbyin/ /de nas mchod pa thams cad ni/ /dbyangs dang bstod sgra ldan pas ni/ /

rin chen gser dang chu me tog /rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ras/ /dri dang spos dang mar me dang / /dril bu me long bla re dang / /'bras bu sna tshogs pa la sogs/ /gar dang rol mo la sogs pa'i/ /mchod pa sna tshogs byas nas ni/ /gong gi gtor ma rgya chen sbyin/ /de ltar mchod pa'i

las zin nas/ /de nas slob ma gzhug pa ni/ /khrus dang dri yis rjes byugs shing / /lus la gos ni ser byin te/ /mig ni dar gyis bkab nas su/ /yol ba'i rgyab tu bzhag nas ni/ /bsang chu dang ni dris lan bya/ /rgyal rnams la ni deng bdag nyid/ /'khor ba mi bzad 'jigs pas

na/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs dag pa/ /srid pa yi ni 'jigs sel ba/ /khyed kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma ru/ /skyabs su lhag par 'gro bar bgyi/ /gser dang bcas pa'i me tog gis/ /maN+Dal dag ni byas pa yin/ /de ltar gsol ba btab nas ni/ /yol ba'i nang du bsdu bar bya/ /byin

gyis brlabs pa'i phyag bzhi dang / /bdun po rnams dag rdzogs par bya/ /de nas smon lam gdab pa ni/ /rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya dang / /bla ma yang ni spyi bo ru/ /gzung bar bgyi'o rdo rje'o/ /rin chen gyi ni sbyin pa sbyin/ /rgyal pa mchog gi dam tshig ni/ /bskyab par bgyi'o 'khor lo yi/ /

ral gri yis ni mchod par bya/ /chu las skyes kyi rigs kyi ni/ /sdom pa yang ni bskyang bar bgyi/ /sems can rnams ni grol ba'i rgyur/ /rgyal bskyed byed rigs kyi ni/ /byang chub dag ni bskyed par bgyi/ /de nas dam tshig rdo rje sbyin/ /snying ga yi ni zla ba la/ /hUM las rdo rje bkod nas ni/ /

byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi/ /de nas lha dang slob dpon gyi/ /dam tshig rab tu bsgrag par bya/ /lce la rgyal ba mchog gi ni/ /dam tshig gi ni bdud rtsi bzhin/ /sbos ni dbab pa'i don du'o/ /hUM gi sngags ni gcig pu dang / /a ra la dang lhan cig tu/ /khro bo yi ni rgyal ba bskul/ /de

yi mtshan nyid rgyud na gsal/ /dbab pa pad+ma'i steng la ni/ /spyi bo snying ga spyi gtsug dang / /lte ba mgrin pa gsang ba ru/ /rgyal ba rigs kyi sar son pa/ /rdo rje gsum gyis bsrub pa bya/ /de nas rigs ni dag bya'i phyir/ /oM sarba zhes bya ba yi/ /dpal kyi sngags kyis mngon bsngags te/ /

lag pa'i pad+ma sbyar byas la/ /me tog gcig ni rab tu sbyin/ /dang po bskor ba gsum byas te/ /lag pa'i pad+mo sbyor byas pa'i/ /me tog dkyil 'khor du ni dor/ /gnas gang du ni lhung ba ni/ /de yis rigs so'i mi bdag kye/ /dbye ba'i sngags kyis mig ni dbye/ /de nas rigs kyi lha

dang ni/ /gtso bo la sogs pa ni bstan/ /'jug pa bdun ni mi'i bdag go/ /de nas dbang bskur bya ba ni/ /slob ma shar gyis ru ni/ /cho ga bzhin du lhar bskyed nas/ /rigs ni dag par byas nas ni/ /de nas byang gi sgo ru ni/ /rgyal po klu dang bzhi yis te/ /rgyal dang

rnam rgyal bum pa dang / /lha mo rnams kyis bkrus pa ni/ /sgrol ma la sogs pa ru 'gyur/ /cod pan sangs rgyas rab dbye bas/ /bla ma mchog gis sbyin par bya/ /de ltar sku ni dag byas la/ /lho ru gsung ni dag par bya/ /dar dpyangs nus pa rnams yin no/ /rdo rje dril bu nyi zla dag /

de nas shar du brtul zhugs ni/ /dbang po rnams la sbyar ba'o/ /ming ni khro bo byams sogs dag /der ni nub kyi sgo du ni/ /rgyal ba'i bdag pos nges par ni/ /sngags dang bcas pa'i gnang ba sbyin/ /rdo rje dril bu rab sbyin te/ /rab mchog gi ni snying rje yis/ /dag pa'i chos ni bstan par

bya/ /rigs gtso rigs kyi nges par ni/ /srog bcad pa ni bya ba yin/ /ral gri mi bden bar smra ba'i/ /rin po che yis gzhan nor dbrog /pad+mas gzhan gyi bud med dbrog /chang dang mar me sangs rgyas dang / /yul ni du ma ma lus dang / /'khor lo yis ni bsten par bya/ /gri gug

g.yung sogs bud med kyi/ /mkha' yi pad+ma smad mi bya/ /sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir/ /nor bcas lus ni sbyin par bya'o/ /khyod kyis zhen par mi bya'o/ /bskal ba dpag med rgyal bas gsungs/ /sangs rgyas nyid de gzhan du min/ /min par 'gyur ro rigs kyi bu/ /chu ni sgrol

ma sogs lha mo/ /cod pan 'dir ni rgyal ba rnams/ /dar dpyangs nus pa rnams yin no/ /rdo rje nor bu nyi ma zla/ /brtul zhugs yul ni dag par 'dod/ /ming ni byams pas sogs la sbyor/ /gnang ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob/ /srid pa yi ni 'jigs pa sel/ /dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rjes shes

pa'o/ /'di dag dbang ni bdun yin no/ /nyon mongs dri ma sel bar byed/ /dkyil 'khor du ni rab sbyin bya/ /dbang bdun bskur bas sa bdun gyi/ /dbang phyug tu ni grol bar 'gyur/ /bum pa gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas/ /yang ni phyir mi ldog pa sogs/ /nges pa kho nar 'jug par bya/ /

shes rab ye shes kyis srid pa'i/ /'jigs sel 'jam dpal dbyangs su 'gyur/ /rtsa ba'i ltung bas dmyal bar bsreg /ltung ba dag pas dbang bdun la/ /gnas pa yon tan gyis sbyang bya/ /bum pa gsang gnas brgyal ni/ /brtul zhugs pa yi dbang gis te/ /rtsa ltung byas nas

slar yang ni/ /dag phyir dkyil 'khor 'jug par bya/ /gnang thob tshogs nang 'jug pa na/ /slar yang rgan nas gzhon spang ngo / /de nas sngags kyi dbang bskur sbyin/ /dbang bdun gyi ni cho ga'o/ /da ni bum pa'i dbang bskur ba/ /bdag ni bde gshegs kun gyi lam/ /dpal ldan bla

ma khyed kyi ni/ /bka' drin gyis ni bdag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma khyed dang sangs rgyas dang / /byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par/ /slob dpon gzhan ni mnyes mi bgyi/ /de ltar gsol ba btab nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor phyi ru maN+Dal bya/ /re khA lnga yis spras pa yi/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab

brgyad bya/ /de ru slob pa ma bzhag nas ni/ /brgyad dang de bzhin bzhin yis ni/ /bum pa nor bu gser gyi 'am/ /sa las byung ba rin chen bcas/ /sman dang dri dang ldan pa yi/ /rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa yis/ /shing stegs dbus su bkru bar bya/ /klu yi dpal gyi cod pan bcings/ /

nor gyi dpal gyi 'dab ma la/ /bzhi yis bkru dang dar gyis bcings/ /phyag rgya dpal bum gcig gis te/ /'dir ni pad+ma dang bral zhing / /ri mo lnga ni rnam par spangs/ /dang po chu la sogs pa yis/ /dge bsnyen du ni 'gyur ba yin/ /bum pa yis ni dge tshul 'gyur/ /gsang dbang dge

slong du 'gyur te/ /gnas brtan 'gyur ba gong ma'i rgyu/ /de nas rdor gsum phyag rgya sbyin/ /khyab 'jug thugs su bya ba'i phyir/ /phyag rgya drug lnga cod pan sbyin/ /tshangs pa'i sku phyir mchod phyir thogs/ /dbang phyug gsung du bya ba'i phyir/ /rang gi rgyal po'i rigs dbang gis/ /der ni phyag

rgya sbyin bar bya/ /de ltar sku gsung thugs dbang dang / /lung bstan dang ni dbugs dbyung dang / /mig thur nyon mongs spang ba dang / /me long ye shes dbang dang ni/ /chos dang phrin las gnang ba dang / /slob dpon gyi ni las rnams dang / /dam tshig rnams ni bsgrag par bya/ /de ltar dbang bskur

zin nas ni/ /rab tu gnas pa tsam du bya/ /steng du bla re bres nas ni/ /sa yi steng gi gnas dag tu/ /kun nas ming yig gsum bri'o/ /de rnams mtshams su gzhag par bya'o/ /nor bu gser gyi bum pa rnams/ /chu bcas gang pa pad+ma'i khar/ /gser gyi snod dang

dngul la sogs/ /yang na dngul las byung ba la/ /dri yi chu ni gzhag par bya/ /nang du gser las byung ba'i stegs/ /nges pa kho nar gzhag par bya/ /de ru khrus ni brtsam par bya/ /me tog la sogs dris bdugs la/ /nyi ma med la bsros pa yis/ /lha rnams la ni byug par bya/ /

phye ma rnams kyis mnyes nas ni/ /sbrang rtsi zho dang mar rnams dang / /'o ma'i chu yis bkru bar bya/ /grub pa'i don du mar me dang / /'bras bu sna tshogs mchog gis bya/ /'di ru byas pa zin nas ni/ /gnas de nas ni bskyod par bya/ /de ni gnas nas bskyod byas nas/ /sku la na bza' dmar

pos ni/ /yang dag par ni dgab par bya/ /dpal gyi dkyil 'khor mtha' ru ni/ /sa mnyam gnas su rgyal ba yi/ /ri mo lnga ni bris nas su/ /dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad/ /rang gi rigs kyi phyogs song ba/ /mtshan ma lnga yis brgyan pa yi/ /de yi dbus su gzhag par bya/ /lha

dang lha mo'i sku gzugs kyi/ /zhal ni pad+ma logs su bya/ /mchod rten la sogs glegs bam dang / /de bzhin du ni bris sku la/ /de la sngags pa kha phyogs bya/ /rgyal ba mchog dang lhan cig tu/ /sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin du zhes bya/ /phyi nas sngon gsungs rnal

'byor la/ /zla ba nyi ma me skyes la/ /dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom par bya/ /rig ma lha mo rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /A li kA li rigs skyes shing / /rang rang sa bon las skyes rnams/ /snying ga mgrin pa lte ba dang / /spyi bo spyi gtsug 'khor lo ru/ /rigs kyi dbang gis bsgom par bya/ /de bzhin

du ni bsgom bya ba/ /slar la yang ni lha rnams ni/ /ma lus pa yi rang lus la/ /ye shes sems dpa' bkug nas ni/ /gnyi ga mnyam par bya ba'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rang lus la/ /gzhug dang bcing dang mnyes pa dang / /ro mnyam bya phyir lha rnams bstim/ /de nas slob dpon nyid

kyis ni/ /lha rnams zhal bsil phyag ni bya/ /lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni/ /sa bon a sogs ka sogs dang / /rang rig yon tan gyis song ba/ /snying gi dbus su sa bon te/ /zla ba nyi ma sbyangs pa yi/ /sku dang gsung dang thugs su ldan/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan zhing / /lus

ni ma lus par son pa'i/ /mkha' brgyad gsal byed rnams ni 'god/ /de nyid dbyangs kyis phye ba ni/ /glegs bam rnams kyi yi ge dang / /'dab ma la ni rnam par dgod/ /mchod rten nang du dpal 'khor lo/ /me dang nor bu pad+ma yi/ /dbus su ral gri'i ri mo'o/ /hUM las gyur pa'i bgrang

phreng ni/ /ri lu yongs su bgrang ba ni/ /gsal byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid do/ /dril bu'i lus la dbyangs rnams te/ /bcu yi sum 'gyur byas pa yi/ /ka sogs sde tshan rdo rje ma/ /mchod phyir thogs la sogs pa dang / /gong ma bcu yis bgrangs pa yi/ /gsal byed rnams ni sgrol

byed la/ /ka sogs sde tshan gug skyed bcas/ /nam mkhar ro dang yon tan rnams/ /rnal 'byor rang la bsgom par bya/ /ha hA dpal gyi rna cha la/ /wa ni zung gcig mgul do dang / /ske rags dag la dgod pa'o/ /de bzhin yi ge ya ni zung / /gdu bu dag la dgod par bya/ /g.yer kha

rnams la ha hA gnyis/ /rnam pa lnga yi stong pa ni/ /lus ni ma lus par khyab pa'i/ /thal ba yang ni bsgom par bya/ /rang lus ye shes rnam pa 'o/ /rigs gsum gtso bo lhan cig pa'o/ /phung po khams sogs kun la sogs/ /rang gi snying gi pad+ma ni/ /sa bon so so'i rim pa yis/ /

lha rnams dgod par bya ba ni/ /mchod rten lder sol sogs la/ /sa bon bkod pas rab gnas 'gyur/ /rang gi lus las bon dbab/ /lag pa la ni rigs kyi gtso/ /sdud pa yi ni dus su min/ /ri mor bris pa'i bris sku rnams/ /'di ru me long la ni khrus/ /byas nas dri dang spos dang ni/ /

dri zhim me tog gis mchod bya/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo dang / /gos kyi mchog ni sna tshogs pa/ /rnga yab gdugs rnams kyis ni mchod/ /de ltar rab gnas byas nas ni/ /dri yi mchog ni sna tshogs pas/ /dge 'dun la ni ston mo bya/ /khron pa rdzing dang mtshe'u dang / /phyogs bzhi

mtshams ni bzhi po ru/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams ni dgod/ /mtshon bdun rang gi sa bon ni/ /sbrang rtsi chu dang ldan pa yi/ /pa yi lnga ni gzhug par bya/ /sbyin sreg mthar ni rdzing sogs su/ /chu lha dkar mo phyag na ni/ /zhags pa bsnams pa bsgom par bya/ /skyed mos

tshal dang dpag bsam shing / /yang na kun du bskyed pa'i shing / /shing gcig pa la gtor bar bya/ /de nas rab gnas zin pa dang / /dam pa yi ni man ngag gis/ /rdzogs pa'i dbang rnams rim bzhin sbyin/ /ci 'byor pa yi tshogs 'khor dang / /dpa' bo yi ni ston mo bya/ /srid pa rnam pa

gsum song ba'i/ /'jig rten gsum gyi sems can yang / /ye shes lcags kyus bkug nas ni/ /snying rjes dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur/ /sangs rgyas bdud rtsi'i rdo rje yis/ /lus ni zla ba lta bur 'gyur/ /rdo rje can gyi lam rnyed nas/ /rang gi gnas su gtang bar bya/ /nyon mongs pa dang

bral ba las/ /byang chub spyod pa rjes su gzhol/ /de nas dkyil 'khor mdun du ni/ /slob mas yon gyi tshogs rnams dbul/ /lus kyi nang gi drug cha ni/ /lag pa rkang pa dag dang lus/ /yan lag mchog ni sbyin pa dag /slob dpon la ni rab phul na/ /bde ba'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur/ /

phyag rgya bzang mos rjes su dbye/ /las kyi dbang po rnams las tshig /dbang po rnams kyi nang nas yid/ /yon dang bcas pa dbul bar bya/ /khams kyi nang nas cha drug pa/ /rkang pa gnyis dang phyugs kyi tshogs/ /de kho na yi cha gzhan ni/ /cod pan dar dang do shal dang / /gdu bu yang ni de bzhin

te/ /rna cha ka bo che la sogs/ /slob dpon la ni rab phul zhing / /rang gi nus pas yon rnams ni/ /dbul lo mi yi bdag po kye/ /ma lus tshogs kyi rigs la yang / /bsod nams rgyu ru dbul ba ni/ /gzhan gyi don du smon lam gdab/ /bsod nams 'di yis sems can rnams/ /bcom ldan

rnam pa gsum gyis ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par shog /de nas bzod par gsol ba ni/ /rang gi snying ga'i pad+ma ru/ /ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol/ /pad+ma'i bar gyi rdul tshon rnams/ /chu bo gtsang mar bsgyur bar bya/ /dam pa dang po'i rgyud rgyal mthong nas bdag gis ni/ /rim bzhin rjes

su sbyar gyis rang bzor byas pa min/ /slob ma dam pas gsol btab dor byas kyi/ /nga rgyal la sogs grags pa'i dbang gis min/ /bdag gis cho ga 'di byas pas/ /blo dang ldan pas rtogs pa dang / /byed po dge ba spel ba dang / /bstan bcos rnyed dang ldan par shog /dpal yid du 'ong ba'i

phreng ba zhes bya ba/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga /dus kyi zhabs chen po dam pa'i snang ba dang ldan pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po ba ni shrI dang / lo tsA ba chings yon tan 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsa kra sa ha dza sA d+ha naM/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lhan cig skyes pa sgrub pa'i thabs/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rab 'jigs 'jig rten 'jigs skyobs pa/ /bud med sbyor la tshangs par spyod/ /thugs rje shes rab dbyer med

pa/ /phyag 'tshal de bsgrub mdo tsam bri/ /rab tu bsngags pa'i sa yi cha/ /sngags pa rab tu yid dge bas/ /maN+Dal la sogs pa byas la/ /gtor ma sbyin pa sngon 'gro bas/ /bgegs bskrad par bya'o/ /de nas b+h+rUM las rdo rje'i khang ba brtsegs pa bsams la/ dbus su 'dam skyes dang /

nyi ma la/ hUM rab tu dkar ba las 'od 'phros te/ sangs rgyas la sogs pa bkug nas/ mchod pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o/ /stong pa rlung dang me dang chu/ /sa dang rgya mtsho ro pad+ma/ /zla ba nyi ma me dkyil du/ /rin chen khang brtsegs 'od 'phro bsgom/ /zla ba nyi ma ma steng du/ /drag po

'dod lha'i gdan bzhugs pa/ /rdo rje dang ni dril 'dzin 'khyud/ /gangs ri ltar dkar btsun mor bcas/ /pha rol phyin drug dag pa'i rgyan/ /yon tan thams cad tshad med pas/ /tshad med dag pa'i chos ldan pa/ /sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid do/ /lte bar sangs rgyas yum bcas bsregs/ /

spyi bor zla ba bzang rgyun 'dzag /chos 'byung gnyis 'dus rdo rje can/ /srid gsum yang dag bsgom par bya/ /rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor las/ /shes rab pad+mar sems thig le/ /lhan cig skyes pa de dbang gis/ /mi shigs 'od gsal bsgo bar 'gyur/ /bsnyen pa bdud rtsi lnga la sogs/ /rigs

kyi gtso bo bzhi dag ni/ /sngags kyis bzlas pa la sogs pa/ /so sor sdud pa la sogs 'gyur/ /rdo rje pad+ma las skyes pa'i/ /bdud rtsi nye bar sgrub pa'o/ /dga' ba la sogs rdo rje gsum/ /pad+mar mnyam song bsgrub par 'gyur/ /shes rab sbyor la mi 'dzag gang / /

sgrub pa chen po nyid 'gyur te/ /phra mo yi ni sbyor bas so/ /de bzhin gzhan ni gzhan du 'gyur/ /mchog tu gsang ba khyab bdag la/ /rtse gcig mnyam par bzhag pas ni/ /thun mong thun mong ma yin rtags/ /smig rgyu nam mkha' la sogs mthong / /oM kA la tsakra AHhUM hoHswA hA/

oM hraM hrIM hr-iM hruM h+r+l-iM hraHswA hA/ oM badzra d+hA twi shwa re AHhUM swA hA/ ting nge 'dzin las skyon/ mdo li la sogs pa'i rnam pas bzlas pa bya'o/ /nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / dus dang / ro dang / rgya mtsho dang / me dang / nam mkha'i de kho na nyid bsgom par bya'o/ /gtor ma ni mtshan phyed na sbyin par bya ste/ dus

dang / ro'i yi ges byin gyis brlabs la/ rgya mtsho dang / mig gi phyag rgya dang ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyin par bya'o/ /oM brah+me/ bi Sh+Nu nai ri t+ye/ pA yu/ ya ma/ ag+ne/ sa mu treM/ I shwa ren+d+ra/ yak+She b+h+yaH/ sa pa ri wA re b+h+yaH/ i daM ba liM/ gan+d+haM/ puSh+paM/ d+hU paM/ dI paM/ ak+Sha taM da dA ma hi/ te dza a ka t+ya/

sa pa ri wA re/ shI g+hAM i daM ba liM gr-ih+Na saM tr-ip+ta/ hUM hUM phaT badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes pa'i sngags kyis so/ /nor mchog gtong ba sbyin pa ste/ /yum sbyor mi 'dzag tshul khrims so/ /sgra sogs mi 'dzug bzod pa ste/ /gnyis spong le lo med brtson 'grus/ /kun nas mi g.yeng bsam gtan

mchog /bde sbyor 'od gsal shes rab yin/ /de 'bras bsam mi khyab rmad byung / he ru ka dpal brjod pa'o/ /de ltar cung zad dus 'byung rgyud/ /snying po sbas pa 'di phyung bas/ /sgrub po yang dag sbyor rnams la/ /ye shes me chen 'bar bar 'gyur/ /dpal dus kyi 'khor lo lhan cig skyes

pa'i sgrub thabs/ slob dpon dus kyi zhabs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// / /paN+Di ta chen po bud+d+ha shrI dz+nyAn dang / lo tsA ba byams pa'i dpal gyis bsgyur ba'o/ /[]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsa kra ri Ti ti sa ha dza sA d+ha nAM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor

lo skad cig gis bskyed pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba/ bde ba chen po'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam pa dang bcas rnam pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab ma des rab tu 'khyud/ /skye 'jig rnam par spangs pa'i mi 'gyur bde la dgod pa la sogs rnams dang bral ba yis/ /sangs

rgyas rnams ni skyed par mdzad pa'i sku gsum dang bcas dus gsum yang dag mkhyen pa po/ /thams cad mkhyen pa dang po'i mchog gi sangs rgyas gnyis med de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dang po skad cig gcig gis stong pa la gnas phyi nas de bzhin skad cig gis bskyed pa/ /sna tshogs chu skyes zla ba nyi ma sgra

gcan rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas dbang phyug dang / /'dod lha dag gi snying gar g.yas brkyang shin tu sngo ba rdo rje dril bu dang ldan phyag gnyis kyis/ /sna tshogs yum gyi sku la yang dag 'khyud pa'i dpal ldan mnga' bdag dus 'khor lo/ /sprin nag lta bu'i ral pa'i tshogs la ta ma la mtshungs mi

bskyod pa la sogs pas spras/ /phyag rgya drug gis kyang ni rab spras thod pa dkar po'i phreng bas bcings pa gang / /mi mgo'i do shal spyan gsum gser mtshungs sku mnga' gri gug pad snod dang ldan phyag gnyis ma/ /dpal ldan sna tshogs yum dang gnyis med bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sogs bsgom

par bya/ /de nas khams gsum rang dang mtshungs par ldan pa de rnams ma lus lha mo'i sku la bzhugs/ /de yang rang la rang lus gdan dang bcas pa nyi ma la ste nyi ma hUM la'o/ /U ni ha la de yang mgo bo la ste de nyid zla ba phyed pa nyid la'o/ /zla phyed thig le de nyid nA da de bzhin nam mkha' kha rlangs

me long la phog mtshungs/ /de ltar 'od gsal zhugs nas slar yang snga ma dang mtshungs gzugs su dran par byas pa dang / /sprul pa sna tshogs khams gsum rnams su nam mkha' khyab par skad cig gis ni spro bar bya/ /de ltar yang ni de bzhin bsdu zhing yang ni de ltar bskyed cing spro ba de bzhin du/ /

mnyam par gzhag pa'i zung 'jug lam dang 'di yis ni/ /sangs rgyas zhabs la yang dag 'gro bar 'gyur/ /dpal ldan dus 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs/ /gang byas pa yi bsod nams 'dis/ /'jig rten pa rnams lhan skyes kyang / /gnyis med rang bzhin zhabs thobs shog /dpal

dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs lhan cig skyes pa zhes bya ba/ slob dpon rol pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta bA gI shwa ra dang / lo tsA ba chos rab kyis bsgyur ba'o// @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI kA la tsakra sA d+ha na yo ga pa dI pA hwa

yaM/ bod skad du/ dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor rab gsal zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gi byams pas 'jig rten la gzigs pa/ /dkyil 'khor gsum gyi gal ba sna tshogs 'di/ /de ni dpal ldan dus 'khor ting 'dzin rgyal/ /rdo rje 'dzin

pas khyed la phun tshogs mdzod/ /byang chub sems dpas mdzad pa'i rgyas 'grel sogs/ /med par mkhas pas rgyud mang rtogs pa min/ /dang po'i sangs rgyas thos nas rdzogs byang chub/ /legs grub gnyer rnyed phyir na bde thob 'gyur/ /de yi sgrub thabs rjes dran bya ba la/ /bdag

ni mkhas min sdeb sbyor mchog yod min/ /de lta na yang rang nyid dran ched du/ /bdag gis bgyid de mkhas rnams bzod par mdzod/ /rlung me chu sa lhun po dang / /sna tshogs chu skyes dkyil pad+mar/ /zla nyi sgra gcan bdud dbang phyug /rol par g.yas brkyang zhabs gzhol zhing / /

sna tshogs yum la snyoms 'jug pa/ /gcig tu rang gzhan don phun tshogs/ /sku bzhi'i dag nyid zhi ba ni/ /gnyis su med cing rtog pa spangs/ /'gyur med bde ba chen po gang / /stong pa nyid dang snying rje'i bdag /de dran chos dang rjes mthun pas/ /sgrub thabs kun du 'dris par

bya/ /srid pa'i skye bar kun rmongs las skyes pa'i/ /mngal gyi sdug bsngal dag kyang mtha' yas shing / /byis pa gzhon nu nyid dang long tsho dang / /rgan po la yang srid par bar du 'jig /de la mi yi dngos po rnyed dka' ste/ /chos bzhin spyod pa shin du rnyed par dka'/ /sangs rgyas 'byung

dang theg pa chen po dang / /de la gus pa 'ang shin tu rnyed par dka'/ /brtan rnams mtha' dag gsang ba'i bsam gtan la'ang / /gang zhig tshe na rab tu 'jug par byed/ /de las sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ba la/ /e ma'o 'jug pa shin tu dka' ba nyid/ /des na blo ldan rnams kyi mgo dang

ni/ /gos la me shor bzlog pa ltar sgrub bya/ /snying rje che ldan rnal 'byor pa/ /rmongs dang nga rgyal la sogs spang / /chu sogs bden dang rjes gnang dang / /bum pa gsang ba mchog gsum dang / /shes rab chen po'i dbang bskur ba/ /bla ma dam pa'i rim thob pa/ /gang nas skyong chos

ldan zhing / /skye dgu rnams kyang bder gnas la/ /gang na sa 'dzin rtsod med pa/ /der ni bsgrub pa brtsam par bya/ /skyed tshal ri bo rgyal ba bzhugs/ /grub pa'i lha gnas stong pa dang / /dur khrod dang ni chu 'gram dang / /gnas gtsang dang ni sa phug dang / /gang du sems ni nyams dga' bar/ /ci 'byor

pas ni mchod par bya/ /dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas/ /kun nas srung ba'i 'khor lo bsam/ /bde ba'i lam la stan 'dug nas/ /sngon du khro dbang nga rgyal bya/ /snying gar sna tshogs chu skyes nyi/ /dbus su sa bon hUM bsgom bya/ /de 'od dkyil gsal srung 'khor mchog /rgyal rgya

mtsho gtsor bsgoms nas/ /phyag 'tshal sngon du 'gro ba yis/ /'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam bdun gyi/ /mchod pa bla na med byas nas/ /stong pa nyid la dmigs par bya/ /lha yi skur ni bskyed pa dang / /lus sogs rnam par sbyong ba rnams/ /rim pa ji bzhin brjod bya ste/ /de rnams sngags

kyang go rims bzhin/ /oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHpradzonya pA yAt+mA ka kA ya wA k+tsi t+ta dz+nyA nA d+hi pa te ma ma kA ya wAk+tsi t+ta badzraM badzrA mr-i ta swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru skan+d+ha d+hA two ya ta naMdz+wa ni swa b+hA paM swA hA/ de nas gtsug tor steng gi char/ /zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba/ /de ni waM las byung ba bsgom/ /gtsug tor nas ni rkang sen

mthar/ /sbrul gyi shun pa bzhin du ni/ /lan gsum dor bas gnyug ma'i lus/ /bdag gi lus de de nas ni/ /dge ba'i las la zla bar bsam/ /dbang sogs rgyas par ma brjod do/ /gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya/ /oM swa b+hA wa shud+d+haHsarba d+harmAHswa b+hA wa shud+d+ho\u0f85haM/ dpral ba mgrin pa

snying ga dang / /lte ba gtsug tor gsang ba la/ /oM AHhUM hoHde nas ni/ /haM k+ShaHyi ge rim pas sbyar/ /'od dpag med dang rin chen dbang / /de nas don yod rnam snang mdzad/ /mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje 'dzin/ /sku mdog phyag mtshan 'chad 'gyur bzhin/ /oM hraHsarbA s+t+wa rA dza mA ra kle shAn+ta ka

ra badzra tI k+Sh+NA duHkhats+tshe da ma ma ka raM bi sho d+ha ya swA hA/ sngags 'di yang dag brjod byas nas/ /lag pa phan tshun nye bar bya/ /a i la sogs thung du ni/ /g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung 'og tshigs nas/ /g.yas pa'i mthe bor steng tshigs sogs/ /lA sogs ring po lnga pa gsum/ /

a i r-i u l-i/ e e a ra o al/ ha ya ra wa la/ zhes pa dang / lA wA rA yA hA/ A la au A ra ai A/ l-I U r-I A zhes pa'o/ /lag pa kha sbyar dbus su ni/ /hUM gi yi ge mchog tu sngo/ /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan gyi/ /sa bon gyis ni rtse lnga bcing / /rdo rje'i phyag rgya de yis ni/ /gtsug tor rkang sen

mthar thug reg /oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHkA ya wA k+tsi t+ta dz+nyA nA d+hi pa te badzra kA ya ma ma kA ya wAk+tsi t+ta dz+nyAn badzraM badzra kA ya swa b+hA baM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes brjod do/ /de nas nga rgyal bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badzra kA ya swa b+hA ba At+ma ko\u0f85 zhes bya'o/ /blo ldan rigs drug rnams bkod nas/ /de nas yan lag drug dgod bya/ /

lag gnyis kha sbyar byas nas ni/ /mthe bong zung dag snying gar dgod/ /bsrung ba'i 'khor lo nyer bsdu ba/ /lugs las bzlog pa'i rim pas brjod/ /oM h+l-IM hr-i da yA ya na ma/ /oM hUM shi ra se swA hA/ oM d+h+r-iM shi khA yai bau ShaT/ oM hriM ka pa tsA ya hUM/ lag gnyis dag gis lus kun la/ /reg cing 'di ni yang dag brjod/ /oM hrAM ne trA

ya pa ShaT/ oM hraHa s+t+ra ya phaT/ mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong gi /se gol lag pa g.yon pas bya'o/ /mi dge ba la lag g.yas kyi/ /phyogs kun du yang mtshon cha mchog /de yi 'og tu blo bzangs kyis/ /'dir yang stong nyid bsgom par bya/ /brtan par byed pa'i sngags rnams kyang / /'chad par 'gyur

ba nyid bzhin no/ /rlung sogs dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni/ /steng du de yongs gyur pa las/ /ring du mthong ba'i mtshams kyi mtha'/ /der ni rab gsum pa'o/ /yul 'khor bsrung phyir yul 'khor mthar/ /ra ba lnga yang de bzhin no/ /kun gyi 'og tu mdung dang ni/ /steng du mda' yi dra ba'o/ /dbus

su rdo rjes gzhi ni/ /yul 'khor mthar yang bsgom par bya/ /tho rangs grib ma'i mtshams kyi mthar/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'o de nang du/ /sna tshogs pad+ma 'am 'khor lo ste/ /de dbus nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /oM hAM yaM rAM wAM laM badzrA kA sha bA yu te dza yu da ka pr-i th+wI badzra swa b+hA ba pany+tsa d+hA ta bo badzra maN+DalA ni ku ru ku ru swA hA/

zhes pa 'og tu dkyil 'khor dgod pa'i sngags so/ /oM AHhuM raHbadzra tsan+d+ra sUR+Ya rA hu kA lAg+na yaHkA ya wA k+tsit+ta badzra prA kA rA na ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa ra ba'i sngags so/ /oM bi shwa kA ya badzra badzra kU TA gA raM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngags so/ /oM bi shwa badzra pad+ma ku ru ku ru

swA hA/ zhes pa pad+ma'i sngags so/ /oM raHbadzra sUR+Ya badzra sUR+YA sa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ zhes pa nyi ma'i gdan gyi sngags so/ /hUM yig rdo rje las skyes pa'i/ /rdo rje shugs ni gtso bo bzhin/ /dbu ni g.yas 'gying glang lpags gyon/ /nyi shu rtsa drug phyag ldan pa'i/ /khro dbang rnal 'byor pa yis bsgom/ /

klu bcu yis ni rgyan du byas/ /ral pa dar dpyangs phyag gdub dang / /ske rags mgul rgyan rkang gdub rim/ /rgyal ba rnam rgyal zhes bya dang / /stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma zhes/ /gnyis rnams dang po g.yon shes bya/ /nor rgyas bu dang dung skyong dang / /mtha' yas de bzhin rigs ldan dang / /'jog po

pad+ma che dag go/ /ma lus bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams/ /sku las me 'od 'phros pas bsregs/ /mtha' yas zhing rdul grangs 'das pa'i/ /nyi ma las lhag gzi 'od can/ /bsams nas de snying pad nyi la/ /ha ya ra wa la rnams brtsegs/ /thung ngu ring pos rab phye ba/ /de rnams bcu

ni rtsibs bcur spro/ /ha yig las skyes gtsug tor can/ /rtsa zhal gyi ni snyan g.yon las/ /phyung ste khang brtsegs steng dbus su/ /zla ba 'am nyi mar snang bar bsgom/ /snyan g.yas nas phyung gnod mdzes ni/ /hA skyes rdo rje sa 'og tu'o/ /bgegs mthar byed pa yi las skyes/ /shangs bug

g.yon nas shar du'o/ /shangs bug g.yas nas me mtshams su/ /yI las byung ba'i dbyug sngon can/ /r+r-i skyes shes rab mthar byed ni/ /g.yon pa'i spyan las lho ru spro/ /r+r-I las byung ba'i 'dod rgyal ni/ /g.yas pa'i spyan las bden bral du'o/ /'dir ni skye ba'i rim nyid kyis/ /dang por gnod sbyin dbang

ldan mchog /lhag mchu dang rlung gi phyogs/ /rim pa las ni bzlog pa yin/ /wu yig yongs su gyur las skyes/ /pad+ma mthar byed zhal sgo las/ /wU yig las byung mi g.yo ba/ /gci ba'i sgo nas nges par skyes/ /bshang lam sgo nas phyung ba ni/ /l-i yig las skyes gshin rje gshed/ /rdo rje

gtsug tor nas phyung ba/ /l-I yig las chen stobs chen te/ /khro bo'i rgyal po 'di rnams kun/ /mi mnyam gzi ldan gtso bo mtshungs/ /ma lus bgegs ni 'joms mdzad cing / /bdud bzhi zad par mdzad rnams so/ /so sor bsdu ba'i rim nyid kyis/ /nga 'og nya Na man

rnams/ /bsams te zad par nam mkha' sogs/ /de ltar sgo rnams las byung spro/ /khang brtsegs steng dang g.yon mdzes drung / /gzhan ni khang brtsegs phyi rol du/ /stong pa rlung me chu dang sa'i/ /dkyil 'khor lnga pa zung la'o/ /de bzhin gza' dang klu rnams dang / /'byung po rnams kyang gdan

la'o/ /zad par gza' dang 'byung po rnams/ /mtshon cha 'dod ma sogs ji bzhin/ /khro bo phyogs skyong klu rnams kyi/ /dbyibs ni 'chad 'gyur ji bzhin no/ /klu yis khro bo rnams kyang 'dir/ /zhal gsum phyag drug spyan gsum pa'o/ /'di kun ming gi rim pa yang / /gtor ma'i sngags

ni ji bzhin no/ /ra ba gsum par phyogs skyong dang / /gza' rnams 'chad 'gyur gdan la'o/ /phyi rol ra ba lnga rnams la/ /de bzhin klu dang 'byung po spro/ /g+ha dz+ha D+ha b+ha d+ha rnams brtsegs/ /phyogs skyong sa bon go rims bzhin/ /ga dza Da ba da rnams brtsegs/ /gza' rnams rim pas

'byung ba'o/ /kha tsha Tha pha tha rnams brtsegs/ /rim pa ji bzhin klu'i sa bon/ /ka tsa Ta pa ta rnams brtsegs/ /'byung po rnams ni rim pas 'byung / /ra ba gsum dang ra ba lnga'i/ /phyi dang nang du de bzhin no/ /de dag rnam par gnon byed pa'i/ /steng dang 'og tu gnas pa spro/ /ye shes mkha' rlung

me dang chu/ /sa yi khams las yang dag byung / /srung ba'i 'khor lor gnas pa drug /gnyis gnyis sems dag lus srung ba'o/ /lus las 'jig dus me 'bar bas/ /bgegs dang log par 'dren pa bsregs/ /mkha' khyab me stag tshogs 'phro ba'i/ /'khor lo 'dir ni rnam par bsgom/ /de nas mnyam

par gzhag pa yis/ /bdud sreg pa ni bsgrags par bya/ /oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHhraHhraHhraHhraHra ra ra ra badzra na la sarbA ba ra Na d+harma pra la ya swa b+hA ba sarba mA ra kA yi ka big+h+na bi nA ya kA dI nAM da sha dig+ga tA nAM kA ya wA k+tsi t+tA ni da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa b+ha sh+mIM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ces pa bdud sreg

pa'i sngags so/ /bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs rnams/ /rdo rje lcags kyus dbang byas te/ /rdo rje zhags pa yis kyang ni/ /bcing pa lnga yis bcings par bsgom/ /khro dbang rdo rje phur bu ni/ /lte ba'i 'og nas mdung gi tshul/ /phyogs bcu rnams su gdug pa yi/ /steng du bying bar

bsam par bya/ /sngags ni/ oM AHhUM ho haM k+ShaHhUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT badzra kI la ka kA ya wAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA nA d+hi pa te ShaD+mu kha ShaD+b+hu dza sarba tsa ra Na sarba big+h+na bi nA ya kA di duSh+TA naM kA ya wAk+tsit+ta dz+nyA nA ni kI la ya kI la ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ de nas rdo rje tho ba'i sngags ni/ oM l+l-IHbadzra mung+ga ra mA rA dI nAM shi ra si kaN+The hr-i da

ye nA b+hau gu h+ya badzra kI la kA nA ko Ta ya k+ShAM k+ShAM k+ShiM k+ShIM k+ShIM k+Sh+R-IM k+ShUM k+ShUM k+Sh+l-i k+Sh+l-IM hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ de nas blo ldan khro dbang gi / nga rgyal byas nas phyogs bcu yi/ /phur bu bsrung ba'i khro bo la/ /sngags 'di brjod de bka' bsgo bya/ /oM hUM kro d+hen+d+ro haM kro d+hA nA mU dz+nyA dA ya ka swA hA/ oM haM badzra kro d+ha rA dza ma ho Sh+NI shor+d+ha di shi rak+ShAM ku

ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yaM badzra kro d+ha rA dza a ti ba la/ sarba big+h+nAn+ta ka pU rba di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM raM badzra kro d+ha rA dza dzam+b+ha ka duSh+Ta pradz+nyAn+ta ka dak+Shi Na di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM laM badzra kro d+ha rA dza stam+b+ha ka ya mAn+ta ka pa sh+tsi ma di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM waM badzra kro d+ha rA dza mA na ka bi rA ga pad+ma n+ta ka u t+ta ra di shi rak+ShAM

ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM yAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza nI la daN+Da ag+ne y+YAM di shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM rAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza Tak+ki rA dza nai r+r-i t+yAM di shi rak+ShA ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM lAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza ma hA ba la bA ya byan+dI shi rak+ShAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM waMHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza tsa le I shA na di shi nga k+Sha'aM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM hAHbadzra kro d+ha rA dza sum+b+ha rA dza

a d+h+wa di shi rak+ShaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ de nas oM sarba ta thA ga ta rak+Sha tsakra swa b+hA bAt+ma ko\u0f85 zhes pas brtan par bya'o/ /de nas de rnams la gtor ma/ sngags tshig rnams kyis rim pas sbyin/ oM AHhUM ho/ uSh+NI Sha sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha big+h+nAn+ta ka nI la daN+Da ka TAk+ki ra dza pad+man+ta ka a tsa la ya mAn+ta ka ma hA ba le b+h+yaHsa

pa ri wA re b+h+ya i daM ba liM gan+d+haM puSh+paM d+hU paM dI paM ak+Sha taM da dA ma he te tsA ga t+ya sa pa ri wA rAHshI g+h+raM i daM ba liM gr-i h+Nan+tu kha dAn+tu bi wan+tu dzaHhUM baM hoHsaM tr-ip+tAHsarba satwA nAM shAn+tiM puSh+TiM rak+ShA ba ra Na gup+taM kurban+tu hUM hUM phaT phaT badzra d+ha ra A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ zhes pa khro bo thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM AHhUM hoH

A kA sha wA yu te dza u da ka pr-i th+wI sA d+hi te b+h+yaHsa pa ri wA re zhes pa la sogs pa lhag ma snga ma bzhin te zad par gyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM AHhUM hoHbra h+ma b+hiSh+NU nai r+r-i t+ya bA yu yA g+nimA sa mu dre shwA re n+d+ra ya k+She b+h+yaH/ zhes pa la sogs pa phyogs skyong gi gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM AH

hUM hoHrA hu kA lA g+ni tsan+d+ra sU R+Ya bud+d+ha maM ga la shu kra pr-i ha spa ti ke tu sha ne b+h+yaH/ zhes pa la sogs pa gza'i gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM AHhUM hoHdza ya bi dza ya pad+ma ka rko Ta ga bA su kiM shaM khA pA la ku li kA nan+ta ta k+Sha ka ma hA pad+me b+h+yaH/ zhes pa la sogs pa klu'i gtor ma'i sngags so/ /oM AHhUM hoHbe tA

Da bi kr-i ta mu kha shwa kA ka shU ka ra gr-i d+h+ra byA g+h+ro lU ka dzam+bu ga ru Da mu khe b+h+yaHsa pa ri zhes pa la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin te 'byung po'i gtor ma'i sngags so/ /gtor ma rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ /mchod pa'i rnam pa yang dag ldan/ /med na yid kyis bsgom par bya/ /bza' bca' la sogs rgya che ba/ /

shing rta khur dang zangs mo cha/ /thal mo la sogs bar du yang / /g.yon dang g.yas dang zung gis bkab/ /nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgya dang / /sku yi rdo rjes sbyang bar bya/ /gsung gi rdo rjes rtogs bya ste/ /thugs kyi rdo rje sbar bar bya/ /ye shes kyi ni bdud rtsi dgug /rtse lnga gri

gug ral gri dang / /rin chen chu skyes 'khor lo yis/ /phyag rgyas de rnams la gtor ma/ /dbul zhing 'thor 'thung sogs kyis mchod/ /dril bu'i sgra dang bstod pa bya/ /ye shes nam mkha' rlung me chu/ /sa yi rang bzhin de rnams kyang / /haM a i r-i u l-i bsam/ /kra mA dA pa

rak+She na sa ste/ /'khor lo drug tu gshegs gsol bya/ /skad cig nyid la dgug bya ste/ /ji skad bstan pa thams cad nyid/ /ces pa gsungs pa'i 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'o/ /de nas rnal 'byor rig pa 'dzin/ /'dod ma'i grogs dang ldan pa yang / /kha ni dag par bya ba'i phyir/ /

bdud rtsi ril bu kha ru gzhug /yang na lus dag bya ba'i phyir/ /rdo rje'i phyag rgyas lus reg nas/ /dang por skad cig rnam pa yis/ /dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku/ /thugs kar paM skyes pad dmar 'dab brgyad pa'am/ /yang na aM skyes sna tshogs pad+mar ni/ /zla ba nya ba la ni hUM yig

sngo/ /de las byung ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i/ /gzi brjid las skyes sangs rgyas tshogs rnams ni/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs mdzad pa'o/ /sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa'i phyir du yang / /'khor lo'i gtso bo rnams kyang bsgom par bya/ /brtsegs pa'i sa bon las byung ba/ /

dri chab ma sogs lha mo ni/ /kun nas 'od kyis bkug rnams kyis/ /mngon par phyag 'tshal rab mchod bya/ /oM ts+tsh+dz+dz+h+nya badzra gan+d+ha gan+d+hA naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM ts+tsh+dz+dz+h+nyA badzra mA le mA lA r+ts+tsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM T+Th+D+D+h+Na badzra d+hU pe d+hU pA r+ts+tsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM T+Th+D+D+h+NA badzra pra dI pe pra dI pa r+ts+tsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/

oM p+ph+b+b+h+ma badzrA mr-i te nai bi d+ya pU dzaM ku ru swA hA/ oM p+ph+b+b+h+mA badzra k+Sha te ny+k+Sha ta pha la r+ts+tsa naM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+na badzra lA s+ye wa s+t+ra b+ha ra Na pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM t+th+d+d+h+nA badzra hA s+ye ga N+DA darna pu dzaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+nga badzra wA d+ye wa d+ya pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM k+kh+g+g+h+ngA badzra

nr-i t+ye nr-i t+ya pU dzaM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM s+p+W+paSh+sh+th+ka badzra gI te gI ta pU dzAM ku ru ku ru swA hA/ oM s+W+paSh+sh+th+kA badzra kA me bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM badzra su ra ta pU dzIM ku ru ku swA hA/ zhing rdul kun las lhag pa yi/ /rdo rje gsum sbyor rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /dam

chos dang bcas tshogs rnams la/ /bdag ni gus pas phyag bgyi'o/ /de rnams re re la yang de snyed kyi/ /de la bos pa shin tu yid 'phrog pa/ /dri chab ma sogs lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis/ /dri bzang la sogs rnams kyis mchod pa bgyi/ /bgyis dang

bgyid du stsal dang gzhan rnams la/ /rjes su yid rangs btang snyoms gzhag pa ste/ /srid par lus sogs las skyes nyes pa dang / /sdig pa ma lus pa dag bshags par bgyi/ /rdzogs sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / /'phags pa du mas chos la mchog mdzad dang / /gzhan

gyi dge ba byas pa gang yin la/ /rab tu dga' bas rjes su yi rang ngo / /mchog gi brtse bas khyab par gyur pa yi/ /kun du chags las ma chags bde ba 'byung / /thar pa'i thabs ni rab tu sbyin mdzad pa'i/ /sangs rgyas rnams la rtag tu skyabs su 'chi/ /kun du rtog pa ma lus kun nas spangs/ /rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi phun tshogs brten/ /dngos dang dngos med gnyis su med pa'i chos/ /rnam pa gnyis la rab tu skyabs su mchi/ /sangs rgyas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dam pa'i chos/ /dam pa'i yon tan mnga' ba tshogs kyi mchog /chags pa'i zhags pa'i

tshogs las nges grol bar/ /'gyur ba de la nges par skyabs su mchi/ /sems can rnams kyi ci 'dod don/ /bya phyir bdag gi lus 'di ni/ /shin tu rnam par dag sems kyis/ /sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar bgyi/ /rmongs dang dka' thub kyis bskams pa'i/ /'gro ba'i lo tog

thams cad la/ /dam chos ston pa'i char pa ni/ /rgyal bas rgyun mi 'chad par mdzod/ /ji srid 'khor ba'i brtson ra las/ /ma grol sems can gcig gi bar/ /de srid mya ngan mi 'da' ba'i/ /brtse ba chen po bstan du gsol/ /gal te gzugs can gyur na zhing gi rdul/ /kun dang

mnyam pa'i nam mkha'i tshad las kyang / /lhag par gyur pa'i bsod nams 'di de yang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub nyid du bsngo bar bgyi/ /ma lus nyes las nges grol zhing / /yon tan kun gyis brgyan gyur pa/ /ye shes rgya mtsho rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /sems can don phyir 'grub par shog/ /

byang chub sems ni bskyed bgyi zhing / /bsam pa rnam par dag pa bskyed/ /bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa spangs/ /rtsa ba gsum ni dran par bgyi/ /sbyin sogs phyogs dang tshangs gnas bzhi/ /bsdu bzhi dge ba rnam bcu bsten/ /sgrib pa lnga dang nyon mongs dang / /de bzhin zag pa bzhi po spang / /

de nas dngos po med la bsgom pa med/ /bsgom pa bsgom pa nyid ma yin/ /de ltar dngos po dngos med pas/ /bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o/ /stong pa'i rang bzhin stong nyid las/ /kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang skyes/ /de lta na yang kun rdzob tu/ /bsngags pas dkyil 'khor dbang phyug

bsgrub/ /ji ltar mthar ni chu yis me/ /'jig ste sa yang zhu bar gyur/ /chu ni rlung gis sems byed cing / /rlung ni stong par 'jug par byed/ /kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i sems/ /mkha' dbyings yul dang bral gyur pa/ /rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan gzugs/ /dbu ma'i gnas su

gzhag par bya/ /de nas oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyAn badzra sa b+hA bA t+ma ko\u0f85haM oM a ni mi t+ta dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA bA t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM a pra ni hi ta dz+nyAn badzra swa b+hA bA t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ oM a na b+hi saM skA ra dz+nya na badzra swa b+hA bA t+ma ko\u0f85haM/ 'di ni phyi ru chos 'byung ste/ /ma yi lus la gru gsum mo/ /de dbus brtsegs pa'i sa bon
dang / /smon lam bag chags dbang las byung / /h+k+Sh+m+l+W+R+YaM

rdo rjes kyang ni de rnams mtshan/ /dbyi bas ni/ gzhu dang zur gsum dang / /zlum po gru bzhi go rims bzhin/ /ma yig las skyes lhun po che/ /rin chen rdo rje'i rang bzhin de/ /'og la stong phrag bcu drug dang / /steng la stong phrag lnga bcur brjod/ /de yi phyed du k+Sha las skyes/ /

sna tshogs pad+ma'o ha dang ni/ /zla phyed thig le las skyes pa'i/ /zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan gzugs/ /nang du dpral ba sogs kyang ngo / /de steng hUM 'phros rdo rje ni/ /'bar ba'i sa dang gur nang du/ /'od gsal b+h+rUM yig las byung ba'i/ /khang pa brtsegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum/ /'og

tu oM skyes dbus kyi ni/ /pad+mar nyi zla dgra gcan 'dzin/ /thugs kyi dkyil 'khor pad+ma rams/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis de zhes bya/ /oM yig ye shes las skyes par/ /zla ba nyi ma'i gdan rnams so/ /phyi rol dag tu bzhon pa'i steng / /zla ba nyi ma spangs pa yi/ /brgyad dang bcu gnyis

grangs rnams so/ /sgo rnams su ni shing rta bzhi/ /sna tshogs nor bu gser sogs kyi/ /dkyil 'khor de yang 'od gsal te/ /mtha' yas sangs rgyas zhing rdul dang / /mnyam pa'i nyi ma'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /nam mkha' ji srid mthas gtugs par/ /sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phro/ /sangs

rgyas byang chub lha rdzas gnas/ /rang bzhin dri med shin tu gsal/ /gzhal med bsod nams ye shes kyi/ /tshogs las byung ba'i nor bus brgyan/ /snying po'i 'khor lo'i nor bu'i nang / /'di ni kun nas dag pa'i mchog /de nas phyi rol de lus la/ /de khams dag par rgyas par brjod/ /chos

kyi phung po'i dag pa ni/ /rtsa ba'i rgyud bzhin brjod bya ste/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun chos/ /thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnams kyis ni/ /rdo rje'i thig le bzhi pa ste/ /dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams kyis/ /kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid

do/ /yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa yis/ /sgo ni bcu gnyis po rnams te/ /de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis kyis/ /rta babs dag ni mdzes pa rnams/ /'phags lam yan lag brgyad rnams kyis/ /phyogs brgyad du ni dur khrod rnams/ /stong nyid bcu drug ka ba rnams/ /khams rnams

kyis kyang khang pa brtsegs/ /rnam thar brgyad kyis sgo khyud rnams/ /gzugs can yon tan brgyad rnams kyis/ /'gram rnams dang ni logs rnams nyid/ /thugs gsung sku yi dbye bas so/ /tshul khrims la sogs phung bo lngas/ /kha dog lnga ni rnam sbyangs pa/ /theg pa gsum gyis rab

gsum/ /dad pa'i dbang po sogs kyis lnga/ /dang sogs stobs rnams dag gis lnga/ /thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor ro/ /ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyis/ /dkyil 'khor gsum la kha khyer te/ /pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa yis/ /rin chen snam bu rnam par bkra/ /ma 'dres

chos ni bco brgyad kyis/ /do shal phyed pa de rnams nyid/ /dbang rnams kyis kyang ba ku lI/ /dge bas kra ma shI R+Sha'o/ /stong nyid la sogs rnam thar gyis/ /dril bu'i sgras ni gang ba ste/ /rdzu 'phrul rkang pas rgyal mtshan gtams/ /spong bas me long rab tu 'bar/ /byang chub yan lag rnga

yab g.yo/ /yan lag dgu yi phreng bas brgyan/ /bsdu ba bzhi po rnams kyis ni/ /zur du sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan/ /bden pa rin chen bzhi rnams kyis/ /sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams su spras/ /mngon shes lnga yis rtag tu ni/ /zlum skor chen po lnga yis bskor/ /rnam pa kun gyis byang

chub spras/ /rdo rje phreng bas legs par bskor/ /bde ba gcig bu'i lcags ri yis/ /de bzhin ye shes rdo rje 'bar/ /shes rab thabs kyi cha yis ni/ /zla ba nyi ma rtag tu shar/ /thugs gsung sku dang yang dag dag /chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che/ /rnga bo che dang byang chub shing / /de bzhin

yid bzhin nor bu sogs/ /'di dag dpal ldan dus 'khor gyi/ /dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings dang ldan/ /phun tshogs kun byed bsgoms nas ni/ /de nas a sogs ka sogs dgod/ /ces gsungs so/ /thung ngu yon tan yaN 'phel ring / /tshes mtha' dag tu aM dang a/ /a sogs

g.yon skor lugs 'byung ste/ /la sogs de las bzlog pa'o/ /sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rnams ni/ /zlar 'gyur zla ba'i rgyu rnams so/ /la sogs wa ya Da D+ha rnams/ /yi ge rnam gnyis rnam gnyis brjod/ /las ta sogs pa Ta tsa/ /ka sogs rang rang gnyis brtsegs nas/ /de

rnams gcig pa lugs bzlog las/ /da g+ha ga sogs rim pa'o/ /g.yas skor ba dang zung gis ni/ /brgyad cu nyi ma'o nyi ma'i rgyu/ /gang 'di me long sogs rim las/ /dbyangs yig dang po gsal byed rjes/ /gang 'di skye ba'i rim pa las/ /gsal byed dang po dbyangs rjes su/ /

des na nyi ma'i steng gi ni/ /zla bar hUM yig dri za nyid/ /de rnams kyang ni hriHru 'gyur/ /de yang haM gyur des mtshan pa'i/ /khyab bdag ye shes lnga yi bdag /mthon ka chen po'i 'od ltar gsal/ /rgyal ba lnga yi 'od 'phro ba/ /ston par sprul pa'i rnal 'byor can/ /dus kyi 'khor lor

mngon brjod pa/ /rdo rje'i rgyan dang sku 'od kyis/ /ma lus nam mkha'i khongs khyab pa/ /yan lag bcu gnyis 'gog bdag nyid/ /dus kyi dbugs 'gags las skyes pa'i/ /gtsug rgyan rna cha mgul rgyan dang / /tshangs skud phyag gdub ske rags dang / /zhabs gdub rdo rje phreng ba

dang / /thal ba stag lpags na bza' dang / /sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dang / /ral par dpal ldan rdor sems 'dzin/ /dpa' bo mi rus rgyan ldan zhing / /thod phreng dang ni dar dpyangs can/ /spyan dang phyag dar bcu gnyis te/ /mgrin pa gsum dang zhal bzhi pa/ /nag po mche gtsigs drag po

ni/ /byams chen rang bzhin las 'khrungs shing / /g.yas pa dmar po phyag dang bcas/ /dga' ba chen po'i thugs las 'khrungs/ /ser 'od ting 'dzin la gnas zhal/ /btang snyoms che las yang dag byung / /g.yon zhal dkar po zhi ba ste/ /snying rje chen po las byung ba'o/ /dbus

dang g.yas dang cig shos ni/ /sngo dmar dkar ba'i mgrin gsum ldan/ /sku gcig zhabs gnyis phrag pa drug /dam pa'i phyag ni nyi shu bzhi/ /sum brgya drug cu'i tshigs kyis ni/ /sna tshogs gzugs dang ldan pas mdzes/ /g.yas pa'i phrag gsum sngo dmar dkar/ /

cig shos kyang ni de bzhin te/ /dpung pa gnyis gnyis cig shos kyang / /sngo dmar dkar ba'i rnam pa gsum/ /de bzhin phyag ni bzhi bzhi yang / /sngo dmar dkar ba rnam pa gsum/ /de bzhin phyag sor 'og tshigs nas/ /sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba nyid/ /sor mo kun kyang sor gdub kyis/ /

mdzes shing kha dog lnga ldan te/ /mthe bong la sogs rim pa yis/ /ser dkar dmar dang sngo dang ljang / /nag po'i phyag bzhir rdo rje dang / /ral gri rtse gsum gri gug 'gyur/ /de bzhin dmar por me mda' dang / /lcags kyu cang te'u thob nyid/ /dkar po bzhin ni 'khor lo mchog /

mdung dang dbyug pa dgra sta'o/ /g.yon gyi nag por dril bu mchog/ /phub dang kha T+wAM thod pa ste/ /dmar po bzhir ni gzhu dang zhags/ /rin chen dang ni chu skyes dkar/ /dmar por dpal ldan dung me long / /rdo rje lcags sgrog tshangs pa'i mgo /sna tshogs yum gyis sku la 'khyud/ /

dpal ldan oM yig las skyes pa'i/ /pad+mar zla nyi sgra gcan gzugs/ /steng du bdud dang dbang ldan gyi/ /brang gi mthil la nyi gzhon dang / /zla 'od ltar gsal zhabs gnyis po/ /g.yas brkyang du ni rol pas bzhugs/ /zhabs g.yas dmar po'i 'og tu ni/ /lag pa bzhi ba'i

bdud dmar po/ /gdong gcig me tog mda' lnga dang / /lcags kyug zhu dang zhags pa 'dzin/ /zhabs dkar 'og tu dbang ldan yang / /dkar po gdong gcig mig gsum pa/ /lag bzhi rtse gsum Da ma ru/ /kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa 'dzin/ /dga' ma u ma gdong dman cing / /

kun du 'khrul pa yang dag skyes/ /skra grol gos dang bral gyur pas/ /rang gi rje bo'i rkang mtha' 'dzin/ /gtso bo'i mgul la 'khyud pa yi/ /sna tshogs yum ni gser gyi mdog /gtso bo'i rgyab zhal gtsor gyur lta'i/ /zhal bzhi dang ni phyag brgyad ma/ /g.yas par gri gug

zhags pa dang / /Da ma ru dang bgrang phreng ste/ /g.yon par thod pa zhags pa dang / /chu skyes 'dab brgya nor bu'o/ /spyan gsal bcu gnyis kyis phyug cing / /rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan ldan/ /mi 'gyur gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ /gtso bo'i byin pa'i ljon shing steng / /rang gi byin pa'i

'khri shing dkris/ /g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs/ /'dab ma brgyad la lha mo brgyad/ /phyag brgyad spyan ni bcu gnyis ma/ /nag dmar ser dan dkar mo ni/ /'bar ba mnyam pa'i stabs kyis bzhugs/ /phyogs bral 'dab mar du ba dang / /smig rgyu mar me mkha'

snang ma/ /phyag rgya lnga sogs rgyan kun gyis/ /gtso mo bzhin du brgyan byas ma/ /rang rang mngon phyogs mgon po'i zhal/ /gtso bor gyur 'dra'i zhal bzhi ldan/ /de phyir mgon po'i zhal mdog gam/ /yang na phyi rol phyogs kyang ngo / /me sogs phyogs bral rnams kyang ni/ /rim pa ji bzhin

shar phyogs bzhin/ /lha dang sku mdog dag kyang 'dir/ /g.yas skor gyis ni brjod pa nyid/ /gzhan du rim pa gzhan nyid dang / /yang na spro ba'i rim pas so/ /nag po 'bar ma bdug spos dang / /tsan+dan kha che gla rtsi ni/ /ga pur bcas snod dril bu dang / /yongs 'du'i me tog me tog phreng / /

dmar po 'bar ma mar me dang / /do shal cod pan lag gdub gos/ /ske rags rin chen rna rgyan dang / /sil sil byed pa'i rkang gdub ldan/ /ser mo 'bar ma'i g.yas su dung / /gling bu 'od 'phro rin chen dang / /cang te'u g.yon dang pi wang rnga/ /khar ba'i rnga dang zangs kyi dung / /dkar

mo 'bar ba'i g.yas su yang / /'o ma chu dang sman chang snod/ /g.yon du bdud rtsi grub pa'i ro/ /'bras bu sna tshogs 'bras chan snod/ /du ba ma sogs mtshan ma ni/ /rang mdog dang mtshungs rnga yab brgyad/ /'di dag khro mo'i dbang phyug dang / /lhan cig pha rol phyin bcur bshad/ /yid bzhin

nor bu chos gaN+DI/ /dpag bsam shing ni grwa gsum du'o/ /gtso bo'i pad+ma'i sa las phyi'i/ /dbang ldan du ni chos kyi dung / /'dod chags chen pos 'dul ba yi/ /skye bo'i 'jig rten de gzigs nas/ /lus la shin tu dga' ba'i sgras/ /rgyal ba'i tshogs ni rab tu gzhug /skyes bu rig ma'i

rang bzhin las/ /phung po khams sogs rab bcug nas/ /ming dang gzugs sogs ngo bo yis/ /mi snang gyur bar rnam par bsgom/ /lha nyid gzugs kyi sku yis ni/ /mi snang gyur par bar snang du/ /phyung bas ji lta ba bzhin du/ /sna tshogs yum la gzhug par bya/ /

slar yang de las nges 'thon nas/ /rang gi lus kyi nang du zhugs/ /rdo rje'i lam nas phyung nas ni/ /zla ba zhu ba'i rang bzhin las/ /lha mo'i pad+mar rang rang gi /sa bon las skyes rdo rje ni/ /rten dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can/ /mi bskyod dkyil 'khor bsams te dbyung / /sngon du bcom ldan 'das

sku la/ /'gro la phan pa kun sgrub pa/ /bdag po de bzhin bcug nas ni/ /dkyil 'khor pa rnams yang dag spro/ /bde chen sbyar las phyi rol du/ /rdo rje phreng ba gnyis kyi bar/ /ral gri phreng sogs kyis brgyan pa'i/ /brgyad gnyis ka ba'i bar bar du/ /phyogs kyi pad+mar rdzogs sangs
